The addition of green Chartreuse introduces herbal bitterness, while falernum brings a touch of spice and depth, creating a cocktail that's both intense and balanced.

cocktail_specs.name: Rumba
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, spirit-forward tiki cocktail with a bold contrast of overproof rum and gin, balanced by tart lime juice and sweet grenadine. Its layered profile—spicy, citrusy, and richly syrupy—makes it a standout for those who love complex, flavorful drinks.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail with roots in colonial Jamaica, the Rum Punch is a celebration of rum's versatility. It balances the bold, spicy notes of overproof Jamaican rum with the bright acidity of lime juice and the sweet, syrupy richness of Angostura bitters, creating a drink that is both refreshing and deeply flavorful.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Punch-Up
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic Rum Punch, this cocktail amplifies the spirit's intensity with a generous dose of Jamaican overproof rum. It balances sweetness from rich syrup with tart lime juice and aromatic Angostura bitters, creating a drink that is both invigorating and deeply flavorful.

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki cocktail born in the 1940s, the Mai Tai is a symphony of tropical flavors—rich rum, citrus zest, and nutty orgeat—balancing sweet, sour, and herbal notes. Its origins are shrouded in mystery, but it became iconic thanks to Donn Beach and his Polynesian-themed bars.

cocktail_specs.name: Sugarhill Gang
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, spirit-forward cocktail that marries the rich caramel and spice of Appleton Estate rum with the crisp acidity of Calvados and citrus. Named after the iconic hip-hop group, this drink is a modern twist on classic French and Caribbean influences, offering layers of almond, cinnamon, and tropical fruit.

cocktail_specs.name: Sugarhill Gang Riff
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail inspired by the iconic 'Rap Superstar' track, this drink harmonizes rich Barbados rum with cognac, bright citrus juices, and nutty orgeat. The addition of glögg syrup adds a subtle winterspice warmth, making it a sophisticated yet approachable choice for those who appreciate layered flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Spiced Painkiller Riff
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical twist on the classic Painkiller, this riff infuses spiced rum with vibrant orange juice and a touch of apricot liqueur for a sweet yet balanced profile. The addition of Monin pistachchio and pineapple syrups adds depth, while pimento dram brings a subtle warmth, making it a refreshing yet complex tiki-inspired drink.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange wheel, pineapple leaf, and a sprinkle of crushed pistachios

cocktail_specs.name: Spiced Jungle Bird
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical cocktail with a complex spice profile, blending the warmth of aged rum with the bright acidity of lime and lemon. The addition of hibiscus liqueur and grapefruit syrup creates a deep, floral sweetness, while the aromatic bitters add an earthy depth that bridges the gap between tiki and modern mixology.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist and a pineapple leaf

cocktail_specs.name: Blue Lagoon
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki classic, the Blue Lagoon is a bright blue elixir that balances sweet, tart, and herbal notes. Originating in the 1950s, it’s a staple of tropical cocktails, often associated with Donn Beach, and its signature hue comes from blue curaçao.

cocktail_specs.name: Jamaican Dark 'n' Stormy
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and refreshing tiki classic, the Jamaican Dark 'n' Stormy is a harmonious marriage of robust dark rum and spicy ginger beer. Hailing from Jamaica, this cocktail embodies the spirit of island resilience with its deep, molasses-rich flavors and effervescent kick.

cocktail_specs.name: Espresso Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and creamy cocktail, the Espresso Martini combines the smooth richness of vodka with the bold, aromatic intensity of espresso. Originating in the 1980s at San Francisco's Excalibur restaurant, it became a staple of modern cocktail culture, known for its velvety texture and balanced sweetness.

cocktail_specs.name: Ulli Spec
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, complex cocktail blending the smoky depth of Kaluha rum with the bittersweet essence of coffee and a touch of almond liqueur. This German creation is a modern twist on classic tiki elements, offering a balance of sweet, bitter, and boozy notes that make it both intriguing and indulgent.

cocktail_specs.name: Buttercup
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and velvety Dutch-inspired cocktail, the Buttercup marries the nutty depth of genever with the caramelized sweetness of toffee liqueur and the herbal complexity of rosso vermouth. It’s a sophisticated yet approachable drink, perfect for those who appreciate layered flavors without overpowering bitterness.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist or a light dusting of nutmeg

cocktail_specs.name: Waterloo
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic Dutch classic, the Waterloo is a harmonious marriage of genever's spiced complexity with the bright citrus notes of orange curaçao. It was reportedly created in honor of the Battle of Waterloo, blending the robustness of Dutch spirits with a touch of herbal depth from Jägermeister.

cocktail_specs.name: Shark's Tooth No.1
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, Shark's Tooth No.1 delivers a potent punch of Jamaican rum with layers of citrus brightness, sweetness, and a touch of raspberry depth. Its overproof rum base ensures a robust, spirit-forward experience, while the balance of lime, lemon, and grenadine creates a harmonious yet intriguing flavor profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Waters of Chaos
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Waters of Chaos blends the smoky depth of Genever with the fiery punch of overproof Jamaican rum. Green Chartreuse adds a herbal, slightly medicinal complexity, while lime juice and rich syrup balance the drink with tartness and sweetness, creating a chaotic yet harmonious symphony of flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Anchor Heart
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex Dutch-inspired cocktail, the Anchor Heart marries the caramel and spice notes of peated malt whisky with the malty depth of genever. The addition of honey syrup and lemon juice introduces a subtle sweetness and tartness, while triple sec adds a bright citrus finish.

cocktail_specs.name: Mexican Duchess
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Mexican Duchess is a harmonious blend of reposado tequila, genever, London dry gin, orange curaçao, and vermouth amaro. It offers a rich tapestry of flavors—spicy, citrusy, herbal, and slightly sweet—with a smooth, balanced finish that reflects its origins in modern Mexican mixology.

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Holland Gin Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A refined Dutch classic, the Improved Holland Gin Cocktail is a harmonious marriage of genever's malty complexity and maraschino's fruity sweetness, balanced by absinthe's herbal depth. Originally created in the late 19th century as an evolution of the traditional Holland Gin Fizz, it offers a sophisticated, slightly bitter-sweet profile with a touch of aromatic bitters for depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Bridal Suite
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic Dutch-inspired cocktail, the Bridal Suite is a harmonious blend of genever's spiced complexity, the sweet and herbal depth of rosso vermouth, and the bright, fruity essence of maraschino. It's a celebration of balance, with orange bitters adding a subtle citrusy bite to tie it all together.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A classic Dutch-inspired cocktail, the Gin Cocktail is a harmonious blend of genever’s malty richness, orange curacao’s citrus sweetness, and boker's bitters’ aromatic depth. It dates back to the early 20th century and was a staple in American bars before Prohibition, often served as a sophisticated aperitif.

cocktail_specs.name: Casino
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail, the Casino is a harmonious blend of Old Tom gin's spiced sweetness, Maraschino liqueur's cherry depth, and bright citrus notes. Created in the early 20th century at the Waldorf Astoria Hotel, it's a celebration of balance—sweet, tart, and aromatic with a touch of bitterness.

cocktail_specs.name: Cotillion
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing tiki classic, the Cotillion is a harmonious blend of bourbon, aged rum, citrus juices, and triple sec. Created in the 1940s by Donn Beach, it embodies the spirit of tropical elegance with its balanced sweetness and subtle bitterness.

cocktail_specs.name: Cotillion (Scott's)
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail, the Cotillion is a harmonious blend of bourbon, aged rum, citrus juices, and orange curacao. It was popularized by Scott McGinnis in the early 21st century, offering a sophisticated balance of sweet, tart, and herbal notes that make it a standout among citrus-forward cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Pinky Pincher
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated yet approachable twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, the Pinky Pincher replaces the traditional cherry with almond-infused orgeat, adding a nutty depth that complements its bright citrus and sweet balance. Its origins trace back to the early 20th century, evolving from the Whiskey Sour's lineage while embracing modern almond-forward techniques.

cocktail_specs.name: Orange Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Daiquiri, this cocktail replaces traditional lime juice with a bright blend of orange and lime, creating a sunny, citrus-forward profile. Its golden hue and balanced sweetness make it a perfect summer sipper, often associated with the rum-rich traditions of Cuba.

cocktail_specs.name: Bee's Knees
cocktail_specs.description: A delightful and refreshing British cocktail, the Bee's Knees is a harmonious blend of gin, lemon juice, honey syrup, and orange juice. Created in the early 20th century, it embodies the elegance of classic cocktails with its bright citrus notes, floral undertones from the gin, and a touch of sweetness that balances the tartness perfectly.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist or a sprinkle of honeycomb

cocktail_specs.name: Saturn (diffords)
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and aromatic tiki-inspired cocktail, the Saturn balances the earthy depth of falernum with the bright acidity of passion fruit purée and lemon juice. Its nutty orgeat and botanical gin create a layered profile that is both refreshing and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist or a sprinkle of nutmeg

cocktail_specs.name: Porn Star Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, complex martini that blends the smoky depth of mezcal with the tropical sweetness of passion fruit and vanilla. This modern twist on a classic cocktail is spirit-forward and layered with contrasting flavors, making it both intriguing and indulgent.

cocktail_specs.name: Gargoyle No 2
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, modern twist on the classic Gargoyle cocktail, this version replaces traditional citrus with passion fruit purée and a touch of rich syrup. It balances the botanical complexity of dry gin with the smooth neutrality of infused vodka, creating a refreshing yet sophisticated profile that’s both tropical and elegant.
cocktail_specs.garnish: passion fruit tuft and a lemon twist

cocktail_specs.name: Passion Fruit Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Tom Collins, this cocktail blends the tropical sweetness of passion fruit purée with the botanical complexity of gin. The addition of Fassionola, a rare overproof Jamaican rum, adds depth and a hint of spice, making it a perfect summer sipper.

cocktail_specs.name: Rihanna's Passion
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail that blends the tropical sweetness of passion fruit with the rich, caramel notes of Barbados 5 rum and cognac. Inspired by Rihanna's love for bold flavors, this drink balances citrus brightness and rum's depth, making it a standout in both taste and presentation.
cocktail_specs.garnish: passion fruit berry and lime wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Passion Fruit Julep
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and luscious twist on the traditional mint julep, this cocktail replaces the classic herb with passion fruit puree, delivering a tropical burst of tangy sweetness. The demerara rum adds depth with its caramel notes, while honey syrup balances the tartness, creating a refreshing yet complex sip.
cocktail_specs.garnish: passion fruit pulp and mint sprig

cocktail_specs.name: Lady Killer
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Lady Finger cocktail, this version replaces Cointreau with overproof Fassionola rum for a bold, rum-forward profile. Its lush blend of pineapple and passion fruit syrup, combined with bright citrus notes, delivers a deceptively complex yet refreshing sip.

cocktail_specs.name: The Glass Man
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered tiki-style cocktail, The Glass Man blends the depth of cognac with the tropical brightness of unaged Jamaican rum and gold Cuban rum. It's a harmonious mix of citrus, almond, passion fruit, and a touch of spiced falernum, creating a drink that's both refreshing and sophisticated.

cocktail_specs.name: Tabu Tabu Grog
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, spirit-forward grog that blends the bold, unaged profile of Overproof rum with the tropical sweetness of passion fruit and citrus. This cocktail is a nod to the tiki tradition, featuring pimento bitters for warmth and a touch of Angostura for depth, creating a complex yet refreshing experience.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and passion fruit pulp

cocktail_specs.name: Bosun Bird
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Bosun Bird is a harmonious blend of gin liqueur, aged rum, green Chartreuse, triple sec, lime juice, and maraschino liqueur. It boasts a rich tapestry of herbal, citrus, and cherry notes, offering both sweetness and complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Popcorn Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A playful and unexpected twist on the classic Fashioned, this cocktail blends the buttery sweetness of popcorn with the botanical brightness of gin and the caramel richness of bourbon. The addition of amaro di ango adds a touch of aromatic complexity, making it a unique and memorable experience.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Faithful
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing cocktail that marries the crisp acidity of Sauvignon Blanc with the herbal complexity of gin liqueur and amaro. Created in the 1980s, it's a harmonious blend of sweet, bitter, and citrus notes, often enjoyed as an aperitif or a light dinner drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Hi Falutin
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail from the classic era, the Hi Falutin is a harmonious blend of bourbon's rich caramel and oak notes with the herbal complexity of Byrrh and the subtle sweetness of Swedish Punsch. Created in the early 20th century, it embodies the elegance and intricacy of pre-Prohibition mixology.

cocktail_specs.name: Bali Rum Trader
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, tiki-inspired cocktail that captures the essence of Bali with its vibrant blend of rum, green banana liqueur, and pineapple juice. This drink is a nod to the exotic flavors of Southeast Asia, offering a refreshing yet slightly sweet profile with a touch of herbal complexity from the banana liqueur.

ingredients.name: Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)

cocktail_specs.garnish: pineapple leaf and a small pineapple wedge

cocktail_specs.name: It's Hardnell Dammit
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail blending the rich, caramel notes of aged Cuban rum with the effervescent acidity of Sauvignon Blanc wine. The Swedish Punsch liqueur adds a touch of spice and sweetness, creating a drink that is both sophisticated and approachable.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical classic born in New Orleans, the Hurricane is a refreshing blend of Jamaican rum, citrus, and passion fruit syrup. It’s traditionally served over crushed ice in a hurricane glass, often garnished with fruit to evoke the flavors of a Caribbean breeze.
cocktail_specs.garnish: pineapple leaf, orange slice, maraschino cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane (cara)
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical hurricane cocktail, the 'Cara' version is a refreshing blend of light and aged rums, passionfruit syrup, and citrus juices. It was popularized in the 1970s by Donn Beach at the Hurricane Bar in Acapulco, Mexico, known for its bright colors and fruity depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane (Minimalist Tiki)
cocktail_specs.description: A streamlined, tiki-inspired twist on the classic Hurricane, this minimalist version forgoes the traditional fruit garniture and soda water to focus on a bold, tropical blend of dark Jamaican rum, passion fruit syrup, and lemon juice. It delivers a rich, fruity, and slightly tart profile that’s both refreshing and spirit-forward.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane Caesar
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Hurricane, this version swaps traditional grenadine for Campari and orgeat, adding a sophisticated bitterness and nutty depth. It's a refreshing yet complex cocktail that balances tropical sweetness with herbal complexity, perfect for those who appreciate a modern take on tiki classics.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical storm of flavors, the Hurricane is a layered cocktail that balances rich rum with zesty citrus and sweet mango. Originating from New Orleans in the 1970s, it's known for its striking presentation and refreshing yet complex taste profile.
cocktail_specs.garnish: frozen mango puree rim, lime wheel, mint sprig, and maraschino cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Appleton 12
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Jamaican rum cocktail, the Appleton 12 showcases the smooth, aged character of Appleton Estate's signature expression. It balances the rich caramel and spice notes of the rum with bright citrus acidity, creating a harmonious blend that is both complex and approachable.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane (And a Bottle of Rum)
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, layered tiki classic with a deep history rooted in Caribbean hospitality, this cocktail combines light and dark rums for a balanced sweetness, while passion fruit and pineapple/orange juices bring tropical brightness. The name hints at its bold, rum-forward character, often served in a hurricane glass to showcase its striking layers.
cocktail_specs.garnish: pineapple leaf, maraschino cherry, and orange slice

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane (Cure)
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Hurricane (Cure) combines light rum with overproof Fassionola for a potent, tropical punch. Its passion fruit purée adds a vibrant sweetness, while lime juice brings a sharp contrast, making it a refreshing yet intense experience.

cocktail_specs.name: Adriatique
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Italian cocktail, the Adriatique is a harmonious blend of Montenegro Amaro's herbal depth, Aperol's bright bitterness, and fresh orange juice. It captures the essence of coastal Mediterranean flavors, offering a balanced profile that is both complex and approachable.

cocktail_specs.name: When the Levee Breaks (minimalist)
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, rum-forward reinterpretation of a classic tiki cocktail, this drink layers unaged and aged Jamaican rums with tropical juices, passion fruit, and fernet for a complex, slightly bitter-sweet profile. Inspired by the spirit's resilience, it balances sweetness with depth, making it both refreshing and intriguing.

cocktail_specs.name: Riff on When the Levee Breaks
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, rum-forward cocktail inspired by Led Zeppelin's iconic track, blending the complexity of aged and unaged Jamaican rums with tropical sweetness and herbal depth. It’s a modern take on tiki traditions, balancing rich caramel notes from aged rum with bright passion fruit and tart lemon.

cocktail_specs.name: The Quad
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and balanced twist on the classic Cosmopolitan, The Quad replaces gin with vodka while retaining its signature bittersweet profile. It's a refreshing yet sophisticated cocktail that highlights the interplay between citrus, sweetness, and herbal amaro.

cocktail_specs.name: Sidekick
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and versatile cocktail, the Sidekick is a sophisticated twist on the classic Sidecar. It replaces brandy with cognac for added depth, while maintaining its signature balance of citrus and orange liqueur. This drink is both elegant and approachable, making it a staple in any cocktail repertoire.

cocktail_specs.name: Nranja Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic daiquiri, the Nranja Daiquiri combines light Cuban rum with orange curaçao for a bright, citrus-forward profile. Its name is derived from 'naranja,' Spanish for orange, reflecting its sunny, tangy character.

cocktail_specs.name: Park Lane
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail from the Park Lane Hotel in London, the Park Lane is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical notes with the sweet, fruity depth of apricot brandy. Its gentle bitterness and citrus brightness make it an elegant choice for any occasion.

cocktail_specs.name: Red Lion
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and balanced cocktail, the Red Lion is a harmonious blend of citrus, sweetness, and bitterness. It features gin's botanical complexity, the bright tang of orange juice, and a touch of grenadine for depth, creating a drink that's both refreshing and sophisticated.

cocktail_specs.name: Damn the Weather
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on a classic, this cocktail combines the botanical complexity of gin with the sweet, citrusy allure of Curacao and orange juice. Its name is a playful nod to the weather, but its balance of bitter, sweet, and herbal notes stands strong regardless of the elements.

cocktail_specs.name: honeysuckle daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic daiquiri, this cocktail infuses floral honeysuckle notes with rich gold rum, bright citrus, and a touch of sweet honey syrup. It's a refreshing yet sophisticated drink that balances tropical and herbal elements, perfect for those who appreciate a more nuanced take on a timeless favorite.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist and a sprig of honeysuckle (if available)

cocktail_specs.name: Black Widow's Bite
cocktail_specs.description: A visually striking and vibrant cocktail, the Black Widow's Bite combines the smooth neutrality of infused vodka with the sweet, tropical allure of blue curaçao. The addition of orange juice brightens the drink, while a touch of aromatic bitters adds depth, creating a balanced yet playful libation that’s as much about its bold color as it is about its flavor.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist or a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Honey Bee
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and balanced cocktail that marries the rich, caramel notes of Jamaican aged rum with the bright acidity of lemon juice and honey syrup. The touch of orange juice adds a subtle sweetness, making it both refreshing and complex—a perfect blend for those who appreciate tropical flavors with depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Macca Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Margarita, the Macca version replaces traditional tequila with reposado for a smoother, more nuanced profile. The addition of orange juice and agave syrup enhances its sweetness while maintaining the signature tangy brightness.

cocktail_specs.name: Rocky Left Bank
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail that bridges the worlds of gin and cognac, this drink is a harmonious blend of floral elderflower, crisp white wine, and the rich complexity of aged spirits. It evokes the elegance of the Left Bank region in Bordeaux, offering a refined balance of sweetness, acidity, and depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Modern Lovers
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that marries the crisp acidity of Sauvignon Blanc with the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc, balanced by the rich apple notes of Calvados and the subtle sweetness of Strega. This drink is a modern twist on classic French aperitivo traditions, offering layers of citrus, floral, and woody flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Suzie
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and slightly bitter Italian cocktail, the Suzie balances the herbal notes of Suze with the sweetness of pineapple syrup and white wine. It's a perfect aperitivo or a light, citrusy drink for warm weather.

cocktail_specs.name: Pisswasser
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex Dutch aperitif, the Pisswasser is a harmonious blend of white wine, Chartreuse, gin, and herbal liqueurs. Its name, which translates to 'piss water,' reflects its origins as a simple, no-nonsense drink, but it has evolved into a sophisticated cocktail with layers of citrus, botanical, and herbal notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Gibson's Ecological
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and harmonious cocktail that marries the crisp acidity of white moscatel wine with the herbal complexity of green Chartreuse, the richness of cognac, and the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur. This drink is a celebration of balance, blending traditional French elements with a modern ecological twist, making it both elegant and approachable.

cocktail_specs.name: The Stig
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that blends the rich, fruity depth of Calvados with the bright acidity and floral notes of Pisco and elderflower liqueur. It’s a modern twist on classic elements, offering a harmonious balance of sweet, tart, and herbal flavors, perfect for sipping slowly.

cocktail_specs.name: Elderflower Spritz
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and refreshing spritz that harmonizes the floral notes of elderflower liqueur with the crisp acidity of Sauvignon blanc, topped off with effervescent soda water. This cocktail is a modern twist on the classic Aperol Spritz, offering a lighter, more aromatic profile perfect for warm-weather sipping.

cocktail_specs.name: Starry Night
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail inspired by the famous painting, this drink harmonizes the crisp acidity of Chablis with the luscious sweetness of Poire William and the rich, cherry notes of Maraschino. It's a perfect representation of how wine can elevate a cocktail to new heights.

cocktail_specs.name: Tropic
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing blend of Sauvignon Blanc, pink grapefruit juice, and Bénédictine liqueur, this cocktail offers a harmonious balance of citrus brightness, herbal complexity, and subtle sweetness. Its name hints at tropical vibes, though its roots lie in the sophisticated fusion of wine and liqueur traditions.

cocktail_specs.name: Wine Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, refreshing twist on the classic punch, this cocktail balances the crisp acidity of Sauvignon blanc with the bittersweet charm of an Aperol-style liqueur. It’s a lively, citrus-forward drink that bridges the worlds of wine and cocktails, perfect for summer gatherings.

cocktail_specs.name: Hartnell
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail that combines the rich, caramelized depth of Cuban rum with the effervescent brightness of Sauvignon blanc wine. The Swedish Punsch liqueur adds a touch of spice and sweetness, creating a harmonious balance of tropical, citrusy, and slightly herbal notes.

ingredients.name: Havana Club Añejo 7 Años Cuban Rum

cocktail_specs.name: Right Pear
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail that harmonizes the rich, malty depth of blended Scotch whisky with the delicate sweetness of Belle de Brillet pear liqueur. The addition of Viognier white wine adds a subtle floral complexity, while a touch of saline solution and vanilla sugar syrup elevate its character, making it both refreshing and intriguing.

ingredients.name: Saline solution (20g sea salt to 80g water) or merest pinch of sea salt

cocktail_specs.name: Rocky Left Bank
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail that marries the crisp acidity of Chablis with the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur, all built on a base of London Dry Gin. This drink is a nod to the refined tastes of the Left Bank region in France, offering a harmonious blend of citrus, green apple, and delicate floral notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Hi Life Spritz
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Spritz, the Hi Life Spritz combines the crisp acidity of Chablis with the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur and the botanical depth of London Dry Gin. It's a refreshing yet complex cocktail that bridges the gap between wine and spirits, perfect for warm-weather sipping.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist, edible flower (e.g., pansy or borage)

cocktail_specs.name: London Calling
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that captures the essence of London's spirit, this drink is a masterful blend of overproof gin, fino sherry, and citrus. It was inspired by the city's rich history and its love for strong, characterful libations, offering a perfect balance of sweet, sour, and aromatic notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Rebujito
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and vibrant Spanish cocktail, the Rebujito is a modern twist on the classic Sherry Cobbler. It combines the bright acidity of lemon and lime with the nutty sweetness of fino or manzanilla sherry, balanced by a touch of rich syrup. Traditionally served over ice with soda, it's a staple in Andalusian bars and a perfect representation of Spanish aperitivo culture.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist, lime wheel, mint sprig

cocktail_specs.name: Fino Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant variation of the classic Fizz, the Fino Collins replaces traditional gin with light sherry (fino or manzanilla), offering a delicate balance of nutty, almond-like flavors from the sherry, bright citrus acidity, and a touch of floral or fruity liqueur. This cocktail is a sophisticated aperitivo, often enjoyed in Spain during warm afternoons.

cocktail_specs.name: Celebrate
cocktail_specs.description: A luxurious and effervescent cocktail, the Celebrate is a harmonious blend of pear brandy's floral sweetness, fino sherry's nutty depth, reposado tequila's smooth agave notes, and cinnamon syrup's warm spice. It's crowned with dry champagne for a celebratory fizz that balances richness and brightness.
cocktail_specs.garnish: fresh pear slice and a cinnamon quill

cocktail_specs.name: La Perla
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, La Perla is a harmonious marriage of reposado tequila's caramel notes, light sherry's nutty depth, and pear liqueur's fruity sweetness. This classic drink from the 1930s embodies the art of balance, offering a smooth yet complex profile that transitions beautifully from the palate.

cocktail_specs.name: La Valencia
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, La Valencia harmonizes the smoky depth of rye whiskey with the nutty brightness of manzanilla sherry and the herbal complexity of Chartreuse. It's a refined tribute to the flavors of Valencia, Spain, where sweet and savory elements dance in perfect balance.

cocktail_specs.name: Daisy Chain
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing cocktail, the Daisy Chain combines the nutty depth of light sherry with the floral elegance of St-Germain, balanced by the herbal bitterness of Suze. Its effervescent finish and delicate citrus notes make it a standout among modern classics.

cocktail_specs.name: Normandie Club Martini #1
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced martini from the Normandie Club, this drink harmonizes the smoothness of infused vodka with the nutty depth of fino sherry and a touch of honey syrup. It’s a refined aperitivo that leans into the elegance of classic martinis while adding a subtle sweetness.

cocktail_specs.name: Nurse Hazel
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Nurse Hazel is a harmonious blend of oolong-infused vodka's delicate floral notes, fino sherry's nutty depth, blanc vermouth's herbal brightness, and Cointeau's citrusy sweetness. It was created by bartender Jeff Berry in 2013 as part of his 'Nurse' series, paying homage to the intricate flavors found in nursing a cold.

cocktail_specs.name: London Calling
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that pays homage to the resilience of London, this drink combines navy-strength gin with fino sherry for a rich, salty depth, balanced by bright lemon juice and a touch of sweetness. Its name evokes the spirit of punk rebellion, much like the eponymous Clash album.

cocktail_specs.name: Rebujito
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and vibrant Spanish cocktail from Andalusia, the Rebujito is a bright, effervescent blend of fino sherry, citrus juices, and mint. Traditionally served as a summer drink, it balances the dry, nutty notes of sherry with zesty lemon and lime, topped with soda for a light, bubbly finish.

ingredients.name: fino or manzanilla sherry (or amontillado or oloroso)

cocktail_specs.name: Jabberwocky
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail inspired by the whimsical language of Lewis Carroll's 'Jabberwocky.' This drink harmonizes the bright, citrus-forward profile of gin with the nutty depth of manzanilla sherry and the herbal complexity of blanc vermouth or Lillet Blanc. A dash of orange bitters adds a subtle, aromatic finish that evokes both sweetness and bitterness.

cocktail_specs.name: Funky Banana
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical yet funky twist on a classic, this cocktail marries the vibrant sweetness of banana liqueur with the zesty acidity of Sauvignon Blanc and the bold, unaged character of Jamaican rum. The addition of cachaça adds a subtle, earthy complexity that balances the richness of the banana, making it a refreshing yet sophisticated choice for warm weather.

cocktail_specs.name: Kir Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Kir, this cocktail replaces traditional white wine with a delicate Bourgogne Aligoté, layered with the rich, jammy depth of blackcurrant liqueur and a whisper of Pisco for a sophisticated balance of sweet, tart, and herbal notes. Originating from Burgundy, France, it’s a celebration of elegance and simplicity.

ingredients.name: Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne

cocktail_specs.name: Intercooler
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that blends the earthy, herbal notes of sage gin with the crisp acidity of Sauvignon blanc wine. The addition of Genepi Grand Tetras introduces a complex Alpine floral and piney character, while Difford's Daiquiri Bitters add depth and intrigue.

cocktail_specs.name: 45/15 gin/amaro (sage)
cocktail_specs.description: A harmonious blend of crisp, botanical London dry gin and earthy sage amaro, this cocktail offers a sophisticated balance of herbal complexity and juniper brightness. Its simplicity belies its depth, making it a versatile choice for both sipping and mixing.

cocktail_specs.name: Persuader
cocktail_specs.description: A luxurious and complex cocktail with roots in colonial-era Cuba, the Persuader blends rich Havana Club Añejo rum with crisp Chablis white wine, creating a harmonious balance of caramelized oak, citrus, and subtle vanilla notes. Its name reflects its persuasive charm, often served as a sophisticated aperitif or digestif.

ingredients.name: Havana Club Añejo 7 Años Cuban Rum

cocktail_specs.name: Chip Err O
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent twist on the classic Chipper, this cocktail replaces gin with O/Purist Tsipouro, a Greek spirit distilled from grapes. The bright acidity of Sauvignon blanc wine and the subtle bitterness of Tsipouro create a harmonious balance, while rich sugar syrup and soda water add a touch of sweetness and effervescence.

cocktail_specs.name: Chatham Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and effervescent cocktail with a harmonious blend of citrus, herbal, and sweet notes. Originating from the Chatham Bars in New York, this drink is known for its refined balance of Lillet Blanc's floral complexity, Grand Marnier's orange liqueur richness, and a touch of sparkling wine for a light, bubbly finish.

cocktail_specs.name: Russian Spring Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Russian-inspired cocktail that blends the botanical brightness of Monopolowa gin with the tropical warmth of Cuban rum. It's a lively, citrus-forward punch that balances sweetness and effervescence, perfect for spring celebrations or brunch gatherings.

cocktail_specs.name: French 75
cocktail_specs.description: A sparkling, effervescent classic that bridges the gap between a Sidecar and a Champagne Cocktail. Born in Paris during the 1920s, this cocktail is a celebration of lightness and elegance, with a harmonious blend of citrus, sweetness, and crisp champagne.

cocktail_specs.name: Cucumber Queen
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and effervescent twist on the classic Cucumber Martini, this cocktail combines crisp white rum with the delicate floral notes of elderflower liqueur and the bright acidity of lime juice. The addition of cucumber bitters adds a subtle herbal complexity, while sparkling wine brings a lively, celebratory finish, making it an ideal choice for summer gatherings or as a refreshing aperitif.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Cuban
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Cuban classic, the Old Cuban is a sparkling twist on the traditional Daiquiri. Born in Havana's grand hotels during the early 20th century, it balances rich aged rum with effervescent wine, elderflower liqueur, and a touch of bitters, creating a harmonious blend of sweet, tart, and floral notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Ti Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A deceptively simple yet profound French Polynesian classic, the Ti Punch is a harmonious blend of unaged rhum, lime juice, and demerara syrup, served in a coconut shell or glass. Its name means 'your punch,' reflecting its universal appeal as a refreshing and invigorating drink, often enjoyed with a lime leaf garnish for an aromatic finish.

cocktail_specs.name: Oaxaca Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail blends the smoky depth of mezcal with the smoothness of reposado tequila. The addition of agave syrup and grapefruit bitters introduces a bright, citrusy contrast, making it a complex yet approachable drink that celebrates Oaxaca's rich mezcal tradition.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Caribbean Sazerac
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic Sazerac, this Caribbean variation replaces whiskey with a potent blend of light rums, overproof rum, and a touch of falernum for depth. It delivers a rich, spiced profile with a lingering sweetness and citrusy bite, perfect for those who crave both tradition and tropical flair.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist, lemon peel, and a Luxardo cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, complex twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this rum-based variation layers deep caramel and spice from aged rum with the bright, peppery punch of overproof white rum. Falernum adds a tropical depth, while Ango bitters introduce a subtle herbal complexity, making it a sophisticated yet approachable spirit-forward cocktail.

cocktail_specs.name: Blackbird
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Blackbird is a masterful blend of aged rum's deep caramel and spice notes with the aromatic richness of Angostura bitters. It balances sweet pineapple syrup and tart lime juice, creating a harmony that is both refreshing and deeply satisfying.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a pineapple leaf

cocktail_specs.name: Shiro no Tori
cocktail_specs.description: A modern Japanese twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, the Shiro no Tori replaces traditional amaro with Suze, a Japanese citrus liqueur, adding a unique, slightly bitter-sweet depth. Its name translates to 'White Crane,' evoking elegance and balance.

cocktail_specs.name: Passion Bird
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tropical twist on the classic Aperol Spritz, the Passion Bird combines the bright acidity of passion fruit with the effervescent charm of white rum. Its name reflects its dual nature—passionate in flavor and effortlessly bird-like in its light, airy texture.
cocktail_specs.garnish: passion fruit pulp and lime wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Difford's Spec
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, Difford's Spec is a masterful blend of blackstrap rum's deep molasses notes with Campari's bitter herbal complexity. Balanced by pineapple juice's tropical sweetness and lime's bright acidity, it offers a sophisticated yet approachable profile that bridges the gap between classic and modern tiki styles.

cocktail_specs.name: Reiti Spec
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and vibrant twist on the classic Reiti, this version incorporates Campari for a bitter, herbal depth that contrasts beautifully with the sweet pineapple juice. It's a refreshing yet complex cocktail that balances tropical fruitiness with an unexpected amaro bite.

cocktail_specs.name: Bajan Jungle Bird
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail that blends the rich, molasses-forward notes of Plantation 5 rum with the artichoke bitterness of Suze, brightened by passion fruit purée and lime juice. Originating from Barbados, this drink is a celebration of tropical flavors with a touch of herbal depth.
cocktail_specs.garnish: passion fruit berry and lime wheel

cocktail_specs.name: White Bird
cocktail_specs.description: A tiki classic with a tropical yet sophisticated profile, the White Bird harmonizes the smoky depth of arrack, the herbal bitterness of Suze, and the sweet-tart brightness of pineapple syrup and lime juice. Originating from the 1950s, it’s a nostalgic nod to vintage tiki culture with a refined balance that transcends its origins.

cocktail_specs.name: Zentralfriedhof
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly macabre twist on the classic White Lady, this cocktail blends the elegance of Lillet Blanc with the boldness of Bombay gin. Named after Vienna's Central Cemetery, it balances sweet, tart, and herbal notes for a drink that is both refined and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist and a single black olive on a skewer

cocktail_specs.name: Tritter Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Tom Collins, the Tritter Collins replaces traditional orange bitters with Mata Hari and adds a touch of pink grapefruit for a modern, floral-fruity profile. It’s a lively, effervescent drink that balances sweetness, tartness, and herbal complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Grapefruit Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Tom Collins, this cocktail replaces traditional orange juice with pink grapefruit for a bright, citrus-forward profile. Its effervescent texture and balanced sweetness make it a perfect summer sipper.

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and elegant cocktail, the Tom Collins is a quintessential example of the highball style. Born in London during the 19th century, it combines Old Tom Gin's sweet, malty profile with bright lemon juice and effervescent soda water, creating a harmonious balance of sweetness, acidity, and effervescence.

cocktail_specs.name: Elderflower Gin Fizz
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent cocktail that harmonizes the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur with the botanical complexity of London dry gin. The addition of lemon juice brightens the drink, while soda water adds a light, bubbly finish, making it a perfect spring or summer sipper.

cocktail_specs.name: Ross Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and slightly boozy twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, the Ross Collins replaces bourbon with rye whiskey for a more robust, spiced character. Named after Ross Collins of the Ross & Co. distillery, this cocktail balances tart lemon, sweet simple syrup, and aromatic bitters over a generous splash of club soda.

cocktail_specs.name: Shark's Tooth No.1
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and refreshing Tiki-style cocktail, Shark's Tooth No.1 is a vibrant blend of Jamaican white overproof rum, citrus juices, and rich syrup, balanced with grenadine for a touch of sweetness. It’s a nod to the adventurous spirit of Tiki culture, with a sharp, tangy profile that’s both invigorating and slightly sweet.

cocktail_specs.name: Bermondsey Minute
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail born in London's Bermondsey district, the Minute is a modern twist on the classic Americano. It harmonizes tequila's oakiness with the herbal depth of amaro vermouth, brightened by maraschino and hibiscus liqueurs, creating a drink that is both refreshing and intricately layered.

cocktail_specs.name: New York Minute
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, spirit-forward cocktail that bursts with cherry, citrus, and herbal notes, the New York Minute is a modern twist on classic American flavors. Created in the early 2000s, it balances sweet, bitter, and umami elements, making it a standout choice for those who love bold, layered cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Jungle Bird
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, spirit-forward tiki classic that marries the deep caramel and molasses notes of dark rum with the bold bitterness of Campari. Its tropical sweetness from pineapple juice balances the complexity, making it a refreshing yet sophisticated choice for warm weather.

cocktail_specs.name: Dead Man's Handle
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and bittersweet twist on the classic Death in the Afternoon, this cocktail replaces champagne with tequila blanco for a spicy, agave-forward kick. Its name comes from the nautical term for a rope used to raise or lower a sail, symbolizing its ability to lift your spirits while keeping you grounded.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a sprinkle of Tajín

cocktail_specs.name: Bajan Ti Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Caribbean classic, the Bajan Ti Punch is a bright, citrus-forward cocktail that balances the tropical sweetness of passion fruit with the zesty tang of lime. Originating from Barbados, it's a staple in tiki culture, often enjoyed as an aperitif or a light, invigorating drink.
cocktail_specs.garnish: passion fruit leaf or lime wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Wisconsin Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A regional twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail replaces traditional bitters and orange juice with maraschino liqueur and a touch of lemon-lime soda, adding a fruity, slightly effervescent contrast to the rich cognac. Originating in Wisconsin, it reflects the state's love for bold flavors and local ingredients.

cocktail_specs.name: Absinthe Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail replaces whiskey with absinthe, creating a deeply herbal, anise-forward profile. The addition of elderflower liqueur and rich syrup adds a floral sweetness, while Peychaud's bitters introduce a subtle spice note. It’s a drink that balances the earthy, green intensity of absinthe with delicate, aromatic layers.
cocktail_specs.garnish: luxardo maraschino cherry and orange twist

cocktail_specs.name: classic sazerac
cocktail_specs.description: A New Orleans classic, the Sazerac is a sophisticated blend of rye whiskey, cognac, and aromatic bitters, balanced with demerara syrup. It was one of the first cocktails to gain widespread popularity in the United States, dating back to the mid-19th century.

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Whiskey Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and aromatic twist on the classic Whiskey Cocktail, this drink balances bourbon's rich, oaky notes with the floral complexity of absinthe and the sweet-tart essence of maraschino. Its name hints at its evolution from the original Whiskey Cocktail, which was popularized in the late 19th century by Jerry Thomas.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned (Gin)
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this gin-based version replaces bourbon with old tom gin or genever, delivering a smoother, more herbal profile. It balances sweetness from rich syrup with bright citrus notes and aromatic bitters, offering a sophisticated yet approachable spirit-forward experience.

cocktail_specs.name: Original Sazerac
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary New Orleans classic, the Original Sazerac is a sophisticated blend of cognac, demerara syrup, and aromatic bitters, served over absinthe in a chilled coupe. It traces its origins to the 19th century at the Sazerac House, where it was first crafted with rye whiskey before transitioning to cognac.

cocktail_specs.name: Pop Quiz
cocktail_specs.description: A playful yet sophisticated cocktail, the Pop Quiz combines bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes with the herbal complexity of amaro. A touch of simple syrup and chocolate bitters adds depth, making it a delightful surprise for those who dare to take the quiz.
cocktail_specs.garnish: dusting of cocoa powder or a chocolate shaving

cocktail_specs.name: Snowbird
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Snowbird is a harmonious blend of rye whisky's spice, cognac's richness, and elderflower liqueur's floral sweetness. Created by Dale DeGroff in the early 1980s, it's known for its layered complexity and refreshing balance, often considered a precursor to modern craft cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Corn 'n Oil
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, velvety tiki classic that marries the caramel and spice of gold rum with the molasses depth of falernum, creating a luscious, almost dessert-like experience. This cocktail is a staple in tiki culture, often served as a sipping drink to complement hearty dishes.
cocktail_specs.garnish: flamed orange peel or a sprinkle of nutmeg

cocktail_specs.name: old fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Old Fashioned is a harmonious marriage of rye whisky's spicy warmth and Angostura bitters' aromatic depth, sweetened just enough to balance its robust character. Born in the early 19th century, it remains a symbol of sophistication and simplicity.

cocktail_specs.name: Smoked Maple Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail blends the smoky depth of peated Scotch with the rich sweetness of maple syrup and bourbon. The addition of walnut bitters adds a subtle nutty complexity, making it a perfect autumnal sipper.

cocktail_specs.name: cold girl fever
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, spirit-forward twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail balances rich, peated Scotch with floral honey and citrus notes. Its name plays on the 'Cold Girl' trend, offering a bold yet approachable sip for those who embrace complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and invigorating cocktail, Punch is a celebration of citrus brightness and aromatic depth. Originating from the Caribbean, this drink typically combines rum with citrus juices, sweet syrups, and bitters, creating a refreshing yet complex profile that balances tartness, sweetness, and herbal notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Hi-Falutin' Riff
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and spirit-forward cocktail that blends the warmth of bourbon with the herbal complexity of Campari and the velvety richness of Lillet Rouge. This drink is a modern take on classic elements, offering a harmonious balance of sweet, bitter, and aromatic notes, perfect for those who appreciate depth and refinement in their cocktails.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist or a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Eastern Europe Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic twist on the classic Mai Tai, this version replaces traditional rum with slivo and ouzo/raki, delivering a rich blend of peach, almond, citrus, and anise. It’s a refreshing yet complex cocktail that bridges Eastern European flavors with tiki traditions.

cocktail_specs.name: Riff on Rumba
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Rumba, this cocktail replaces rum with gin for a brighter, more floral profile. It balances tart lime, sweet grenadine, and a touch of sloe liqueur, offering a refreshing yet sophisticated sip that plays with traditional Tiki flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Riff on Comte de Sureau
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Comte de Sureau, this cocktail replaces traditional elderflower liqueur with St. Germain, creating a lighter, more floral profile while retaining its bittersweet balance. The addition of Suze adds a subtle artichoke depth, making it a sophisticated yet approachable choice for gin lovers.

cocktail_specs.name: white negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the Negroni, this version replaces sweet vermouth with blanc vermouth and adds Suze for a lighter, more refreshing profile. It retains the bitterness and complexity of its classic counterpart while offering a brighter, citrus-forward experience.

cocktail_specs.name: Gipsy #1
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and aromatic tiki classic, Gipsy #1 blends the floral elegance of St-Germain with the botanical depth of gin and Chartreuse. Its balanced bitterness and citrus brightness make it a sophisticated yet approachable cocktail, perfect for sipping or savoring.

cocktail_specs.name: White Lady
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and elegant cocktail, the White Lady is a sophisticated blend of gin's botanical complexity, citrus brightness, and sweet orange liqueur. Created in the 1920s during the Prohibition era, it was one of the first 'white' cocktails to gain popularity, often served as an aperitif or a light dinner drink.

cocktail_specs.name: HHH
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the HHH is a harmonious blend of gin liqueur's botanical depth, bright lemon juice, and aromatic herbal bitters. Its layered flavors—sweet, tart, and subtly bitter—make it a versatile choice for both classic sipping and modern twists.

cocktail_specs.name: XD
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail, the XD is a modern twist on classic elements, blending gin liqueur, overproof rum, blanc vermouth, and amaro. Its rich, spirit-forward profile offers layers of sweetness, bitterness, and herbal notes, making it a standout for those who appreciate intricate flavor balances.

cocktail_specs.name: Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and versatile cocktail, the Sour is a harmonious blend of tart citrus, sweetness, and spirit. Originating in the late 19th century, it has evolved into countless variations but remains a staple for its refreshing balance of acidity and richness.

cocktail_specs.name: Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Mexican classic, the Margarita is a harmonious blend of citrus brightness, herbal complexity, and a touch of sweetness. Born in the 1930s or 40s, it became an icon of tequila culture and remains a staple for its refreshing yet sophisticated balance.

cocktail_specs.name: Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this version replaces gin with plum eau de vie for a richer, fruitier depth while maintaining its signature bitter-sweet balance. The grapefruit bitters add a bright, citrusy contrast to the herbal vermouth and Campari-like amaro.

cocktail_specs.name: awkwardly tongue tied
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, spirit-forward cocktail that balances the bright acidity of lime and pineapple with the herbal depth of Fernet-Branca. It's a playful yet sophisticated drink, perfect for those who appreciate complexity in their cocktails.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a sprinkle of cinnamon

cocktail_specs.name: Original
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and aromatic cocktail that blends the robustness of Boker's bitters with tropical and spiced elements. It features a unique almond milk syrup and a touch of fernet, creating a layered experience that balances sweetness, acidity, and herbal depth.

ingredients.name: winterspice syrup (2:1 vol sugar : Johannisbeer + 1x cinnamon, 2x star anise, 4x cardamom)
almond milk syrup (250g almonds + 400g water, blended and strained)

notes: good, try again with a better gin

cocktail_specs.name: Watermelon Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Margarita, this cocktail replaces traditional citrus with luscious watermelon juice, creating a sweet yet balanced profile. The addition of Cointreau adds depth, while lime juice brings a bright acidity that cuts through the fruit's natural sweetness.

cocktail_specs.name: Watermelon Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Margarita, this cocktail replaces traditional citrus with sweet, juicy watermelon. It balances ripe fruit flavors with the smoky depth of Blanco Tequila, creating a summery yet sophisticated drink that's both approachable and complex.

cocktail_specs.name: Cocoanut Grove
cocktail_specs.description: A lush, tropical tiki classic with a creamy coconut base and vibrant citrus notes, balanced by the depth of Cuban rums. This cocktail is a nod to the exotic groves of Polynesia, offering a rich, velvety texture that's both indulgent and refreshing.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime shell, maraschino cherry, and pineapple leaf

cocktail_specs.name: Mara-Amu
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Mara-Amu is a symphony of citrus and rum, blending light, gold, and dark rums with passion fruit syrup for a sweet yet balanced profile. It reflects the rich tradition of Puerto Rican and Jamaican rums while incorporating tropical and citrus notes, making it both refreshing and sophisticated.

cocktail_specs.name: Aloha Fassionola
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical twist on the classic Fashionable, this cocktail replaces orange bitters with pampelmousse syrup, creating a bright, citrus-forward drink that balances sweet and tart notes. It’s a refreshing, spirit-driven tiki-style creation perfect for summer sipping.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist and a flamed orange wheel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Scorpion Bowl
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, high-proof rum bowl that combines the bright acidity of citrus juices with the nutty sweetness of orgeat and a complex blend of rums. This drink is known for its bold, fiery character, often served in a large format to share among friends.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange wheel, lemon twist, and a sprinkle of cinnamon or nutmeg

cocktail_specs.name: Skin Diver
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, layered tiki classic that balances sweet citrus, molasses-forward Puerto Rican rum, and a velvety cream texture. Created by Donn Beach in the 1950s, this cocktail is a nod to deep-sea exploration, with its dark, complex flavors mirroring the mysteries of the ocean.

cocktail_specs.name: Watermelon Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing summer cocktail, the Watermelon Martini combines the sweet, juicy essence of watermelon with the crisp acidity of lime juice. The addition of vodka or limoncello/orange liqueur adds a smooth, citrus-forward depth that balances the fruit's natural sweetness.

cocktail_specs.name: Watermelon Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, refreshing twist on the classic martini, this cocktail combines the sweet, juicy essence of watermelon with the crisp citrus notes of Absolut Citron and Cointreau. It's a summer staple that balances fruitiness with a subtle herbal bite from the lime juice.

cocktail_specs.name: Melon Stand
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Melon Ball, this cocktail balances the crisp sweetness of watermelon juice with the botanical depth of Plymouth Gin. A touch of Aperol adds a subtle bitterness, while lemon juice brightens the profile, making it a perfect summer sipper.

cocktail_specs.name: Bombay Original
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Bombay Sling, this cocktail replaces ginger beer with watermelon juice, creating a bright, fruity, and slightly bitter profile. It balances the botanical complexity of London Dry gin with the sweetness of watermelon and Aperol, offering a modern yet approachable take on a timeless drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Grand White Lady
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary, sophisticated cocktail born in the 1920s during the Prohibition era, the Grand White Lady is a harmonious marriage of dry gin's botanical depth, Grand Marnier's orange liqueur richness, and almond orgeat's nutty sweetness. Its name reflects its elegance and the era it emerged from, often garnished with a lemon twist to brighten its complex profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Russian Spring Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic White Russian, this cocktail combines the smoothness of vodka with the deep, luscious flavor of blackcurrant liqueur. It's a perfect spring or summer drink, balancing sweet, tart, and effervescent notes in every sip.

cocktail_specs.name: Monopolowa
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Polish cocktail, the Monopolowa is a sparkling blend of vodka, blackcurrant liqueur, lemon juice, and sugar syrup, topped with crisp sparkling wine. It’s a modern twist on the classic Kir Royale, balancing sweet, tart, and effervescent elements for a lively aperitivo or brunch drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Passoa
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Brazilian cocktail, the Passoa is a modern twist on the classic Kir Royale. It combines the deep, luscious flavor of blackcurrant with the crisp acidity of lemon and sparkling wine, creating a harmonious balance that is both sweet and tart.

cocktail_specs.name: French 75
cocktail_specs.description: A sparkling, effervescent classic that marries the crisp acidity of Champagne with the botanical complexity of gin. Born in Parisian cafés during World War I, it was a favorite among American expats and has since become a symbol of elegance and sophistication.

cocktail_specs.name: Monkey 47
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and effervescent cocktail from the Monkey Bar in London, the Monkey 47 is a refreshing blend of tart lemon juice, sweet simple syrup, and crisp Henkell Trocken sparkling wine. It’s a modern take on the classic French 47, with a bright citrus profile that makes it perfect for warm weather.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical storm of flavors, the Hurricane is a classic tiki cocktail that balances rich rum with tangy mango and lemon. Originating in the 1950s at Don the Beachcomber's Tiki Room, it’s a refreshing yet potent drink, often served in a hurricane glass to match its bold character.

cocktail_specs.name: Saturn
cocktail_specs.description: A celestial cocktail with a harmonious blend of bright citrus, nutty orgeat, and the exotic depth of falernum. This drink is a modern twist on classic tiki flavors, offering a perfect balance of sweet, tart, and herbal notes that evoke the complexity of tropical landscapes.

cocktail_specs.name: Marigny
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic French cocktail, the Marigny is a harmonious marriage of cognac's oakiness, Calvados' apple brightness, and Chartreuse's herbal complexity. It was created in the early 20th century at the Hotel Marigny in Paris, embodying the elegance of classic French mixology.

cocktail_specs.name: Bum Leg
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, complex tiki cocktail with a smoky depth and tropical sweetness. The Bum Leg blends aged dark rum with overproof Cuban rum, Oloroso sherry, and coconut milk for a velvety texture, balanced by lime juice and demerara syrup.

cocktail_specs.name: Legend
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Legend harmonizes the rich, oaky depth of cognac with the molasses-forward complexity of Appleton Estate 15, balanced by the nutty, oxidative character of amontillado sherry. A touch of Nonino amaro adds herbal brightness, while aromatic bitters and demerara syrup provide a subtle sweetness and depth, making it a versatile spirit-forward creation perfect for sipping.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist or a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered tiki-style cocktail, the 5* is a harmonious blend of Asbach uigen, Appleton Estate rum, Sandeman sherry, Montenegro amaro, and a touch of demerara syrup. It balances sweet, bitter, herbal, and fruity notes with a rich, velvety texture, making it a standout in the world of tiki drinks.
cocktail_specs.garnish: flamed orange peel or lemon twist

cocktail_specs.name: Night Watch
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, complex cocktail inspired by the Dutch tradition of the 'Night Watch,' this drink layers old tom gin's spice and sweetness with the deep caramel and molasses notes of black rum and oloroso sherry. A dash of Angostura bitters adds depth, making it a sophisticated yet approachable spirit-forward creation.

A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the 5* combines two distinct gins—Tanqueray and English Harbor—with a rich Amontillado sherry and a hint of blackcurrant and spice syrup. This drink is a modern twist on classic elements, offering layers of citrus, nutty sherry, and subtle winterspice notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Traction
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail that marries the nutty depth of Amontadillo Sherry with the rich, molasses-forward character of Solera-aged rum. Grand Marnier adds a bright orange blossom sweetness, while lemon juice introduces a sharp citrus contrast, creating a drink that is both complex and approachable.

cocktail_specs.name: Paddington
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet cocktail inspired by the beloved character from Paddington Bear, this drink harmonizes light rum with Lillet Blanc, citrus juices, and orange marmalade syrup. Its name is a nod to the classic children's stories, but its refined balance of floral, citrus, and molasses notes makes it a delightful choice for any occasion.
notes: if a bit cloying - maybe even water down?

cocktail_specs.name: Unusual Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this version replaces Campari and sweet vermouth with Lillet Blanc and Aperol, offering a smoother, more aromatic profile with hints of citrus and herbal complexity. It retains the balance and intensity of its predecessor while introducing a refined elegance.

cocktail_specs.name: Daiquiri Sasha
cocktail_specs.description: A refined evolution of the classic Daiquiri, the Sasha introduces a touch of complexity with its balanced sweetness and bright citrus notes. This version is often attributed to a modern reinterpretation that enhances the rum's character while maintaining the cocktail's signature simplicity.

cocktail_specs.name: Rauch Lime
cocktail_specs.description: A smoky, citrus-forward twist on a classic limeade, the Rauch Lime combines Bacardi's smooth heritage rum with the deep, charred notes of Rauch gin (though traditionally served without it). This drink bridges the gap between refreshing and complex, offering a balance of sweetness, acidity, and a subtle smokiness that lingers on the palate.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a pinch of smoked salt

cocktail_specs.name: Nouveau Carre
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Carré, this cocktail replaces Cognac with aged tequila, infusing it with rich caramel and spice notes. The addition of Lillet Blanc and Benedictine adds depth, while Peychaud's Bitters provide a subtle aromatic complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Olmeca Reposado
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that blends the floral, nutty complexity of Lillet Blanc with the herbal depth of Benedictine and a whisper of spicy bitterness from Peychaud's. This drink is a modern take on classic French and American influences, offering a smooth yet intricately layered profile perfect for sipping.

cocktail_specs.name: Artist's Special
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Artist's Special combines the rich, caramel notes of Irish whiskey with the nutty depth of Oloroso sherry. A touch of lemon juice brightens the mix, while redcurrant syrup adds a subtle fruity sweetness, making it both complex and approachable.

cocktail_specs.name: Bushmills Black Bush
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail that marries the rich, smoky depth of Irish whiskey with the nutty, oxidative character of Oloroso sherry. The addition of rauch lemon juice introduces a subtle, woody citrus note, while Crème de Cassis adds a lush blackcurrant sweetness, creating a harmonious balance of flavors that is both bold and refined.

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical masterpiece born in the Tiki era, the Mai Tai is a symphony of citrus, nutty sweetness, and rum's rich complexity. It was popularized by Donn Beach at his Trader Vic's restaurants, though its exact origins are debated—some credit it to Victor Bergeron or Harry MacElhone.
notes: maybe if i didnt have the spiced rum i would increase the orgeat a bit

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Mai Tai is a symphony of tropical flavors—bright citrus, nutty almond, and rich caramel notes—balanced by the bold presence of Cuban rum. Originating in the 1940s at Trader Vic's, it’s often crowned with a flamed lime shell for dramatic flair.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime shell (flamed), mint sprig, and a pineapple wedge
notes: maybe if i didnt have the spiced rum i would increase the orgeat a bit

cocktail_specs.name: Four W Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Daiquiri, this variation replaces lime with pink grapefruit juice, adding a bright, citrusy complexity. It balances sweet maple syrup and aromatic Angostura bitters for a refined yet approachable profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Cuban classic, the Daiquiri is a refreshing blend of rum, lime juice, and sweetener, traditionally shaken to perfection. This modern variation replaces the classic lime with raspberry and maple syrups, adding a fruity depth while maintaining its bright, citrusy spirit.

cocktail_specs.name: LLB
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and versatile cocktail, the LLB (Lemon Lime Bitters) is a bright, citrus-forward drink that balances sweetness with aromatic bitters. It's a staple in tiki culture but has roots as a simple, no-frills mixer, often served over ice for a light yet complex sip.

cocktail_specs.name: Zentralfriedhof
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail inspired by the eerie beauty of Vienna's Zentralfriedhof cemetery, this drink balances sweet, tart, herbal, and anise notes with a touch of absinthe's emerald green essence. It was created to evoke the contrast between life and death, blending bright citrus and floral Lillet Blanc with the depth of London dry gin.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist, absinthe rinse on glass rim

cocktail_specs.name: Watermelon Paloma
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Paloma, this cocktail combines the sweet, juicy essence of watermelon with the bright, bitter tang of grapefruit. It's a perfect summer sipper, balancing the agave nectar's smooth sweetness with the crisp acidity of lime.

cocktail_specs.name: Watermelon Paloma
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Paloma, this cocktail blends the sweet juiciness of watermelon with the bright citrus notes of grapefruit and lime. It's a modern take on a traditional Mexican favorite, offering a perfect balance of fruity sweetness and herbal agave depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Monte Whiskey Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, this cocktail replaces traditional sour mix with a rich amaro, adding layers of herbal bitterness and complexity. It balances the sweetness of bourbon whiskey with the citrusy tang of lemon juice and the depth of Montenegro amaro, creating a sophisticated yet approachable drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic sour, the Averna Sour combines bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes with the herbal complexity of Averna amaro. This variation replaces traditional lemon juice with a touch of Angostura bitters for depth, creating a sophisticated, slightly bitter-sweet profile that bridges old-world amaro traditions and new-school sour craftsmanship.

cocktail_specs.name: Creole Cocktail Riff
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic twist on the classic Manhattan, this Creole-inspired cocktail replaces sweet vermouth with herbal vermouth, adding a distinct depth of flavor. It’s a spirit-forward, bittersweet sipper that balances whiskey’s oakiness with vermouth’s herbal complexity, often garnished with a Luxardo cherry for a touch of sweetness and color.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna w/ Beer
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and bitter twist on the classic Aperol Spritz, this cocktail replaces the Aperol with Campari, creating a more intense, herbal-forward drink. It's often served with beer to balance its bitterness, making it a perfect choice for those who enjoy complex, layered flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Okhotnichy Riff
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic twist on the classic Manhattan, this cocktail replaces rye whiskey with a robust bourbon and adds a touch of Campari amaro for depth. It's a spirit-forward, slightly bitter sipper that bridges the gap between American classics and Italian aperitivo traditions.

cocktail_specs.name: De La Louisiane #3
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail from the De La Louisiane series, this drink harmonizes bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes with the herbal complexity of vermouth. A touch of Angostura bitters adds depth, making it a refined choice for those who appreciate spirit-forward cocktails with a touch of sophistication.

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Vermouth Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and aromatic aperitivo, the Improved Vermouth Cocktail is a harmonious blend of sweet vermouth, Campari, and Angostura bitters. It offers a complex interplay of herbal, bitter, and slightly sweet notes, making it a sophisticated choice for those who appreciate depth in their cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Alternative Set
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that blends the botanical depth of gin with the rich caramel and spice notes of bourbon/rye, balanced by the herbal sweetness of vermouth and the aromatic bitterness of amaro. This drink is a modern twist on classic elements, offering a layered experience that is both refreshing and sophisticated.

cocktail_specs.name: Don't Give Up The Riff
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and aromatic cocktail inspired by the spirit of rock 'n' roll, this drink layers London dry gin with vermouth, Angostura bitters, and Campari for a bold, bitter-sweet profile. It's a modern twist on classic elements, designed to be both invigorating and deeply satisfying.

cocktail_specs.name: Corpse Reviver #2 riff
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex revival of the classic Corpse Reviver #2, this riff replaces absinthe with Campari for a deeper, more aromatic profile. It balances gin's botanicals, vermouth's herbal sweetness, lemon's bright acidity, and Angostura bitters' warmth, creating a sophisticated, spirit-forward elixir that's both invigorating and deeply satisfying.

cocktail_specs.name: Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless, elegant cocktail with a crisp, clean profile that highlights the botanical notes of gin and the subtle herbal complexity of vermouth. Originating in the late 19th century, it became synonymous with sophistication, especially during the Prohibition era when it was often served with an olive or lemon twist.

cocktail_specs.name: Caprice
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Caprice is a harmonious blend of London dry gin's juniper-forward profile, Benedictine's spiced complexity, and dry vermouth's herbal elegance. Created in the early 20th century, it embodies the refined artistry of classic mixology with a touch of bittersweet intrigue.

cocktail_specs.name: Bonapartes Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Manhattan, this cocktail replaces sweet vermouth with dry vermouth and adds a touch of Campari for depth. It was reportedly created by Napoleon Bonaparte himself during his exile, though its exact origins remain debated.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Old Fashioned is a spirit-forward cocktail that balances the rich caramel and oak notes of whiskey with the sweetness of sugar syrup. It dates back to the early 19th century and is often considered one of the first true cocktails, embodying simplicity and sophistication.

cocktail_specs.name: Yamabuki / Drifter
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Yamabuki (or 'Drifter') combines the rich, oaky depth of bourbon with the herbal complexity of vermouth and a touch of Campari's bitterness. This drink, often associated with Japanese-inspired cocktails, balances warmth and intrigue, making it a standout for those who appreciate nuanced spirit-forward creations.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist or a single cherry (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Tequila
cocktail_specs.description: This cocktail, despite its name, is a clever blend of tequila and rum, offering a complex interplay of smoky, citrusy, and caramel notes. It challenges traditional expectations by combining the agave-forward brightness of Olmeca Altos with the rich, molasses-like depth of Espolon.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a sprinkle of Tajín
