cocktail_specs.name: Blade Runner
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail inspired by the neon-lit dystopia of 'Blade Runner,' this drink layers rich Jamaican rums with pineapple juice, lime, and a touch of Angostura bitters. Its name evokes the film's iconic aesthetic, blending tropical sweetness with deep, aromatic complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Pineapple Daiquiri alt
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Daiquiri, this version incorporates pineapple juice for a tropical sweetness that complements the rum's depth. It balances rich syrup and lime juice to create a smooth yet refreshing profile, perfect for sipping or pairing with light bites.

cocktail_specs.name: El Draque
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, refreshing Spanish cocktail that pays homage to the pirate El Draque, this drink balances bright lime juice with the herbal depth of angostura bitters. It’s a lighter, more modern take on the classic tiki style, often served chilled and effervescent.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a pinch of sea salt
notes: alt: with ice and less water

cocktail_specs.name: Rum and Coke
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless, spirit-forward cocktail that marries the rich, molasses notes of unaged Jamaican rum with the effervescent sweetness and caramel depth of cola. Often enjoyed as a casual yet sophisticated drink, it’s a staple in tiki culture and beyond, offering a perfect balance of complexity and simplicity.

cocktail_specs.name: Honey Bee
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, honey-kissed twist on the classic Bee's Knees, this cocktail marries rich Jamaican rum with bright citrus and a touch of floral sweetness. Its golden hue and balanced profile make it both refreshing and sophisticated, perfect for sipping on warm days or as an aperitif.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist and a drizzle of honey syrup on the rim (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Grog
cocktail_specs.description: A robust and warming cocktail with a rich history, Grog traces its origins to the British Navy in the early 19th century. Traditionally made with rum, lime juice, sugar, and water, it was originally spiked with grog (a mixture of spirits and water) to prevent scurvy among sailors. This modern version incorporates Angostura bitters for depth, offering a harmonious balance of sweet, sour, and aromatic complexity.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel or twist, optional mint sprig

cocktail_specs.name: Shark's Tooth
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki-style cocktail, the Shark's Tooth blends the rich caramel notes of Myers's rum with the crisp brightness of white rum, pineapple juice, and lime. Its name is said to derive from its sharp, tropical flavor profile that cuts through like a shark's tooth.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Cow
cocktail_specs.description: A creamy, indulgent twist on the classic Rum Punch, the Rum Cow balances rich Jamaican rum with velvety milk and a touch of bitterness. It’s a nostalgic nod to colonial-era drinks, often served as a dessert cocktail or a late-night treat.

cocktail_specs.name: Cuban Piña Colada
cocktail_specs.description: A lush, tropical twist on the classic Piña Colada, this Cuban variation incorporates Myers' rum for depth and a touch of white rum to brighten the blend. It's a creamy, refreshing cocktail that balances sweet pineapple with zesty lime, perfect for sipping in warm weather.

cocktail_specs.name: whiskey sour
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Whiskey Sour is a harmonious blend of smoky whiskey, bright lemon juice, and sweet syrup, often finished with aromatic bitters. It traces its origins to the early 20th century, evolving from simpler variations like the 'Sour Mash' and becoming a staple in cocktail culture.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Old Fashioned is a refined blend of whiskey, bitters, and sugar, often garnished with an orange peel or cherry. It traces its origins to the early 19th century, evolving from a simple mix of whiskey and sugar to include Angostura bitters, which add depth and complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Whiskey Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and straightforward American classic, the Whiskey Highball is a harmonious blend of whiskey's warmth and soda's effervescence. It emerged in the early 20th century as a simple yet elegant way to enjoy bourbon or rye, often garnished with lemon for brightness.

cocktail_specs.name: Roman Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Tom Collins, the Roman Collins replaces gin with whiskey for a deeper, more complex profile. It balances sweet and sour with a touch of effervescence, making it a versatile cocktail that bridges the gap between old-world elegance and modern innovation.

cocktail_specs.name: The Prospector
cocktail_specs.description: A robust and refreshing tiki-style cocktail, The Prospector is a harmonious blend of bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes with bright citrus and sweet syrup. It hails from the golden age of tiki, offering a balanced contrast between tartness and sweetness, often garnished with a flamed orange peel for an added layer of aroma.

cocktail_specs.name: Hawaiian Stone Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Stone Sour, this cocktail balances the smoky depth of bourbon with the bright acidity of pineapple and lemon. It’s a refreshing yet slightly bitter sipper that captures the essence of Hawaiian flavors while maintaining the structure of its tiki predecessors.

cocktail_specs.name: Halekulani
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, sun-kissed cocktail with a rich and syrupy depth, the Halekulani is a staple of Hawaiian hospitality. It balances the warmth of bourbon with the bright acidity of citrus and the sweetness of pineapple, creating a harmonious blend that evokes the spirit of island paradise.

cocktail_specs.name: Scotch
cocktail_specs.description: A classic and versatile spirit, Scotch is a blended whisky that embodies the rich, smoky, and malty essence of Scotland. Whether enjoyed neat or in cocktails, it offers layers of caramel, oak, and peaty notes, reflecting its traditional production methods.

cocktail_specs.name: Hawaiiano
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and slightly sweet rum cocktail that captures the essence of tropical flavors. Created in Cuba, it combines light Cuban rum with a hint of honey or syrup, offering a smooth, balanced sip with subtle floral notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Dark 'n' Stormy
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Dark 'n' Stormy combines rich dark rum with a bold dose of ginger beer for a spicy, effervescent punch. Created in the late 1980s at the Buccaneer Beachcomber Hotel in Bermuda, it’s a perfect balance of sweet, spicy, and citrusy notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin & Tonic (G&T)
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and refreshing classic, the G&T is a harmonious marriage of gin's botanical complexity and tonic water's effervescent bitterness. Originating in British India during the colonial era, it has since become a symbol of sophistication and relaxation.

cocktail_specs.name: Honolulu
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki classic, the Honolulu is a bright blend of citrus and tropical juices, balanced with a touch of gin and a saline finish. It captures the essence of island flavors while maintaining a sophisticated, layered complexity.

ingredients.name: Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

cocktail_specs.name: Bebbo
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, citrus-forward cocktail that balances the bright acidity of fresh lemon and orange juices with the botanical complexity of Hayman's London Dry Gin. Its name, derived from the Italian word for 'drink,' reflects its refreshing yet sophisticated character, making it a versatile choice for both summer sipping and everyday enjoyment.

cocktail_specs.name: Bee's Knees
cocktail_specs.description: A vintage, honey-kissed gin cocktail with a bright citrus punch and a touch of sweetness. Created in the early 20th century, this classic pairs London Dry Gin with lemon juice and rich syrup, offering a harmonious balance of tart, floral, and syrupy notes that evoke the charm of old-world mixology.

cocktail_specs.name: Bee's Knees alt
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Bee's Knees, this version replaces honey with orange juice for a sweeter, more citrus-forward profile. It retains the original's bright acidity and botanical complexity, making it a delightful choice for sunny afternoons.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Flame alt
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and slightly bitter twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail balances the botanical depth of Hayman's London Dry Gin with the sweetness of De Kuyper Triple Sec and Strucchi Rosso Vermouth. The addition of amaro and fresh orange juice brings a bright, citrus-forward complexity that makes it both refreshing and sophisticated.

cocktail_specs.name: Damn-the-Weather
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Damn All, this cocktail replaces the traditional wine with orange juice, creating a bright, citrus-forward profile that balances the herbal notes of vermouth and the botanical complexity of gin. It's a perfect example of how a simple ingredient swap can transform a drink into something entirely new while retaining its spirit.

cocktail_specs.name: Vermont
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Gin Fizz, the Vermont is a harmonious blend of bright citrus notes from freshly squeezed orange and lemon juice, balanced by the botanical complexity of Hayman's London Dry Gin. The addition of rich syrup and Angostura bitters adds depth and a touch of sweetness, making it a perfect summer sipper.

cocktail_specs.name: Harlem
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and vibrant cocktail from the Harlem Cocktail Club, this drink marries the botanical complexity of London Dry Gin with the sweet-tart brightness of pineapple juice and Luxardo Maraschino liqueur. The addition of grapefruit bitters introduces a subtle citrusy bite, making it both refreshing and intricately layered.

cocktail_specs.name: Famous Last Word No 2
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Famous Last Word No 2 is a modern twist on the classic 'Last Word,' replacing maraschino liqueur with Green Chartreuse for an herbal depth. It balances sweet, bitter, and citrus notes, creating a harmonious yet intriguing profile that is both refreshing and spirit-forward.

cocktail_specs.name: pyramid punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and layered Peruvian-inspired punch that marries the bright acidity of pineapple and grapefruit with the floral sweetness of elderflower and the spicy warmth of pimento dram. This cocktail is a modern take on traditional pyramid punches, often served in layered glasses to showcase its dynamic flavors.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist and a pineapple leaf

cocktail_specs.name: Ultima Palabra
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail born in the 1970s, the Ultima Palabra is a harmonious marriage of smoky mezcal, herbal Chartreuse, sweet maraschino, and bright citrus. Its name, meaning 'last word,' reflects its assertive yet balanced character, making it a standout in both tiki and modern cocktail circles.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime shell or cherry for a classic touch

cocktail_specs.name: Charteuse Swizzle
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail that harmonizes the herbal, slightly medicinal notes of Green Chartreuse with the sweet, tropical richness of pineapple juice and lime. This drink is a modern twist on classic tiki elements, offering a refreshing yet sophisticated balance of flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Cuban classic, the Daiquiri is a harmonious blend of crisp lime, smooth white rum, and sweetness, often credited as one of the first true cocktails. It emerged in the early 20th century at the Daiquiri Club in Cuba, where it became a staple for American mining engineers.

cocktail_specs.name: Ti Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A minimalist yet potent French Polynesian classic, the Ti Punch is a harmonious blend of white rum, lime juice, and rich syrup. Originating from Tahiti, it's traditionally served in a coconut shell or small glass, embodying simplicity and balance with its bright citrus notes and smooth sweetness.

cocktail_specs.name: Honeysuckle Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A floral and refreshing twist on the classic Daiquiri, this cocktail infuses the bright citrus notes with the delicate sweetness of honeysuckle. It’s a perfect balance of tart, sweet, and aromatic elements, making it an ideal choice for spring or summer sipping.

cocktail_specs.name: Pineapple Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Daiquiri, this cocktail replaces traditional lime juice with a luscious blend of pineapple and lime, creating a sweet yet tangy profile. It’s a refreshing staple in tiki culture, often served as an aperitif or digestif.

cocktail_specs.name: Kava
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical twist on the classic Kava, this version replaces traditional kava root with a vibrant blend of white rum, pineapple juice, and lemon. It's a refreshing, slightly tart cocktail that balances sweetness and acidity, perfect for warm weather sipping.

cocktail_specs.name: Okhotnichy
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex Russian cocktail, the Okhotnichy is a harmonious blend of herbal bitterness, smoky rye whisky, and a touch of artichoke liqueur. Originating in the Soviet era, it reflects the resourcefulness of Cold War mixology, where ingredients were often substituted based on availability.

cocktail_specs.name: Normandie Club Martini #1
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered martini from the Normandie Club, this drink harmonizes the crisp cleanliness of infused vodka with the nutty depth of fino sherry. A touch of honey syrup adds subtle sweetness, while a pinch of salt enhances the complexity, making it a refined aperitivo or pre-dinner cocktail.

cocktail_specs.name: Little Victory
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Little Victory marries the botanical brightness of London Dry Gin with the smooth, slightly sweet profile of infused vodka. Blanc kina adds a subtle bitterness and depth, while orange marmalade introduces a delicate citrus sweetness, creating a harmonious balance that is both refreshing and intriguing.

cocktail_specs.name: Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Manhattan is a sophisticated blend of rye whiskey's spicy warmth and red vermouth's herbal sweetness, finished with a touch of aromatic bitters. It emerged in the late 19th century at New York City's Manhattan Club, embodying elegance and balance.

cocktail_specs.name: Napoleon's Defeat
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and bitter Russian-inspired cocktail, Napoleon's Defeat is a striking contrast of citrus-forward vodka, herbal amaro, and crisp white wine. It pays homage to the legendary battle where Napoleon Bonaparte was defeated in 1812, symbolizing resilience through its complex layers of sweet, sour, and herbal notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Mea Culpa
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail with a deep, layered flavor profile, the Mea Culpa is a modern twist on the classic Sherry Cobbler. It combines the smoothness of infused vodka with the nutty richness of fino sherry, balanced by the sweetness of dry sack sherry, apricot liqueur, and a touch of Picon Amer's bitter orange notes. The name, meaning 'my fault' in Latin, hints at its indulgent yet balanced character.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and a pinch of salt on the rim

cocktail_specs.name: Brooklyn
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet Manhattan-style cocktail, the Brooklyn is a modern twist on the classic with Picon Amer adding depth and complexity. It balances the robust spice of rye whiskey with the herbal bitterness of vermouth and the cherry-forward sweetness of Maraschino liqueur.

cocktail_specs.name: Poet's Dream
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that marries the crisp botanicals of London dry gin with the herbal depth of dry vermouth, elevated by the liqueur's signature blend of spices and citrus. It is a modern reinterpretation of classic elements, designed to evoke both elegance and intrigue.

cocktail_specs.name: Strawberry Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this cocktail infuses the traditional bitter-sweet profile with vibrant strawberry sweetness and a hint of chocolate depth. It replaces sweet vermouth with red vermouth for a slightly lighter, fruitier balance while maintaining the signature bitterness of Campari.

cocktail_specs.name: White Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this version replaces Campari with Suze and sweet vermouth with blanc vermouth, creating a lighter, more herbal, and slightly less bitter profile. It retains the balance of gin's botanicals with the bitterness of Suze, offering a refreshing yet complex aperitivo experience.

cocktail_specs.name: Strawberry Lillet Cooler
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and elegant French-inspired cooler, this drink harmonizes the sweetness of strawberry liqueur with the delicate, slightly herbal notes of Lillet Rouge. It’s a perfect balance of fruity and floral, often enjoyed as an aperitif or a light cocktail for warm evenings.

cocktail_specs.name: the hunter alt
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic twist on the classic Hunter, this variation replaces Aperol with dry curaçao for a richer, more complex profile. It balances the herbal depth of Jägermeister with the spice of rye whiskey and a touch of cherry sweetness from maraschino liqueur.

cocktail_specs.name: Bobby Burns Respec
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic twist on the classic Manhattan, this cocktail replaces rye whiskey with rich Scotch and Benedictine for a deeper, more complex profile. It’s a celebration of Scottish heritage, blending the warmth of whisky with the herbal complexity of vermouth and the liqueur's spiced depth.

cocktail_specs.name: à la Louisiane
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail from New Orleans, the à la Louisiane is a complex blend of rye whiskey, Benedictine, sweet vermouth, absinthe, and Peychaud's bitters. It showcases the rich, spiced notes of rye with the herbal depth of absinthe and the subtle sweetness of Benedictine, offering a refined yet bold experience.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lexington bar spoon or lemon twist

cocktail_specs.name: alpine negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the Negroni, this Alpine-inspired variation replaces Campari and sweet vermouth with Cocchi Americano and Suze, adding Genepi des Alpes for a distinct alpine herbal note. The result is a complex, slightly sweet, and aromatic cocktail that balances bitterness, herbal complexity, and a touch of menthol.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist or a sprig of alpine herbs (e.g., genepi)

cocktail_specs.name: El Presidente (htd)
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, spirit-forward cocktail from the golden age of tiki, the El Presidente is a harmonious blend of unaged Jamaican rum, Lillet Blanc, and dry curaçao, finished with a touch of grenadine for depth. It was popularized in the 1950s by Donn Beach, owner of the famed Trader Vic's, and remains a staple of classic tiki bars.

cocktail_specs.name: Bijou
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Bijou is a harmonious blend of red vermouth's herbal depth, gin's botanical brightness, and green Chartreuse's complex herbal notes. It's a modern twist on classic French aperitivo traditions, offering a refined balance of sweet, bitter, and herbal elements.

cocktail_specs.name: Bijou (Punch)
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Bijou is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, red vermouth's rich herbal notes, and the unique herbal profile of green Chartreuse. It was created in the early 20th century as an elegant aperitif, often served at high-society gatherings.

cocktail_specs.name: Double Grape
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet cocktail that harmonizes the bright, grapefruit-forward bitterness of Dubonnet with the fruity, floral complexity of Pisco. Its name hints at a grapefruit influence, though its true charm lies in the interplay between the two fortified elements, creating a smooth yet intriguing aperitivo experience.

ingredients.name: Dubonnet, Byrrh etc. rouge light quinquina

cocktail_specs.name: Downhill Daring
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that marries the herbal depth of Punt E Mes vermouth with the rich, oaky warmth of bourbon whiskey. The addition of sweet fortified Americano wine and the intricate layers of Bénédictine liqueur and Angostura bitters creates a harmonious balance of sweet, bitter, and aromatic notes, making it a sophisticated choice for those who appreciate layered flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Gustin Gang
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Gustin Gang is a harmonious blend of two gins—one dry and botanical, the other rich with sloe berry depth—balanced by the herbal complexity of vermouth and the earthy bitterness of Cynar. It’s a modern take on the Negroni family, offering a nuanced contrast of sweet, tart, and bitter elements.

cocktail_specs.name: Black Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Manhattan, the Black Manhattan replaces sweet vermouth with Averna, adding a deeper herbal complexity and a touch of cherry liqueur for a rich, bittersweet profile. This cocktail is a nod to the elegance of traditional American mixology while embracing Italian amaro influences.

cocktail_specs.name: Epiphany 2
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, Epiphany 2 is a harmonious blend of Lucano amaro's deep herbal complexity, Punt E Mes vermouth's bright citrus notes, and the subtle warmth of allspice. The touch of gomme syrup adds a delicate peach sweetness, creating a drink that is both intriguing and balanced.

cocktail_specs.name: Kings County
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered whisky cocktail from the Kings County, this drink harmoniously blends a robust Highland single malt with the smoky depth of peated Torabhaig, sweet maraschino liqueur, and aromatic vermouth. It’s a celebration of Scottish whisky complexity, offering a balance of fruitiness, peat, bitterness, and herbal notes that evoke both coastal and alpine landscapes.

cocktail_specs.name: Big Chief
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic Tiki classic, the Big Chief is a rich blend of bourbon whiskey, amaro, and vermouth that delivers a deep, herbal complexity with a touch of sweetness. Originating from the tropical cocktails of Donn Beach, it embodies the spirit of Polynesian-inspired mixology.

cocktail_specs.name: Lakeshore
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail from the Lakeshore Lounge, blending the richness of Havana Club rum with the herbal depth of Dubonnet and Fernet Branca. Its name reflects its origin, a nod to the scenic lakeside setting that inspired its creation.

ingredients.name: Dubonnet, Byrrh etc. rouge light quinquina

cocktail_specs.name: Demosthenes Club
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail from the early 20th century, the Demosthenes Club is a harmonious blend of rich Cognac, the bittersweet depth of Dubonnet rouge, and a delicate hint of rose petal liqueur. Named after the famous orator's club in New York, this drink embodies both strength and refinement.

cocktail_specs.name: DuBois
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly bitter cocktail, the DuBois is a harmonious blend of bourbon whiskey, Dubonnet rouge light quinquina, and amaro Montenegro. It offers a complex interplay of sweet, herbal, and bittersweet notes, making it an excellent choice for those who appreciate depth in their drinks.

ingredients.name: Dubonnet, Byrrh etc. rouge light quinquina

cocktail_specs.name: Boadas
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex Cuban cocktail, the Boadas is a harmonious blend of aged rum, Dubonnet's vinous richness, and the citrusy depth of Grand Marnier. Created in Havana during the 1930s, it reflects the city's love for layered, bittersweet cocktails with a touch of elegance.

ingredients.name: Dubonnet, Byrrh etc. rouge light quinquina
Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

cocktail_specs.name: Don't Give Up the Ship
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex American classic, the Don't Give Up the Ship is a masterful blend of gin's botanical brightness, Dubonnet's vinous richness, Triple Sec's citrus sweetness, Fernet Branca's herbal depth, and Angostura bitters' aromatic complexity. Created in 1948 by Jerry Thomas, it embodies the spirit-forward elegance of pre-Prohibition cocktails.

ingredients.name: Dubonnet, Byrrh etc. rouge light quinquina

cocktail_specs.name: spiced rum curacao sour
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, this cocktail replaces bourbon with spiced rum and adds a touch of orange Curacao for a sweet, tangy, and slightly spicy profile. It’s a refreshing yet complex drink that balances citrus acidity, caramelized molasses notes from the rum, and a hint of vanilla or cinnamon, making it perfect for sipping on its own or as an aperitif.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist or flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Whiskey Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and aromatic twist on the classic Whiskey Cocktail, this drink elevates the traditional recipe with absinthe's herbal complexity and maraschino liqueur's sweet cherry notes. It was popularized in the early 20th century as a sophisticated aperitif, balancing rye whiskey's spice with bittersweet depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Jungle Bird
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Mai Tai, the Jungle Bird replaces traditional orange liqueur with Campari, adding a bitter-sweet complexity. It's a refreshing yet spirit-forward cocktail that balances sweet pineapple and citrus with rum's warmth.

cocktail_specs.name: Nui Nui
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki classic, the Nui Nui is a tropical blend of citrus, spice, and rum with a smooth, slightly smoky character. Originating from the South Seas collection, it balances sweet orange and tart lime with a hint of cinnamon and allspice bitters, creating a drink that's both nostalgic and invigorating.

cocktail_specs.name: by their bootstraps
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical-inspired cocktail that blends the earthy depth of rhum agricole with the creamy richness of white crème de cacao and a touch of banana sweetness. Its name plays on the phrase 'pull oneself up by one's bootstraps,' suggesting resilience and strength, much like the bold flavors in this drink.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a sprinkle of Angostura bitters on the surface

cocktail_specs.name: Tropical Standard Soggy Dollar Painkiller
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic Painkiller, this cocktail combines unaged Jamaican rum with overproof Fassionola for a potent, tropical punch. The addition of both lemon and lime juice adds a bright, citrusy tang that cuts through the richness of the rum.

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical masterpiece born in the 1940s, the Mai Tai is a symphony of rum, citrus, and nutty sweetness. Its name is said to derive from 'mai tai roa' (strong, strong) or the Tahitian greeting 'maita'i', reflecting its bold yet balanced character.

cocktail_specs.name: Rusty Anchor
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and aromatic cocktail with a smooth, honeyed sweetness balanced by bright citrus and herbal bitterness. Created in the 1950s at the Rusty Anchor pub in San Francisco, it combines London dry gin with Drambuie, lemon juice, and Angostura bitters for a sophisticated yet approachable profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Corn 'n Oil
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical tiki classic that marries the smooth warmth of rum with the rich, spiced depth of falernum. Originating from the tiki culture of the mid-20th century, this cocktail is a celebration of Caribbean flavors, often associated with Donn Beach and his legendary recipes.

cocktail_specs.name: rum swizzle
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and aromatic tiki classic, the Rum Swizzle is a harmonious blend of rich gold rum, spiced falernum, citrus juices, and a touch of bitters. It traces its roots to 19th-century British naval tradition, where it was served as a refreshing remedy for scurvy, often garnished with nutmeg.

cocktail_specs.name: Bar GPT
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that blends the depth of aged rum with the crispness of white rum, balanced by the herbal complexity of amaro and the nutty sweetness of orgeat syrup. This drink is a modern twist on classic tiki elements, offering a harmonious mix of caramel, citrus, and bittersweet almond notes.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a sprinkle of almond flakes

cocktail_specs.name: bar gpt alt
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on a classic rum cocktail, this drink harmonizes the rich molasses depth of Jamaican dark rum with the bright acidity and grassy notes of rhum agricole. The orange amaro adds a bitter-sweet complexity, while orgeat syrup and lime juice provide a creamy, citrus-forward balance that bridges old-world elegance with modern creativity.
cocktail_specs.garnish: expressed orange twist and a sprinkle of almond powder

cocktail_specs.name: Between the Knees
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly boozy twist on a classic, this cocktail balances the bright acidity of lemon with the rich depth of cognac and honey. It's a modern take on the 'Knees Up' family, where the original version typically omits cognac in favor of more rum.

cocktail_specs.name: Across the Pacific
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail that bridges the flavors of Barbados and Jamaica, this drink layers rich, aged rum with bright lime and nutty orgeat. It's a celebration of tropical ingredients, balancing sweet, herbal, and citrus notes in a refreshing yet spirit-forward profile.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a sprinkle of nutmeg

cocktail_specs.name: Mary Pickford
cocktail_specs.description: A delightful and nostalgic cocktail named after the silent film star, this drink combines the smoothness of Jamaican white rum with the sweet-tart balance of grenadine and maraschino. It's a refreshing, slightly tropical concoction that evokes old Hollywood charm.

cocktail_specs.name: hibiscus rum punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, floral twist on the classic rum punch, this cocktail combines the deep, earthy notes of hibiscus with the rich caramel and spice of aged Jamaican rum. It's a refreshing yet complex drink that balances tart lime and sweetness, perfect for sipping or sharing in a tropical setting.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a sprig of fresh rosemary or mint

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Runner
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki classic, the Rum Runner is a vibrant blend of rum, blackberry liqueur, lime juice, and grenadine, creating a harmonious balance of sweet, tart, and herbal notes. It was popularized in the mid-20th century by Donn Beach, who often served it with a flaming orange peel for dramatic effect.

cocktail_specs.name: twelve mile limit
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Twelve Mile Limit blends light rum with rye whiskey and brandy for depth, balanced by bright lemon juice and a touch of raspberry grenadine. Its name evokes the maritime boundary where coastal waters meet open sea, reflecting its adventurous spirit.
cocktail_specs.garnish: flamed orange peel or a single rosemary sprig

cocktail_specs.name: Blue Hawaiian
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical cocktail with a perfect balance of sweet and tart flavors, the Blue Hawaiian is a staple in tiki culture. It combines rich Havana Club rum with the citrusy depth of Blue Curaçao, creamy coconut, and zesty pineapple juice, creating a visually striking and refreshing drink that transports you to a Hawaiian sunset.

cocktail_specs.name: Isle of Martinique
cocktail_specs.description: A lush, tropical cocktail from the French Caribbean, this drink harmonizes the bright acidity of lime with the rich, nutty depth of orgeat and the smooth warmth of aged Martinique agricole rum. It’s a celebration of the island’s terroir, blending colonial influences with local craftsmanship.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a sprinkle of almond flakes

cocktail_specs.name: Tour Le Carbet
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail from Martinique, the Tour Le Carbet is a harmonious blend of citrus, spice, and rum. It balances the tartness of lime with the rich, molasses-like depth of falernum and Suze, creating a drink that's both refreshing and intriguing.

cocktail_specs.name: Lei Lani Volcano 2.0
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Lei Lani, this cocktail blends creamy coconut, juicy pineapple, and zesty lime with rich Barbados rum for a lush, slightly effervescent experience. The addition of guava soda (likely Rubicon) adds a bright, berry-like depth, making it a refreshing yet complex drink perfect for warm weather.

cocktail_specs.name: Bad Sneakers Alt 2
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic 'Bad Sneakers,' this version replaces the traditional rum with Appleton Estate 12, adding a richer, more complex profile. The grapefruit syrup and lime juice bring a bright citrus contrast, while batida de coco and cinnamon bark introduce tropical warmth and spice.

cocktail_specs.name: widow’s kiss
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Widow's Kiss is a harmonious marriage of sweet Applejack, rich Cognac, and the herbal depth of Benedictine and Yellow Chartreuse. It pays homage to the spirit-forward elegance of classic cocktails while offering a unique blend of flavors that dance between sweet, bitter, and herbal notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Boukman Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, complex twist on the classic daiquiri, this cocktail pays homage to the Boukman ceremony of Haitian Vodou with a blend of white rum and cognac, balanced by tart lime juice and spiced cinnamon syrup. It's a spirit-forward, slightly boozy yet harmonious drink that captures the essence of Caribbean tradition.

cocktail_specs.name: Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Cuban classic, the Daiquiri is a refreshing blend of crisp white rum, tart lime juice, and sweet syrup. Originating in the early 20th century at the Daiquiri Club in Cuba, it became a symbol of elegance and simplicity, often associated with the golden age of cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Ideal Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and balanced daiquiri, the Ideal is a masterclass in rum-based cocktails. It combines aged white rum with unaged agricole blanc for depth, while lime juice and rich syrup create a harmonious sweet-tart profile. This classic was popularized by Dale DeGroff in his book 'The Art of Mixology' and remains a benchmark for modern daiquiris.

cocktail_specs.name: Hemingway Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced twist on the classic daiquiri, this cocktail is said to have been created by Ernest Hemingway in the 1930s at La Bodeguita del Medio in Havana. It features a harmonious blend of white rum, maraschino liqueur, grapefruit juice, lime juice, and simple syrup, delivering a bright, citrus-forward profile with a touch of sweetness and complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Hemingway Daiquiri alt
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Hemingway Daiquiri, this version incorporates Maraschino liqueur and grapefruit syrup for a sophisticated balance of tart, sweet, and floral notes. It’s a spirit-forward cocktail that celebrates the depth of rum while adding a modern, citrusy complexity.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist and a maraschino cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Mango Rum Barrel
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, barrel-aged rum cocktail that marries the deep caramel and spice of aged Jamaican rum with the vibrant sweetness of mango passionfruit nectar. Its layered complexity—rich, slightly smoky, and bright—makes it a standout in modern tiki and rum-based cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Bad Sneakers Variation
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex twist on the classic Bad Sneakers, this variation replaces traditional rum with Appleton Estate 12-year-old Barbados rum, adding depth and richness to its signature grapefruit-coconut-lime profile. The addition of cinnamon bark syrup introduces a subtle warmth, making it both refreshing and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist, lime wheel, and a sprinkle of cinnamon

cocktail_specs.name: Bad Sneakers Variation 2
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Bad Sneaker, this variation replaces traditional rum with a blend of Bacardi and Malibu, adding a creamy texture while retaining the signature grapefruit-cinnamon profile. It's a smooth, slightly sweet cocktail that balances tart citrus and warm spice, perfect for sipping or sharing.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist and a sprinkle of cinnamon

cocktail_specs.name: Rum punch-up
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic rum punch, this cocktail amplifies the spirit's overproof intensity with a harmonious blend of lime, sweetness, and aromatic bitters. It's a modern take on an old-school favorite, perfect for those who crave depth and character in their punches.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Ciro's Special
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless tiki classic with a harmonious blend of dark rum, blackcurrant liqueur, and citrus. Named after Ciro's Cocktail Bar in Tijuana, this drink is a staple for its rich, slightly sweet profile and refreshing acidity.

cocktail_specs.name: nuclear sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, high-proof twist on the classic Sidecar, this cocktail replaces traditional lemon liqueur with Green Chartreuse and Cognac for a bold, herbal, and citrus-forward experience. Its name reflects its intense character, blending the complexity of Chartreuse with the richness of aged brandy.

cocktail_specs.name: Summertime Punch (original)
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, refreshing punch that captures the essence of summer with its bright citrus notes and smooth sweetness. Created by Jerry Thomas in his 1862 barbook, this classic blend of Myers's rum, lime, rich syrup, and Angostura bitters offers a perfect balance of tart, sweet, and aromatic complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Goromo
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-inspired cocktail, the Goromo marries the rich, molasses-forward depth of Myers' dark rum with the fiery punch of Jamaican overproof rum. It's brightened by blackberry and lime, while orgeat adds a subtle almond sweetness, creating a drink that's both refreshing and deeply flavorful.

cocktail_specs.name: a certain romance
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex tiki-inspired cocktail, 'A Certain Romance' marries the tropical warmth of Banks 5 Island Blend rum with the herbal bitterness of Suze and the sweet, fruity depth of Pierre Ferrand Curacao. Its name evokes a sense of intrigue and elegance, much like its layered flavor profile—bright citrus, rich cherry, and a whisper of aromatic bitters.

cocktail_specs.name: Pauline
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Pauline is a modern twist on the classic Death in the Afternoon, featuring Jamaican rum, absinthe, and a saline solution for a briny depth. Its name pays homage to the legendary mixologist, Pauline (Paul) O'Gorman, known for her innovative approach to cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Jungle Hunt
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Jungle Hunt delivers a fiery blend of spiced rum, Jägermeister, and falernum, balanced with tart lemon and sweet pineapple. This drink is a modern take on the classic 'Hunt' family, often associated with Donn Beach's legendary recipes, offering a rich, aromatic experience that dances between herbal bitterness and tropical sweetness.
cocktail_specs.garnish: flamed orange peel or a cinnamon stick

cocktail_specs.name: Hot Zombie
cocktail_specs.description: A fiery, tropical twist on the classic Zombie cocktail, this version is served hot to warm the soul with its rich blend of Puerto Rican gold rum, pineapple juice, and passionfruit syrup. The addition of butter and brown sugar creates a velvety, caramelized depth, while lime juice and lemon heart garnish add a bright, citrusy contrast.

cocktail_specs.name: Xablaw
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Brazilian highball, the Xablaw is a modern twist on the classic Caipirinha, combining the smooth sweetness of cachaça with the herbal complexity of Averna. It’s a bright, citrus-forward drink that balances bitterness and acidity, perfect for sipping on warm days.

cocktail_specs.name: Orange Juice Aperol Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and vibrant twist on the classic Aperol Spritz, this highball version replaces prosecco with crisp beer, creating a lighter, more effervescent drink. The bright citrus notes of orange juice contrast beautifully with the bittersweet Aperol, making it a perfect summer sipper.

cocktail_specs.name: Ramazotti Cola Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and refreshing twist on the classic highball, this cocktail combines the rich, herbal bitterness of Ramazotti with the effervescent sweetness of cola. It's a modern take on an Italian amaro, offering a smooth yet complex profile that bridges the gap between aperitivo and soda.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and a cherry skewered on a cocktail pick

cocktail_specs.name: Suze Mountain Dew Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A playful and unexpected twist on the classic Suze cocktail, this highball replaces traditional soda with Mountain Dew for a sweet, citrusy, and slightly fizzy profile. It’s a nostalgic throwback that balances the herbal bitterness of Cynar with the effervescent, vanilla-citrus notes of Mountain Dew.

cocktail_specs.name: Don Camillo
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail from the 'Don Camillo' series, this drink is a harmonious blend of cognac's oakiness, Campari's bitter citrus, rhubarb liqueur's tart-sweetness, and a touch of orange curacao for brightness. It was created by David Wondrich in honor of the beloved Italian author Giovanni Guareschi.

cocktail_specs.name: Green Chartreuse Grape Soda Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and herbaceous highball that balances the complex, herbal notes of Green Chartreuse with the crisp sweetness of grape soda. This cocktail is a modern twist on the classic highball, offering a harmonious blend of botanical depth and effervescent lightness.

cocktail_specs.name: Tequila Coke Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and slightly bitter twist on the classic Tequila Sunrise, this highball combines the crisp brightness of tequila with the effervescent depth of cola. It’s a staple in Mexican-American bars, offering a smooth, balanced sip that’s both nostalgic and invigorating.

cocktail_specs.name: Jasmine's Cooler
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Aperol Spritz, Jasmine's Cooler replaces Prosecco with gin for a crisp, citrus-forward profile. Its bright lemon and triple sec notes are balanced by the bitterness of Aperol, making it a perfect summer sipper.

cocktail_specs.name: Zombie Tonga Room
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, fire-breathing twist on the classic Zombie, this version hails from the legendary Tonga Room in San Francisco. It combines smooth white rum, fiery Don Q 151, and dark Jamaican rum with passion fruit syrup and pineapple juice for a vibrant, fruity, and slightly spicy experience.
cocktail_specs.garnish: flamed orange wheel and mint sprig

cocktail_specs.name: grenadine pineapple winterspice
cocktail_specs.description: A luscious, spiced rum cocktail that marries the smoky depth of dark rum with the bright acidity of pineapple and the sweet, syrupy embrace of grenadine. Winterspice bitters add a warm, aromatic complexity, while angostura bitters provide a subtle herbal backbone—perfect for those who crave a balance of tropical sweetness and bold spice.

cocktail_specs.name: Top Notch Volcano
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Top Notch Volcano combines two distinct rums—Jamaican unaged and Cuban light—for a layered experience of molasses depth and smoothness. It balances tropical sweetness with bright citrus and a touch of cherry liqueur, creating a drink that’s both vibrant and sophisticated.

cocktail_specs.name: Zombie South Seas
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Zombie South Seas is a vibrant, complex cocktail that blends dark and light rums with tropical juices, citrus, and a hint of sweet vermouth. It's said to be the drink that inspired Donn Beach's original Zombie recipe, offering a rich, layered experience with notes of caramel, pineapple, orange, and a touch of herbal bitterness.
cocktail_specs.garnish: flamed orange peel, mint sprig, pineapple leaf

cocktail_specs.name: Zombie
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Zombie is a fiery, layered concoction that combines light and dark rums with citrus, tropical juices, and aromatic bitters. Originating in the 1930s at Don the Beachcomber's Tiki Room, it’s known for its bold, complex profile and the dramatic flair of its preparation.
cocktail_specs.garnish: pineapple leaf, maraschino cherry, mint sprig

cocktail_specs.name: Soother
cocktail_specs.description: A smooth, velvety cocktail born in the tiki era, the Soother blends dark Jamaican rum and cognac with citrus and apple for a sophisticated yet approachable profile. Its name reflects its soothing balance of sweet, tart, and oak-driven complexity, often garnished with a flair for drama.

cocktail_specs.name: Krakatoa
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Krakatoa is a fiery blend of rum, citrus juices, and liqueurs, topped with a float of coffee. It's named after the infamous 1883 volcanic eruption in Indonesia, reflecting its intense and layered flavor profile.

cocktail_specs.name: 1860's Improved Whiskey Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail from the Golden Age of Mixology, this drink combines rye whiskey with absinthe, gum syrup, Curacao, Maraschino liqueur, and Angostura bitters. It reflects the era's love for intricate flavor profiles and was often served as a refined aperitif or digestif.

cocktail_specs.name: gin & tonic
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and refreshing British classic, the Gin & Tonic is a harmonious marriage of London Dry Gin's botanical complexity and tonic water's effervescent bitterness. Originating in colonial India as a medicinal drink, it evolved into a staple of British imperial culture, often enjoyed with lime garnish.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel or wedge, lime twist

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and elegant classic, the Tom Collins is a harmonious blend of London dry gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and carbonated water. Originating in the late 19th century at the Tom Collins Bar in London, it’s a symbol of British cocktail culture, balancing citrus brightness with effervescent crispness.

cocktail_specs.name: Hock Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail that bridges the worlds of wine and spirits, the Hock Martini is a refined blend of dry Riesling (traditionally from Germany's Rheinhessen region) and London Dry gin. Its name reflects its origins as a martini variation, often served in classic martini style with a focus on clarity and balance.

cocktail_specs.name: Wein mit Schuss
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and balanced German twist on the classic 'Schuss,' this cocktail combines crisp white wine with the richness of cognac and the citrusy sweetness of Cointreau. Traditionally, it's served as a shot or a small glass, but this version scales it up for a more refined experience, often garnished with orange juice.

cocktail_specs.name: Grapefruit Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A zesty, refreshing twist on the classic Gin Fizz, this cocktail combines the bright citrus notes of grapefruit with the botanical complexity of gin. It’s a perfect balance of tart and sweet, often served tall with soda water for a light, effervescent finish.

cocktail_specs.name: Cucumber Beast
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, herbaceous twist on the classic gin cocktail, the Cucumber Beast is a refreshing yet complex blend of cucumber bitters and Chartreuse, balanced with St-Germain's floral notes. Its name hints at its bold character, making it a standout in both summer and winter palates.

cocktail_specs.name: strawberry balsamic soda
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on a classic, this cocktail marries the sweetness of strawberry liqueur with the bold, tangy depth of aged balsamic vinegar. The result is a bright, effervescent drink that balances fruity sweetness with an unexpected savory complexity, making it a perfect summer sipper.
cocktail_specs.garnish: fresh strawberry slice and a twist of lemon peel

cocktail_specs.name: Air Mail
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki cocktail with a rich history, the Air Mail was created in the 1940s to test the durability of sealed bottles during airmail shipments. Its effervescent charm comes from champagne, balanced by aged rum's caramel and spice notes, while lime juice and honey syrup add a bright, slightly sweet contrast.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Cuban
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and effervescent Cuban classic, the Old Cuban is a celebration of aged rum's depth and complexity, brightened by lime juice and sweetened with rich syrup. It was a staple in Havana's pre-revolutionary cocktail scene, often served as a refreshing yet sophisticated aperitif.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Champagne Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and effervescent blend of aged rum, champagne, and demerara syrup, this cocktail is a celebration of contrasts—rich caramel and spice from the rum, bright acidity from the champagne, and a touch of sweetness to balance. It’s a modern twist on classic champagne cocktails, perfect for toasting special occasions.

cocktail_specs.name: Sharks Tooth
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail that layers the rich, molasses notes of Barbados gold rum with the deep caramel and spice of Appleton Estate 8-year dark rum. Balanced by tart lime, sweet pineapple, and a touch of cherry syrup, it delivers a tropical yet sophisticated experience, reminiscent of a sun-drenched beach sunset.

cocktail_specs.name: Blackbeard's Ghost
cocktail_specs.description: A hauntingly complex tiki classic, Blackbeard's Ghost weaves together the tropical sweetness of apricot brandy and light rum with the bright acidity of citrus juices. The addition of falernum and demerara syrup lends a rich, molasses-like depth, while Angostura bitters add a subtle aromatic complexity, evoking the spirit of pirate lore.

cocktail_specs.name: modern old-fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Old-Fashioned, this cocktail replaces traditional sugar syrup with rich demerara syrup for a deeper caramel and molasses complexity. It retains the spirit-forward essence of its predecessor while embracing modern techniques to enhance its aromatic profile.

cocktail_specs.name: QB Cooler
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, multi-layered tiki classic that blends the warmth of aged Jamaican and Puerto Rican rums with the spicy depth of falernum and honey. It was a staple in Donn Beach's menu at the original Trader Vic's, offering a complex balance of sweet, herbal, and citrus notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Formidable Dragon
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail that marries the smoky depth of Scotch whisky with the rich, fruity character of aged rum. Its layered citrus, honeyed sweetness, and aromatic bitters create a harmonious yet formidable balance, perfect for those who appreciate both tradition and innovation in mixology.

cocktail_specs.name: Don's Own Grog
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, layered tiki classic that pays homage to Donn Beach's legendary grog, blending black blended whisky with white and moderately aged rums for depth. Sweetened with demarara sugar and blackberry liqueur, it’s balanced by lime and a whisper of Angostura bitters, offering a complex, fruity-sweet profile with a touch of spice.

cocktail_specs.name: Demerara Dry Float
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Demerara Dry Float marries the tropical sweetness of passion fruit with the bright acidity of lime and lemon. The dry float technique, using a small amount of maraschino liqueur on top, adds a delicate cherry note without overwhelming the drink's refreshing citrus and rum character.

cocktail_specs.name: Merciless Virgin
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, non-alcoholic twist on the classic 'Merciless,' this cocktail delivers a complex blend of tart citrus, sweet falernum, and herbal notes from moderate Spanish wine. It's a refreshing yet sophisticated choice for those seeking depth without alcohol.

cocktail_specs.name: Kikuya Lapu
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Kikuya Lapu is a lush blend of tropical juices, aged Jamaican rum, and a touch of absinthe for depth. It balances sweetness with herbal and smoky notes, creating a drink that's both refreshing and intriguing.

cocktail_specs.name: Zombie Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Zombie Punch is a fiery, layered concoction that blends rich rums with citrus, spice, and a touch of absinthe. Originating from Donn Beach in Turtle Bay, Hawaii, this cocktail is both a refreshing and complex drink, often served in a flaming presentation.

cocktail_specs.name: Planter's Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic with a complex, layered profile that balances rich rum, citrus, and tropical sweetness. Originating in the 1930s, this cocktail is a nod to the Plantation Punches of old Hawaii, featuring aged rum, pineapple syrup, and a touch of absinthe for depth.

cocktail_specs.name: berry honey jäger
cocktail_specs.description: A luscious, aromatic twist on the classic Jägerbomb, this cocktail marries the herbal depth of Jägermeister with the sweet-tart allure of raspberry and cherry liqueurs, balanced by a touch of honey and bright lemon juice. It’s a modern take on the Jäger tradition, offering a harmonious blend of fruity, herbal, and slightly bitter notes that make it both refreshing and complex.

cocktail_specs.name: Jägerita
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and aromatic twist on the classic Margarita, the Jägerita replaces tequila with Jägermeister, delivering a rich blend of herbal, spiced, and citrus notes. This refreshing yet complex cocktail is perfect for those who enjoy a balance of sweetness and bitterness with a hint of warmth.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a sprinkle of salt on the rim (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless French cocktail born in the shadows of World War I, the Sidecar is a luminous trio of cognac's rich oak and vanilla, tart lemon juice, and sweet orange liqueur. Its name may reference the two-wheeled vehicle used by ambulance drivers during the war, but its legacy lies in its ability to balance citrus brightness with French brandy elegance.

cocktail_specs.name: La Vie En Rouge
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing French-inspired cocktail, La Vie En Rouge combines the citrusy depth of Grand Marnier with the tart brightness of cranberry juice. Its balanced sweetness and effervescent texture make it a perfect choice for brunch or summer sipping.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour Alt
cocktail_specs.description: This modern twist on the classic Aperol Sour replaces the traditional Aperol with Averna, a complex Italian amaro known for its herbal depth and bittersweet profile. The addition of sparkling mineral water elevates it into a refreshing, effervescent cocktail that balances citrus brightness with herbal complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour Alt
cocktail_specs.description: This modern twist on the classic Aperol Sour replaces Aperol with Averna, a sweet, herbal amaro that adds depth and complexity. The bright citrus notes from orange and lemon juice balance its rich, slightly bitter profile, making it both refreshing and sophisticated.

cocktail_specs.name: averna sour alt
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic sour, this cocktail replaces traditional amaro with Averna, a Sicilian herbal liqueur known for its caramelized orange and bitter citrus notes. The lemon juice brings a bright acidity that cuts through the liqueur's richness, creating a harmonious balance of sweet, bitter, and tart flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and aromatic twist on the classic sour, this cocktail replaces whiskey with Averna, a rich, herbal amaro from Sicily. It delivers a harmonious balance of bitter citrus, sweetness, and herbal complexity, making it a refreshing yet sophisticated choice for any occasion.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour Alt
cocktail_specs.description: This modern twist on the classic Aperol Sour replaces the Aperol with Averna, a complex Italian amaro known for its herbal and slightly bitter profile. The result is a rich, balanced sour with notes of citrus, bittersweet herbs, and a touch of sweetness that lingers on the palate.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour Alt
cocktail_specs.description: This modern twist on the classic Aperol Sour replaces Aperol with Averna, a Roman amaro known for its herbal complexity and bittersweet profile. The result is a rich, citrus-forward cocktail with a lingering herbal finish, perfect for those who appreciate deeper, more nuanced flavors in their sours.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Sour Alt 7
cocktail_specs.description: This modern twist on the classic Aperol Sour replaces Aperol with Averna, a Roman amaro known for its herbal depth and subtle bitterness. The result is a rich, balanced sour with vibrant citrus notes, a touch of sweetness, and an elegant complexity that makes it a standout in the sour category.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Italian aperitivo, the Averna Collins combines the herbal complexity of Averna liqueur with bright lemon juice and soda water. It’s a modern twist on the classic Collins, offering a balanced blend of bitter, citrusy, and effervescent notes that make it perfect for warm weather.

cocktail_specs.name: Amaretto Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A luscious and balanced cocktail, the Amaretto Sour combines the nutty sweetness of amaretto with the bright acidity of lemon juice and a touch of rich syrup. It's a classic that has stood the test of time, often garnished with an egg white for a silky texture.

cocktail_specs.name: Scofflaw
cocktail_specs.description: A Prohibition-era cocktail that emerged during the 1920s, the Scofflaw is a bold and balanced blend of rye whisky, citrus, sweetness, and bitters. It was one of the few legal cocktails during the Volstead Act era, as it relied on ingredients not prohibited by the ban on alcohol.

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A quintessential British cocktail, the Tom Collins is a refreshing blend of gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup, topped with soda water. It dates back to the early 19th century and is often considered one of the first true highballs, offering a crisp, citrus-forward profile that balances sweetness and acidity.

cocktail_specs.name: Grapefruit Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic gin Collins, this cocktail replaces lemon with grapefruit for a bright, tart, and slightly bitter profile. Its citrus-forward character makes it a standout choice for warm weather, balancing sweetness with the natural bitterness of grapefruit.

cocktail_specs.name: Parachute
cocktail_specs.description: A crisp and invigorating gin cocktail, the Parachute is a modern twist on classic highballs, offering a refreshing balance of citrus brightness and botanical complexity. Its name reflects its ability to 'lift' the palate with its effervescent charm.

cocktail_specs.name: Moscow Mule
cocktail_specs.description: A crisp, refreshing cocktail with a perfect balance of vodka's clean bite and ginger beer's spicy, effervescent kick. Born in the 1940s at the height of the Cold War, it became an American classic, often served in a copper mug to enhance its visual appeal.

cocktail_specs.name: Dark and Stormy
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless British classic, the Dark and Stormy is a bold marriage of rich dark rum and spicy ginger beer, creating a harmonious balance of sweet, fiery, and effervescent flavors. Legend has it that the cocktail was invented in the late 19th century at the Buccano's Rum Bar in Bermuda, where it became a staple for sailors seeking respite from stormy seas.

cocktail_specs.name: Silver Fizz
cocktail_specs.description: A bright and effervescent cocktail, the Silver Fizz is a refined twist on the classic Gin Fizz. Its zesty lemon profile and crisp soda water make it a perfect refreshing drink for warm weather, while the gin's botanical notes add depth without overpowering.

cocktail_specs.name: Ramos Gin Fizz
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent cocktail, the Ramos Gin Fizz is a New Orleans classic that combines gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and soda water to create a light, citrusy, and slightly sweet drink. It was invented by Henry Ramos at his famous bar in the 1930s and is often considered one of the best gin fizzes ever made.

cocktail_specs.name: Presbyterian
cocktail_specs.description: A smooth and balanced cocktail, the Presbyterian is a refined blend of bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes with sweet vermouth's herbal depth. It is said to have been created in the early 20th century as an alternative to the Manhattan for those who preferred bourbon over rye.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Cuban
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Daiquiri, the Old Cuban replaces lime juice with grapefruit for a bright, tangy profile. Born in Cuba but popularized in the U.S., it’s a perfect balance of rum’s sweetness and grapefruit’s zesty bite.

cocktail_specs.name: Champagne Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and elegant cocktail, the Champagne Cocktail is a delicate marriage of effervescent champagne, sweetness from simple syrup, and a whisper of aromatic bitters. It emerged in the late 19th century as a sophisticated aperitif, often associated with the era's love for light, bubbly libations.

cocktail_specs.name: Bernice
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Bernice is a harmonious blend of infused vodka, bright lime, and Galliano's herbal sweetness. It was created by Dale DeGroff in honor of his wife, offering a refined balance of citrus and botanical notes with a touch of bittersweet complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Bernice Alt
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Bernice Alt is a harmonious blend of infused vodka, Galliano, lime, and sugar. Created by Donny O'Grady for the 2014 World's 50 Best Bars competition, it showcases the depth of Galliano while maintaining a bright, citrusy freshness.

cocktail_specs.name: Dandy
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet cocktail, the Dandy is a harmonious blend of rye whisky's spicy warmth, Dubonnet's rich red wine liqueur, and the citrusy brightness of triple sec. It was popularized in the 1920s and remains a timeless choice for those who appreciate balanced, spirit-forward drinks with a touch of elegance.

cocktail_specs.name: Cubanada
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and slightly sweet rum cocktail with a Cuban twist, the Cubanada combines white rum, lime juice, and maple syrup for a smooth, balanced sip. It’s a modern take on classic rum cocktails, blending tropical brightness with a touch of earthy sweetness.

cocktail_specs.name: Diplomat
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Diplomat is a refined blend of dry and sweet vermouth, enhanced with maraschino liqueur and orange bitters. It was created in the early 20th century at the St. Regis Hotel in New York City, originally as an aperitif but later adapted for on-the-rocks service.

cocktail_specs.name: Casino
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and aromatic cocktail with a rich history, the Casino is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, maraschino liqueur's sweet cherry depth, and lemon juice's bright acidity. It was created in the mid-20th century at the Hotel Metropole in Monte Carlo, designed to showcase the best of French and Italian spirits while offering a sophisticated yet approachable flavor profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Twelve Mile Limit
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Twelve Mile Limit combines the richness of cognac and rye with the bright acidity of lemon juice and a touch of raspberry grenadine. It evokes the spirit of rum-based tiki drinks but replaces rum with an equal parts blend of cognac and rye for depth and sophistication.

cocktail_specs.name: Port Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail infuses bourbon with the rich, fruity depth of ruby port and a touch of maple sweetness. It's a perfect balance of smoky, caramelized notes from the bourbon, the bold berry and chocolate undertones of the port, and a subtle nutty bitterness that elevates its complexity.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and a walnut shell

cocktail_specs.name: Whiskey Smash
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail that captures the essence of summer, the Whiskey Smash is a harmonious blend of bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes with bright lemon zest and simple syrup. This classic American drink, often associated with the early 20th-century speakeasy era, is known for its balanced sweetness and tangy bite.

cocktail_specs.name: Dempsey
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail born in the tiki era, the Dempsey is a harmonious marriage of gin's botanical brightness, Calvados' rich apple depth, and absinthe's herbal complexity. It was created by Donn Beach, co-founder of the original Trader Vic's, and named after his friend, boxer Gene Tunney.

cocktail_specs.name: Bentley
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail from the Prohibition era, the Bentley is a harmonious marriage of Calvados' apple richness and Dubonnet's sweet, fortified depth. It was created in 1928 by Thomas 'Bentley' Handcock, a bartender at New York's Waldorf Astoria, and remains a timeless symbol of elegance.

cocktail_specs.name: Dublin Minstrel
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex Irish whiskey cocktail, the Dublin Minstrel is a harmonious blend of smooth Irish whiskey, herbal Chartreuse, sweet maraschino, and tart lime juice. It offers a balance of spice, bitterness, and fruitiness, with a touch of historical charm reminiscent of 19th-century Irish pubs.

cocktail_specs.name: Affinity
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail, the Affinity combines the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc with the citrusy brightness of Aperol and the botanical depth of gin. It's a modern twist on classic aperitivo elements, offering a smooth, slightly bitter profile that's both refreshing and elegant.

cocktail_specs.name: Angel Face
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and sophisticated cocktail, the Angel Face is a harmonious blend of sweet apricot liqueur, crisp gin, and rich Calvados. Its name evokes elegance, with flavors that dance between floral, fruity, and subtle oak notes, making it a perfect choice for those who appreciate refined, layered sips.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist or a single apricot slice, lightly torched if desired

cocktail_specs.name: champs-elysees
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated French classic, the Champs-Élysées is a harmonious marriage of rich cognac, herbal Chartreuse, and bright lemon juice. Its name evokes the grandeur of Paris' iconic avenue, while its balanced sweetness and bitterness make it a timeless favorite.

cocktail_specs.name: Sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless French classic, the Sidecar is a harmonious blend of brandy's rich, fruity depth and the bright, citrus-forward notes of orange liqueur and lemon juice. Created in the 1920s during Prohibition, it was one of the first cocktails to feature Cointreau or Curacao, offering a sophisticated balance of sweet, sour, and boozy complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Godfather
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and velvety cocktail, the Godfather is a harmonious marriage of smoky Scotch whisky and sweet, nutty amaretto. Created in the 1970s, it embodies the indulgent elegance of its namesake, offering a balance of depth and smoothness that makes it a timeless favorite.

cocktail_specs.name: grenadine tequila
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, fruit-forward cocktail that marries the smoky depth of reposado tequila with the lush sweetness of grenadine and tropical juices. It's a modern twist on classic tequila cocktails, balancing tart citrus, mango passionfruit, and cherry notes for a refreshing yet complex sip.

cocktail_specs.name: Blue Blazer
cocktail_specs.description: A dramatic and smoky cocktail, the Blue Blazer is a flaming twist on the classic Whiskey Sour. Originating in the 1950s, it features a rich Scotch whisky, a touch of sweetness, and a fiery spectacle that makes it a showstopper for any occasion.
cocktail_specs.garnish: flamed orange peel or lemon twist

cocktail_specs.name: Bananerac
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Banana Daiquiri, the Bananerac replaces rum with a bold blend of cognac and rye whiskey, adding depth and complexity. The absinthe and banana liqueur create a harmonious balance of herbal, fruity, and boozy notes, making it a sophisticated yet approachable cocktail.

cocktail_specs.name: vieux carre
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and complex French classic, the Vieux Carré is a harmonious marriage of cognac, rye whiskey, and sweet vermouth, elevated by the herbal depth of Benedictine and the aromatic punch of Peychaud's bitters. Created in New Orleans in the late 19th century, it’s a sophisticated aperitif with layers of spice, citrus, and caramel.

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Whiskey Cocktail (Alt)
cocktail_specs.description: A refined evolution of the classic Whiskey Cocktail, this version amplifies complexity with a whisper of absinthe and Maraschino liqueur. It balances rye's spice, bittersweet cherry notes, and aromatic bitters for a sophisticated, spirit-forward sip.

cocktail_specs.name: Brandy Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and spirit-forward twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this version replaces whiskey with cognac for a richer, more complex profile. The maraschino liqueur adds a subtle cherry sweetness, while Angostura bitters bring depth and warmth, making it an ideal aperitivo or digestif.

cocktail_specs.name: Cognac Fernet Cacao
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, complex cocktail that marries the smooth elegance of cognac with the herbal depth of fernet and the velvety sweetness of crème de cacao. This modern twist on a classic formula delivers a harmonious balance of bitterness, warmth, and sophistication, making it a standout for those who appreciate spirit-forward drinks with layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.garnish: cocoa powder dusting and a thin orange twist

cocktail_specs.name: Sidecar Salt
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Sidecar, this variation incorporates a touch of salt to enhance its bright citrus and cognac notes. The original Sidecar emerged in the 1920s as a Parisian favorite, blending brandy (or cognac), triple sec, and lemon juice, often garnished with a lemon twist.

cocktail_specs.name: Three of a Kind
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and balanced cocktail, the Three of a Kind is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, sweet fortified wine's richness, and maraschino liqueur's fruity depth. It's a refreshing yet sophisticated drink that showcases the interplay between these three distinct spirits.

cocktail_specs.name: Sue Ellen
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and slightly boozy twist on the classic Southern Comfort cocktail, the Sue Ellen balances the smooth, vanilla-forward profile of Southern Comfort with the herbal depth of Ramazotti and Benedictine. It's a refreshing yet complex drink that leans into the sweet-tart appeal of cranberry juice, making it a standout choice for those who enjoy a touch of bitterness in their highballs.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel or twist, and a maraschino cherry

cocktail_specs.name: White Rob Roy
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Rob Roy, this cocktail replaces traditional sweet vermouth with a smooth, dry white vermouth, creating a lighter, more elegant profile. It retains the signature bittersweet balance of Scotch whisky and aromatic bitters, offering a refined yet bold experience.

cocktail_specs.name: Bijou
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant cocktail, the Bijou is a sophisticated blend of Plymouth Gin's juniper-forward profile with the herbal complexity of red vermouth and the herbal, slightly medicinal notes of Green Chartreuse. It was created by mixologist Jeff 'Beard' Berryman in 2014, embodying a harmonious balance of sweet, bitter, and herbal elements.

cocktail_specs.name: Bijou (Difford's)
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail from the Difford's Guide, the Bijou is a harmonious blend of vermouth, gin, and Green Chartreuse. It offers a complex interplay of herbal, citrus, and slightly medicinal notes, making it both refreshing and intriguing.

cocktail_specs.name: Fig Rum Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A luscious, fruit-forward cocktail that marries the natural sweetness of fig-infused rum with the citrus brightness of dry curaçao and the herbal depth of Lillet Blanc. This drink is a modern twist on classic tiki flavors, offering a harmonious balance of jammy fig, tropical notes, and subtle bitterness.

cocktail_specs.name: Sir Winston
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet twist on the classic Manhattan, the Sir Winston replaces rye whiskey with rich Scotch, creating a velvety, smoky profile that balances citrus brightness and herbal vermouth. This cocktail is said to have been named in honor of Winston Churchill, though its exact origins remain debated.

cocktail_specs.name: Martica
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Martica is a refined blend of Jamaican rum, Cognac, sweet vermouth, maraschino liqueur, and Angostura bitters. It offers a harmonious balance of rich, fruity notes from the rum and maraschino, with deep oak and spice from the Cognac, all tied together by the herbal complexity of sweet vermouth.

cocktail_specs.name: birthday gentleman’s health
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail that marries the richness of Jameson Black Barrel with the herbal depth of Green Chartreuse and Bianco Vermouth, balanced by a bright lemon juice. This drink is a celebration in itself, offering layers of flavor from smoky whisky to botanical bitterness, making it a perfect toast for any occasion.

cocktail_specs.name: romero said so
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Americano, this cocktail replaces sweet vermouth with a delicate bianco vermouth and adds a whisper of absinthe for depth. It balances bright citrus, botanical gin, and subtle vanilla sweetness, creating a smooth yet intricately layered experience.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a light dusting of absinthe

cocktail_specs.name: Sue Ellen Metaxa
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that blends the rich, caramel notes of Metaxa with the herbal depth of Jägermeister and the nutty sweetness of Frangelico. It's topped with tart cranberry juice and soda for a refreshing yet sophisticated balance, perfect for those who enjoy a spirit-forward drink with a touch of warmth.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and a sprinkle of cinnamon

cocktail_specs.name: Bobby Burns Original
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and aromatic Scottish classic, the Bobby Burns Original is a spirit-forward blend of Scotch whisky, sweet vermouth, and Benedictine liqueur. Named after the legendary Scottish poet Robert Burns, this cocktail delivers a harmonious balance of smoky malt, herbal bitterness, and caramelized depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Corpse Reviver #1
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary, spirit-forward cocktail born in the 1920s, Corpse Reviver #1 is a masterful blend of sweet vermouth, apple brandy (Calvados), and cognac. Its rich, complex profile—balancing herbal bitterness, fruity depth, and smooth warmth—makes it a timeless choice for those seeking both sophistication and bold character.

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Lillet Spritz
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic aperitivo, the Averna Lillet Spritz combines the herbal complexity of Averna with the smooth elegance of Lillet Blanc. This Italian classic is a refreshing yet robust drink, often enjoyed as a pre-dinner libation, balancing citrus brightness with deep, bitter-sweet undertones.

cocktail_specs.name: Bourbon Lillet
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail, the Bourbon Lillet is a harmonious marriage of rich bourbon and the floral, citrusy notes of Lillet Blanc. This classic American-French hybrid offers a smooth, slightly sweet profile with a touch of herbal complexity, making it an ideal aperitif or after-dinner drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Sue Ellen Havana Club 7
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex twist on the classic Sue Ellen, this version incorporates Cuban Havana Club 7 rum with Averna and Jägermeister for a rich, herbal depth.
