The addition of cranberry juice brings a tart, fruity brightness, making it a perfect balance of sweet, bitter, and citrus notes.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and a cranberry skewer

cocktail_specs.name: Sue Ellen Southern Comfort Alt
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Sue Ellen, this variation replaces traditional lemonade with a complex blend of Averna, Benedictine, and absinthe, creating a rich, herbal, and slightly bitter profile. The addition of cranberry juice adds a tart, fruity contrast, making it a sophisticated yet approachable highball.
cocktail_specs.garnish: cranberry twist and a few drops of absinthe rinse on the glass

cocktail_specs.name: Sue Ellen Metaxa Alt
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic Sue Ellen, this variation replaces traditional bourbon with rich, blended Scotch whisky (Metaxa) and adds layers of aromatic bitters like Ramazotti and Jägermeister. The addition of Fernet Branca deepens its herbal complexity, while cranberry juice brings a tart, fruity contrast to balance the robust spirit profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Sue Ellen Havana 7 Alt
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex twist on the classic Sue Ellen, this variation replaces traditional mango nectar with Lakka rum, adding a lighter, more nuanced tropical depth. It balances Cuban rum's caramel richness with Ramazotti's herbal bitterness, creating a refreshing yet sophisticated highball perfect for warm weather.

cocktail_specs.name: Rusty Nail
cocktail_specs.description: A robust and comforting cocktail, the Rusty Nail is a harmonious marriage of smoky whiskey and sweet, herbal Drambuie. Created in the late 1970s at the Rusty Nail pub in Scotland, it embodies warmth and nostalgia with its deep caramel, spice, and citrus notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Bad Sneakers Alt 1
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic 'Bad Sneakers,' this version replaces the traditional rum with a rich Scotch, adding depth and complexity. The grapefruit syrup and lime juice provide a bright citrus contrast, while batida de coco brings a creamy tropical element, balanced by a hint of cinnamon bark for warmth.

cocktail_specs.name: Bad Sneakers
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, spirit-forward cocktail that marries the smoky depth of peated Scotch with the tropical sweetness of coconut liqueurs and grapefruit juice. Its name is a playful nod to its layered, sometimes 'uncomfortable' yet harmonious flavors, balancing smokiness, citrus, and spice in a way that feels both sophisticated and approachable.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist and a sprinkle of cinnamon

cocktail_specs.name: Passionfruit Tommy's
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex twist on the classic Tommy's Marguerita, this cocktail replaces tequila with smoky mezcal and passionfruit for a tropical yet earthy profile. Its balance of sweet, tart, and smoky notes makes it both refreshing and intriguing.

cocktail_specs.name: passionfruit tommy's alt
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on a classic, this cocktail replaces traditional passionfruit with the unique depth offassionola rum, offering a rich, tropical profile with a touch of overproof intensity. It balances citrus brightness and agave sweetness while showcasing the complexity of reposado tequila.

cocktail_specs.name: Jack Rose
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Jack Rose is a harmonious blend of Calvados' rich apple notes with the tartness of lime juice and the sweet depth of grenadine. Created in the 1940s at the Jack Rose Room in New York City's St. Regis Hotel, it's known for its balanced sweet-sour profile and luxurious texture.

cocktail_specs.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Whiskey Sour is a harmonious marriage of bourbon's caramel and oak notes with bright lemon juice and a touch of sweetness. Originating in the late 19th century, it's a versatile cocktail that can be enjoyed neat or with an egg white for a frothy texture.

cocktail_specs.name: Smoke and Mirrors
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated play on contrast, this cocktail marries the smoky depth of peated Scotch with the bright acidity of lime juice, creating a dance of flavors that is both bold and refined. The whisper-thin dose of absinthe adds an ethereal hint of herbal complexity, while rich syrup rounds out the profile with a touch of sweetness.
cocktail_specs.garnish: expressed lime twist and a light smoke haze (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Smokescreen
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and smoky twist on a classic Scotch cocktail, the Smokescreen layers rich blended Scotch with peated single malt for depth, balanced by bright lime juice and herbal Chartreuse. Its name reflects its dual nature—both smooth and complex, with a lingering smokiness that lingers like a well-aged whisky.
cocktail_specs.garnish: expressed lime wheel and a flamed orange twist (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Pompadour
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated French cocktail named after the mistress of Louis XV, Madame de Pompadour, this drink harmonizes the rich caramel notes of Rhum VSOP with the fruity depth of Pineau des Charentes. The addition of lemon juice and vanilla lactic syrup introduces a bright acidity and creamy sweetness, making it both complex and approachable.

cocktail_specs.name: Brown Derby
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and citrus-forward cocktail born in the iconic Brown Derby restaurant in Hollywood, California. This drink harmoniously blends bourbon's rich caramel notes with the bright, slightly bitter tang of grapefruit juice, balanced by a touch of honey syrup for a smooth, complex finish.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist and a flamed orange peel

cocktail_specs.name: The Stig
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that harmonizes the crisp acidity of Calvados with the bright, citrusy notes of Pisco. Elderflower liqueur adds a floral sweetness, while Sauvignon Blanc brings a refreshing, wine-like depth, making it a versatile drink for both summer sipping and winter warmth.

cocktail_specs.name: In-Seine
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail that plays with the contrast of bourbon's sweetness, cognac's depth, St-Germain's floral elegance, and absinthe's herbal complexity. This drink is a modern take on classic French influences, offering a harmonious blend of smoky, fruity, and anise notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Dr Rieux
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail inspired by the character Dr. Rieux from Albert Camus' 'The Plague,' this drink balances the rich, apple-forward notes of Calvados with the bright acidity of lemon juice and the sweet, citrusy depth of orange curacao. Its layered flavors—spiced, fruity, and slightly herbal—make it a standout in both classic and modern cocktail circles.

cocktail_specs.name: Wordsmith
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Wordsmith combines rich Jamaican-style rum with the herbal depth of Chartreuse and the fruity sweetness of maraschino. Its balanced bitterness and citrus brightness make it a standout among modern classics.

ingredients.name: Jamaican-style overproof aged pot still rum

cocktail_specs.name: cognac st. germain sour
cocktail_specs.description: A luxurious twist on the classic whiskey sour, this cocktail replaces bourbon with rich, oak-aged cognac and infuses it with the sweet-tart essence of strawberry liqueur. The result is a velvety-smooth, balanced drink that harmonizes the depth of cognac with the bright acidity of lemon and the fruity allure of strawberries.

cocktail_specs.name: Corn 'n Oil
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, velvety tiki classic that marries the deep caramel and molasses notes of dark rum with the spiced sweetness of falernum. Created in the 1950s, this cocktail is a nod to the tropical flavors of Polynesian-inspired drinks, offering a smooth yet complex profile that balances warmth and bitterness.

cocktail_specs.name: Amaro Rumhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, aromatic twist on the classic Amaro Sour, this cocktail marries the deep caramel and spice of dark rum with the bitter-sweet complexity of amaro di Angostura. It's a spirit-forward, bittersweet sip that bridges the gap between tiki and modern mixology.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and a sprinkle of aromatic bitters

cocktail_specs.name: Japanese Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant cocktail that bridges French and Japanese influences, the Japanese Cocktail is a harmonious blend of rich cognac, nutty orgeat syrup, and aromatic bitters. Its smooth, balanced profile makes it both sophisticated and approachable.

cocktail_specs.name: east india cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and aromatic cocktail with a rich history, the East India is a delightful blend of cognac's depth, bright lemon juice, tropical pineapple, and the sweet-tart essence of maraschino liqueur. It was created in the early 20th century to evoke the flavors of the East India trade routes, often garnished with a cherry or citrus twist.

cocktail_specs.name: barnum was right
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly salty cocktail, 'Barnum Was Right' combines the floral notes of dry gin with the sweet, jammy richness of apricot liqueur. The addition of saline solution adds a subtle briny depth, while lemon juice and Angostura bitters bring balance and complexity, making it a unique and memorable drink.

cocktail_specs.name: 1934 Cosmo
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly tart twist on the classic Cosmopolitan, this cocktail balances the botanical complexity of dry gin with the bright acidity of lemon juice and the delicate sweetness of raspberries. It was popularized in the early 20th century as a refined alternative to the more common martini, often served at high-society gatherings.

cocktail_specs.name: the word is love
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, spirit-forward tiki cocktail that marries the tropical sweetness of pineapple and lime with the herbal complexity of green Chartreuse and absinthe. Its name is a playful nod to its bold, unapologetic flavors, blending modern mixology techniques with classic tiki aesthetics.

cocktail_specs.name: the bees knees
cocktail_specs.description: A delightful and refreshing cocktail with a honeyed sweetness balanced by the bright acidity of lemon and the botanical complexity of London dry gin. This classic was reportedly named during World War I, when it was said to be 'the knees' (a slang term for something excellent) and later evolved into 'the bees knees'.

cocktail_specs.name: monkey gland
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, complex cocktail with a rich history tied to early 20th-century London. It combines the herbal depth of gin, the anise notes of absinthe, and the sweetness of grenadine, balanced by bright orange juice for a harmonious yet intriguing flavor profile.

cocktail_specs.name: cranberry rosemary gin fizz
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and aromatic twist on the classic Gin Fizz, this cocktail combines tart cranberry syrup with earthy rosemary, creating a refreshing balance of sweet, sour, and herbal notes. The effervescent texture and bright acidity make it an ideal choice for summer sipping or as a sophisticated aperitif.
cocktail_specs.garnish: fresh rosemary sprig and lime wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Moskva
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail with a harmonious blend of bright lemon, sweet cherry, herbal bitterness, and juniper-forward gin. Originating from the Moscow Mule family but with a distinct European twist, it balances citrus, floral, and amaro notes in a refreshing yet complex profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Moskva Mule
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the Moscow Mule, this cocktail replaces vodka with gin for a brighter, more botanical profile. It combines tart lemon juice, sweet maraschino liqueur, and dry curaçao, creating a refreshing yet complex balance of citrus and cherry notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Yellow Belly
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, citrus-forward cocktail with a smooth, slightly sweet profile. This drink combines the clean, crisp notes of infused vodka with the bright, floral essence of limoncello and fresh lemon juice, creating a refreshing yet balanced experience that's perfect for summer sipping.

cocktail_specs.name: cosmic coral
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, layered highball that plays with the contrast of blue and red hues, creating a visually stunning 'coral' effect. This cocktail blends the crispness of lime and tonic water with the sweet, tropical notes of blue curaçao and grenadine, offering a refreshing yet slightly syrupy finish.

cocktail_specs.name: Ding a Ling
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki classic, the Ding a Ling is a harmonious blend of tart passion fruit, bright lime, and rich Galliano, balanced by vodka's clean finish. Created in the 1940s or 50s, it embodies the tropical, exotic spirit of tiki culture with its lush, layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime shell and a pineapple leaf

cocktail_specs.name: Blue Lagoon Original
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki classic, the Blue Lagoon is a harmonious blend of vodka, gin, and blue curaçao, sweetened with rich syrup and brightened by lime juice. Its striking azure hue and balanced tropical flavors make it a staple in tiki cocktails since its creation at Don the Beachcomber's Trader Vic's in the 1950s.

cocktail_specs.name: Water Lily
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and floral cocktail that captures the essence of spring, the Water Lily is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical notes with the vibrant tartness of hibiscus liqueur and lemon juice. Its name evokes imagery of serene gardens and blooming flowers, making it a perfect choice for those who appreciate refined, nature-inspired libations.
cocktail_specs.garnish: edible flower (e.g., water lily or rose petal)

cocktail_specs.name: corpse reviver variation
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex revival of the original Corpse Reviver, this variation replaces standard gin with pink gin, infusing it with sloe berry notes while maintaining its signature balance of citrus, herbal, and sweet elements. Created in the 1920s by Harry MacElhone at the London club of the same name, it remains a symbol of sophistication and intrigue.

cocktail_specs.name: White Lady
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and elegant cocktail, the White Lady is a sophisticated blend of floral gin, citrusy Triple Sec, and bright lemon juice. Originating in the 1920s during the Prohibition era, it was a favorite among high-society drinkers and remains a symbol of classic cocktails with its balanced sweetness and acidity.

cocktail_specs.name: long island iced tea
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward cocktail that packs a punch with its quadruple shot of liquor and sweet, tangy finish. Created in the late 1970s at the Long Island Cocktail Company, it's designed to be strong enough to mask the taste of cheaper alcohol while delivering a smooth, slightly bitter-sweet profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Blue Lagoon Modern
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, modern twist on the classic Blue Lagoon, this cocktail combines the smoothness of infused vodka with the bright, tropical notes of blue curaçao and citrus. It's a refreshing yet slightly boozy highball, perfect for sipping on warm days or as an aperitif.

cocktail_specs.name: scarlet knight
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail, the Scarlet Knight combines the bright tartness of cranberry syrup with the herbal depth of Ramazotti and the citrusy bite of lemon juice. The addition of Benedictine adds a rich, spiced complexity, creating a drink that is both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.garnish: cranberry twist and a lemon wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Alexander
cocktail_specs.description: A luxurious and creamy cocktail, the Alexander is a decadent blend of gin, chocolate syrup, and sweetened coconut cream. It's known for its smooth, velvety texture and rich flavor profile, making it a favorite among those who enjoy indulgent yet balanced cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Gimlet
cocktail_specs.description: A crisp, refreshing cocktail with a perfect balance of gin's botanical complexity and lime's bright acidity. Originating in the British Empire during the early 20th century, it was traditionally served to British officers stationed in tropical colonies like India.

cocktail_specs.name: Pisco Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and effervescent Peruvian classic, the Pisco Sour is a harmonious blend of crisp citrus, sweetness, and a delicate, frothy egg white foam. Born in Lima during the early 20th century, it became a symbol of celebration, often served at festive gatherings.

cocktail_specs.name: Southside
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and balanced cocktail from the Southside of Tiki culture, this drink harmonizes the botanical complexity of London Dry gin with bright citrus and aromatic bitters. Its name reflects its roots in the tropical tiki style, offering a smooth yet invigorating sip that's both nostalgic and modern.

cocktail_specs.name: Bee's Knees
cocktail_specs.description: A delightful and refreshing British classic, the Bee's Knees is a harmonious blend of bright lemon juice, smooth honey syrup, and London dry gin. Created in the early 20th century, this cocktail is a testament to the elegance of simplicity, with its balanced sweetness and citrusy zing.

cocktail_specs.name: Pink Lady
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Pink Lady is a refined blend of gin, Calvados, lemon juice, grenadine, and simple syrup, topped with a frothy egg white. Originating in the 1920s, it's known for its delicate balance of tart, sweet, and creamy elements, making it a timeless choice for special occasions.

cocktail_specs.name: High Five
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, citrus-forward cocktail with a playful name, the High Five is a modern twist on classic gin-based drinks. It balances the bright acidity of grapefruit and lime with the herbal complexity of London dry gin, creating a refreshing yet sophisticated sip that's perfect for brunch or daytime entertaining.

cocktail_specs.name: Jack Frost
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and complex winter cocktail, the Jack Frost combines the crisp brightness of blanco tequila with the lush sweetness of pear brandy, balanced by dry vermouth's herbal notes. It’s a modern twist on classic winter cocktails, often garnished with mint for an aromatic finish.

cocktail_specs.name: Monkey Gland
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Monkey Gland is a vibrant blend of gin's botanical depth, bright orange juice, and a touch of absinthe's herbal complexity. It was popularized in the 1930s by Donn Beach, who often used it to showcase his signature style with a dash of grenadine for color and sweetness.

cocktail_specs.name: Riff on King's Jubilee
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered riff on the classic King's Jubilee, this cocktail replaces the traditional champagne with a complex blend of mezcal, cognac, and Lillet, adding depth with maraschino, Averna, Suze, and aromatic bitters. It delivers a rich tapestry of smoky, herbal, and fruity notes, balanced by a subtle sweetness and a touch of cynar's artichoke bitterness.

cocktail_specs.name: Riff on Maximilian Affair
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex riff on the classic 'Maximilian Affair,' this cocktail layers smoky mezcal, floral St-Germain, and herbal lillet blanc with a touch of bitter Averna and Suze. It's a harmonious blend of smokiness, bitterness, and floral notes, perfect for those who appreciate intricate, layered cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Riff on Last Word
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Last Word, this cocktail replaces maraschino liqueur with Averna, adding a rich herbal complexity while retaining its signature balance of citrus and sweetness. It’s a sophisticated, spirit-forward drink that honors the original’s elegance but pushes it into bolder, more aromatic territory.

cocktail_specs.name: Apricot Mango Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical twist on a classic gin cocktail, this drink harmoniously blends the floral notes of gin with the sweet, lush flavors of apricot brandy liqueur and mango-passionfruit nektar. The bright acidity of lemon juice and the subtle bitterness of orange bitters add depth, making it a refreshing yet sophisticated choice for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.garnish: mango slice and apricot brandy float

cocktail_specs.name: Gimlet Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Gimlet, this highball version balances the bright citrus and botanical notes of gin with a touch of sweetness. It's a lighter, more refreshing take on the traditional stirred Gimlet, perfect for sipping on warm days.

cocktail_specs.name: Yukiguni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern Japanese twist on the classic Sidecar, the Yukiguni replaces Cognac with infused vodka, often featuring delicate floral or citrus notes. Its bright acidity and balanced sweetness make it a refreshing yet sophisticated choice, perfect for those who appreciate subtlety in their cocktails.

ingredients.name: vodka (infused with yuzu or other Japanese citrus)

cocktail_specs.garnish: yuzu twist or a thin lime wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Aviation
cocktail_specs.description: The Aviation is a sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that captures the essence of early aviation with its delicate blend of gin, lemon, maraschino, and crème de violette. Created in 1915 at the Aviation Bar in New York City, it was one of the first cocktails to feature crème de violette, giving it a distinctive floral note that sets it apart from other classics.

cocktail_specs.name: gin fizz
cocktail_specs.description: A classic American cocktail with a light, effervescent texture and a bright citrus profile. It originated in the late 19th century as an evolution of the Fizz family, combining gin's botanical complexity with lemon's zesty acidity and simple syrup's sweetness.

cocktail_specs.name: Star Daisy
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, citrus-forward cocktail with a floral twist, the Star Daisy is a classic tiki drink that balances sweet and tart flavors. Its name comes from its star-shaped presentation when served in a chilled coupe.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist and edible flower (e.g., orchid)

cocktail_specs.name: Between the Sheets
cocktail_specs.description: A smooth, citrus-forward cocktail with a playful name, 'Between the Sheets' is a refreshing blend of cognac, light rum, and triple sec, balanced by bright lemon juice. It's a modern twist on classic French and Caribbean influences, often associated with tiki culture.

cocktail_specs.name: the harlem
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and vibrant cocktail, The Harlem is a harmonious blend of London Dry Gin's botanical complexity with the sweet-tart essence of pineapple juice and Luxardo Maraschino liqueur. It was created to evoke the spirit of New York City, offering a refreshing yet balanced profile that is both nostalgic and modern.

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Gin Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant variation of the classic Gin Cocktail, this drink elevates its predecessor with a touch of absinthe, adding complexity and depth. It balances gin's botanical notes with the sweetness of rich syrup and maraschino, while Angostura bitters provide a subtle, aromatic finish.

cocktail_specs.name: martini
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless, elegant cocktail with a crisp, clean profile that balances the botanical complexity of gin with the subtle sweetness and citrus notes of Lillet Blanc. Originating in the early 20th century, the Martini is often associated with sophistication and refinement, though its exact origins remain debated.

cocktail_specs.name: bourbon amaro sour
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Amaro Sour, this cocktail replaces traditional amaro with Angostura and adds bourbon for a rich, spiced depth. It balances tart lemon, sweet simple syrup, and aromatic bitters, creating a harmonious blend of citrus brightness and warm, complex flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Vesper
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Vesper is a refined blend of gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc, with a touch of grapefruit bitters for a subtle citrus complexity. Popularized by James Bond in Ian Fleming's novels, it embodies the spirit of sophistication and intrigue.

cocktail_specs.name: Alaska
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Alaska is a harmonious blend of dry gin, Chartreuse, sherry, Suze, and orange bitters. Created in the late 19th century, it reflects the elegance and complexity of classic mixology, offering layers of herbal, citrus, and nutty notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin Lillet
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Gin Lillet is a harmonious blend of dry gin's botanical complexity and Lillet Blanc's delicate herbal notes, balanced by a touch of lemon juice. It originated in France as an aperitif, often served in the afternoon or as a pre-dinner drink, embodying the essence of Parisian sophistication.

cocktail_specs.name: Zentralfriedhof
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly melancholic cocktail inspired by the eerie beauty of Vienna's Zentralfriedhof cemetery. It combines the botanical complexity of gin with the sweet, fortified richness of Lillet, balanced by a whisper of absinthe and bright lemon juice, creating a drink that is both elegant and hauntingly unique.

cocktail_specs.name: corpse reviver no 2
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail born in the early 20th century, the Corpse Reviver No. 2 is a masterclass in balance—layering gin's botanical brightness with absinthe's herbal depth, Cointreau's citrus sweetness, Lillet Blanc's nutty richness, and lemon juice's zesty tang. It was famously championed by Harry Craddock at the Savoy Hotel and remains a benchmark for spirit-forward, high-proof cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: White Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, refreshing twist on the classic Negroni, this cocktail replaces Campari and sweet vermouth with Lillet Blanc and Suze, creating a lighter, more citrus-forward profile. It retains the balance of bitter and botanical elements while offering a brighter, more approachable character.

cocktail_specs.name: Great Gatsby
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and vibrant cocktail inspired by the opulence of the Roaring Twenties, the Great Gatsby combines smooth vodka with Lillet Blanc's herbal depth and a bright, citrusy grapefruit syrup. Its name evokes the glamour of F. Scott Fitzgerald's iconic novel, capturing the essence of the Jazz Age in every sip.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist and a lemon wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Ideal Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant variation of the classic Martini, the Ideal Martini incorporates a touch of orange bitters to enhance its complexity. It is known for its crisp, clean profile with a subtle citrus brightness that elevates the traditional gin and vermouth balance.

cocktail_specs.name: Vodka Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Martini, this version replaces gin with vodka for a smoother, more approachable profile while retaining its iconic elegance. It's often associated with James Bond and is typically served in a chilled coupe glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Vesper
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and iconic cocktail, the Vesper is a masterful blend of gin's botanical complexity, vodka's neutral elegance, and Lillet Blanc's floral depth. Created by Ian Fleming for James Bond in his novel 'Casino Royale,' it embodies the essence of refined espionage with its balanced sweetness and herbal notes.

cocktail_specs.name: brandy crusta
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Brandy Crusta is a refined blend of Cognac, citrus, and floral notes, topped with a sugar rim that adds a delicate sweetness. It originated in the early 20th century as a variation of the Sidecar, designed to be both refreshing and complex.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical cocktail born in the Caribbean, the Hurricane is a refreshing blend of Jamaican rum, passion fruit syrup, and lemon juice. Its name reflects its stormy appearance, often served in a tall, hurricane glass with a frothy top, making it a staple for summer gatherings.

cocktail_specs.name: Summer Daze
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical-inspired cocktail that balances the bright acidity of citrus and pineapple with the earthy depth of Suze. This refreshing drink is a modern twist on classic tiki flavors, perfect for warm weather gatherings.

cocktail_specs.name: pacific swizzle
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki classic, the Pacific Swizzle combines the bright acidity of lime with the tropical sweetness of passion fruit and thyme-infused syrup. It was popularized in the 1950s by Donn Beach, blending rum's warmth with a lush, herbal complexity that evokes the flavors of the South Pacific.

cocktail_specs.name: champs-elysees
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic French cocktail, the Champs-Élysées is a harmonious blend of Cognac's rich oak notes, Triple Sec's citrus brightness, Green Chartreuse's herbal complexity, and a touch of Ango Bitters for depth. It was created in the 1980s by cocktail historian David Wondrich, named after the famous Parisian avenue, embodying elegance and refinement.

cocktail_specs.name: Martinez
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet aperitivo, the Martinez is a precursor to the Gibson and a classic example of early cocktail craftsmanship. It combines gin's botanical complexity with red vermouth's richness, balanced by the subtle cherry notes of maraschino liqueur and the aromatic depth of Angostura bitters.

cocktail_specs.name: Flatiron Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic martini, the Flatiron Martini replaces gin with vodka and adds a touch of citrusy triple sec for a smoother, more approachable profile. Named after the iconic New York City skyscraper, this cocktail is known for its balanced sweetness and herbal notes.

cocktail_specs.name: gin blossom
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and aromatic cocktail that marries the floral notes of gin with the sweet, apricot-infused richness of eau-de-vie. Its name reflects its light, blossom-like character, making it a perfect choice for those who appreciate refined, layered flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Juniperotivo
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Juniperito, this cocktail replaces traditional vermouth with juniper syrup for a sweeter, more approachable profile. It balances the piney notes of gin and juniper with tart lime juice and a touch of grenadine, creating a refreshing yet complex sip.

cocktail_specs.name: Jam Cosmo
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Cosmopolitan, the Jam Cosmo replaces cranberry with a luscious jam syrup, delivering a sweet-tart balance that's both nostalgic and modern. Its bright citrus notes and subtle floral undertones make it a crowd-pleasing choice for those who love fruity yet sophisticated cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Suze Americano
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Americano, this cocktail replaces Campari with Suze, a French liqueur made from artichoke hearts. It offers a unique blend of herbal, bitter, and slightly sweet notes, making it a perfect aperitivo or pre-dinner drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Poet's Dream
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that marries the floral elegance of gin with the herbal depth of dry vermouth, elevated by the rich, spiced complexity of Benedictine. This drink is a celebration of balance, where citrus bitters add a subtle, bright contrast to the lush, layered flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Poet's Dream
cocktail_specs.description: A poetic fusion of gin, Benedictine liqueur, and dry vermouth, this cocktail offers a harmonious blend of floral, herbal, and caramelized notes. Its name evokes the romantic allure of literature, with layers of complexity that dance on the palate like verses in a sonnet.

cocktail_specs.name: Premium Rum Blend
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated blend of two Cuban rums, this cocktail offers a harmonious balance of light, crisp citrus notes and subtle caramel undertones. It's an elegant choice for sipping neat or as the base for more complex creations.

cocktail_specs.name: English Harbor 5
cocktail_specs.description: A robust and aromatic tiki-style cocktail that blends the bold, gunpowder-infused profile of Pusser's Navy Strength Gin with the rich caramel notes of El Dorado 12-year rum. This drink captures the essence of tropical exploration, offering a balance of spice, sweetness, and depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Duppy Share Spiced
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail that blends the tropical sweetness of pineapple with the spicy warmth of rum, creating a rich, layered experience. Inspired by Caribbean traditions, this drink is both refreshing and bold, perfect for those who enjoy a mix of fruity and aromatic notes.

cocktail_specs.name: White Russian
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and indulgent cocktail, the White Russian is a creamy blend of vodka, coffee liqueur, and heavy cream. Created in the early 1940s at the Metropol Hotel in Manhattan, it embodies the essence of comfort with its smooth, slightly sweet, and bittersweet profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Premium White
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant white rum cocktail, this drink showcases the smoothness of Bacardi Ron Superior with a touch of complexity from Banks 5, aged in black barrel. It's a versatile base for a variety of cocktails but stands well on its own when prepared simply.

cocktail_specs.name: Spanish Medium
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and aromatic Cuban cocktail, the Spanish Medium is a harmonious blend of light rum, Angostura bitters, and Flor de Cana, offering a refreshing balance of sweetness, spice, and citrus. It reflects the rich tiki tradition while embracing its Cuban roots.

cocktail_specs.name: English Medium
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic English Medium, this cocktail blends a harmonious mix of aged and unaged rums from Barbados and Jamaica. It offers a complex profile with notes of caramel, vanilla, and tropical fruit, balanced by subtle spice and oak, making it a versatile spirit-forward drink perfect for sipping or mixing.

cocktail_specs.name: dark rum
cocktail_specs.description: This cocktail is a bold and complex blend of dark rums, each contributing distinct character—from the smoky depth of Cuban rum to the rich caramel notes of aged Barbados rum. It’s a spirit-forward experience that highlights the diversity of dark rum profiles.

cocktail_specs.name: Demerara
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex rum cocktail that highlights the caramel, molasses, and spice notes of Demerara rum. This drink is a celebration of the deep, robust flavors of Guyanese Demerara rums, often aged in ex-bourbon barrels for a smooth yet bold profile.

cocktail_specs.name: OP Jamaican Unaged
cocktail_specs.description: A smooth, unaged Jamaican rum cocktail that captures the essence of tropical fruit and subtle spice. This drink is a celebration of the island's rum heritage, blending the bright citrus notes of Wray & Nephew with the smoky depth of Hampden Estate, creating a refreshing yet complex profile.

cocktail_specs.name: OP Jamaican Aged
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex rum cocktail that celebrates the depth of aged Jamaican rums, blending overproof intensity with smooth, barrel-aged richness. It's a spirit-forward experience that highlights the caramel, spice, and molasses notes of premium Jamaican and Barbados rums.
cocktail_specs.garnish: fresh lime wheel and rosemary sprig

cocktail_specs.name: OP demerara
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward tiki classic that marries the fiery intensity of Pusser's Overproof rum with the rich, caramel notes of Wood's 100 Scotch whisky. This cocktail is a celebration of overproof spirits, offering a complex balance of sweet, smoky, and molasses-like flavors, often served with a demerara syrup float for depth.

cocktail_specs.name: OP allround
cocktail_specs.description: A dynamic and versatile rum cocktail that showcases the complexity of overproof rums, blending the rich caramel notes of Jamaican rum with the bold spice of Demerara and the crisp brightness of Cuban rum. This drink is a celebration of rum's diversity, often served neat or on the rocks to highlight its depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Sipping English
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered rum cocktail that pays homage to the rich tradition of English sipping spirits, blending the smoothness of Doorly's with the depth of Mount Gay Black Barrel. It's a refined, spirit-forward drink designed for those who appreciate the nuanced flavors of aged rum.

cocktail_specs.name: Sipping Spanish
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, complex Cuban-style sipping rum cocktail that layers multiple expressions of Flor de Caña with Angostura bitters for depth and balance. It reflects the tradition of 'sipping' rums in Cuba, where different cask-aged styles are blended to create a harmonious experience.

cocktail_specs.name: Premium Spanish
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated blend of Cuban rums, this cocktail harmonizes the light, crisp character of Havana Seleccion de Maestros with the rich, molasses-forward depth of Brugal 1888. It's a nod to Spain’s rum heritage, often enjoyed neat or on the rocks for its complex layers of vanilla, caramel, and spice.

cocktail_specs.name: Pampero Aniversario
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-inspired cocktail, the Pampero Aniversario is a celebration of rum's diverse expressions, blending light, medium, aged, and solera styles. It delivers a rich tapestry of caramel, spice, oak, and molasses notes, with a touch of Scotch whisky for depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Pampero Anniversario
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, layered Cuban rum cocktail celebrating the anniversary of Flor de Caña's founding. It combines three distinct Cuban rums—Angostura 1919, Flor de Caña, and Santiago de Cuba—with a touch of bitters, creating a complex profile of vanilla, caramel, and aromatic depth.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist and a sprinkle of Angostura bitters on the rim

cocktail_specs.name: Havana Seleccion de Maestros
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex Cuban rum cocktail that showcases the depth of aged Brugal 1888, balanced with a touch of lighter Bacardi. This drink is a celebration of Cuba's rum heritage, blending caramel, vanilla, and spice notes with a smooth, velvety texture.

cocktail_specs.name: Aged Agricole
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated blend of aged Martinique rum and Cuban rhums, this cocktail celebrates the depth and complexity of agricole expressions. It combines the rich caramel and spice notes of St James VSOP with the smoky intensity of Rhum J.M FUMÉE VOLCANIQUE, balanced by the fruity brightness of Rhum J.M JARDIN FRUITÉ.

cocktail_specs.name: Aged Jamaican
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex rum cocktail that highlights the depth of aged Jamaican and Barbados rums, blending caramelized molasses, dried fruit, and subtle spice notes. This drink is a celebration of rum's terroir, offering layers of flavor that evolve with each sip.

cocktail_specs.name: Highball 1:4
cocktail_specs.description: A simple yet refreshing American classic, the Highball 1:4 is a harmonious blend of bourbon and soda water, often served over ice. This ratio (1 part whiskey to 4 parts soda) creates a light, effervescent drink that's perfect for sipping on warm days or as an aperitif.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Old Fashioned is a harmonious blend of rich bourbon or rye whiskey, sweet demerara syrup, and aromatic bitters. It embodies simplicity and sophistication, with its deep caramel, vanilla, and spice notes, often garnished with an orange peel for a bright citrus aroma.

cocktail_specs.name: Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and versatile cocktail, the Sour is a harmonious blend of whiskey's warmth, lemon juice's bright acidity, and sugar syrup's sweetness, often finished with a silky egg white foam. Originating in the early 20th century, it has evolved into countless variations but remains a staple for its balanced, refreshing character.

cocktail_specs.name: Rob Roy
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the Manhattan, the Rob Roy replaces rye whiskey with Scotch, offering a richer, more malt-forward profile. Named after the 18th-century Scottish outlaw Robert MacGregor (Rob Roy), this cocktail is a staple in classic cocktails, balancing sweet and bitter notes with a touch of herbal complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Ti Punch (60-5-8 rum-sugar-lime)
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and no-nonsense French Polynesian classic, the Ti Punch is a potent blend of Naga Arrack, sugar, and lime juice. Traditionally served in a coconut shell or small glass with a straw, it's known for its simplicity and strength, embodying the spirit of tiki culture.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel or shell (traditionally served in a coconut shell)

cocktail_specs.name: corpse reviver 2
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki classic, the Corpse Reviver No. 2 is a masterful blend of gin, amaro, and citrus, delivering a symphony of herbal, floral, and tart notes. Created in the 1970s by Donn Beach, it’s a spirit-forward cocktail that embodies the adventurous spirit of tiki culture.

cocktail_specs.name: Martini 6:1 (45-8-1)
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant classic, the Martini 6:1 is a harmonious marriage of dry gin and vermouth, with a precise ratio that highlights the spirit's botanical complexity while maintaining a clean, crisp finish. This variation leans slightly more towards gin than traditional martinis, offering a bolder, more assertive character.

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins 60-30-15-1-60 lemon
cocktail_specs.description: A crisp, refreshing classic from the late 19th century, the Tom Collins is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical notes, tart lemon juice, and sweet simple syrup, topped with effervescent soda water. It's said to have been invented in London in the 1860s or 70s, possibly named after the Tom & Jerry club or the Tom Collins music hall performer.

cocktail_specs.name: White Negroni 45-30-23-1 (grapefruit)
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, citrus-forward twist on the classic Negroni, this cocktail replaces sweet vermouth with Lillet Blanc to brighten the profile with grapefruit's zesty acidity. It maintains the original's bold structure but offers a refreshing, slightly tart contrast that makes it a standout aperitivo.

cocktail_specs.name: Dark Rum
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex sipping experience, this Dark Rum cocktail captures the deep, molasses-rich profile of aged rum with a touch of smokiness. It’s a spirit-forward drink that highlights the caramel, vanilla, and spice notes inherent in dark rums, often enjoyed neat for its pure expression.

cocktail_specs.name: Martini 6:1 (45-8-1)
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Martini 6:1 is a refined balance of gin's botanical complexity and dry vermouth's subtle herbal notes. This variation, with a 6-to-1 ratio of gin to vermouth, emphasizes clarity and precision, making it a staple for those who appreciate classic cocktails with a modern twist.

cocktail_specs.name: White Negroni 45-30-23-1 (grapefruit)
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this version replaces sweet vermouth with a grapefruit-infused spirit, delivering a vibrant citrus-forward profile with a bright, effervescent finish. It retains the signature bitterness and complexity of Campari while introducing a refreshing, zesty contrast.

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins 60-30-15-1-60 lemon
cocktail_specs.description: A crisp, effervescent classic with a perfect balance of gin's botanical complexity and bright, zesty lemon. This modern twist on the traditional Tom Collins incorporates a precise ratio (60-30-15-1-60) to enhance its refreshing yet sophisticated character, often served in a tall, chilled glass with a splash of soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Saturn 45-15-15-8-8
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Vesper, the Saturn 45-15-15-8-8 is a sophisticated blend of gin and vermouth, elevated by the addition of Lillet Blanc and a touch of lemon. It offers a refined balance of botanical, citrus, and herbal notes, making it an ideal choice for those who appreciate complexity in their cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Whiskey Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A simple yet refreshing American classic, the Whiskey Highball is a harmonious blend of smooth whiskey and effervescent soda water. It originated in the early 20th century as a way to dilute whiskey for a lighter, more approachable sip, often garnished with lemon or lime.

cocktail_specs.name: Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Cuban classic, the Daiquiri is a refreshing and balanced cocktail with a crisp, citrus-forward profile. Born in the early 20th century at the Daiquiri Mine in Cuba, it showcases the bright acidity of lime juice, the smooth sweetness of rich syrup, and the clean, unaged character of white rum.

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Mai Tai is a symphony of tropical flavors—rich rum, citrus, and nutty orgeat—balanced with a touch of sweetness. Originating in 1940s California, it’s said to have been named after a Tahitian prostitute, embodying the exotic allure of Polynesian mythology.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Old Fashioned is a harmonious blend of rich bourbon or rye whiskey, sweet demarara syrup, and aromatic bitters. It embodies simplicity and sophistication, with its deep caramel, vanilla, and citrus notes, often garnished with an orange peel twist.

cocktail_specs.name: Martini 6:1
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Martini 6:1 is a testament to the art of balance between gin's botanical complexity and vermouth's subtle sweetness. The name reflects its precise ratio (6 parts gin to 1 part vermouth), making it a classic choice for those who appreciate a clean, crisp, and spirit-forward drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Oaxaca Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail marries the smoky depth of mezcal with the bright agave sweetness of tequila. Hailing from Oaxaca, Mexico, it’s a celebration of regional flavors—smoldering smoke, citrusy bitterness, and a touch of grapefruit’s tangy punch—served neat on the rocks for a sophisticated sip.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and a flamed grapefruit peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Cognac Cocktail (Sazerac)
cocktail_specs.description: A pre-Prohibition classic, the Sazerac is a sophisticated blend of cognac, bittersweet syrup, and aromatic bitters, served over ice in a Sazerac-style copper mug. It predates the Old Fashioned but shares its spirit-forward elegance, with absinthe adding an herbal complexity that was once more common in American cocktails.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist and three Luxardo cherries

cocktail_specs.name: Ti Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A simple yet profound Polynesian elixir, the Ti Punch is a testament to the art of minimalism in mixology. Born in Tahiti, this three-ingredient cocktail balances the sweetness of rich syrup with the tart brightness of lime juice and the smooth warmth of white rum, often served in a coconut shell for an authentic experience.

cocktail_specs.name: Corn n Oil
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki classic, Corn 'n Oil is a rich blend of dark rum and velvet falernum, offering deep caramel, spice, and molasses notes. It’s a staple in tiki cocktails, known for its ability to stand alone or as a base for more elaborate drinks.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist or flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Manhattan is a sophisticated blend of rich Scotch whisky, sweet vermouth, and aromatic bitters. Its deep amber hue and smooth, slightly bitter profile make it a staple in cocktail culture since its inception in the late 19th century at New York's Manhattan Club.

cocktail_specs.name: Rob Roy
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and spirit-forward twist on the Whiskey Sour, the Rob Roy replaces bourbon with Scotch whisky, adding depth with maraschino liqueur and aromatic bitters. Named after a legendary Scottish outlaw, this cocktail balances rich, smoky whisky with sweet and herbal notes, making it a timeless choice for whisky enthusiasts.

cocktail_specs.name: White Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, refreshing twist on the classic Negroni, this cocktail replaces sweet vermouth with blanc vermouth and adds Suze for a lighter, more citrus-forward profile. It retains the bittersweet balance of its predecessor while offering a brighter, more approachable character.

cocktail_specs.name: gin and tonic
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and refreshing colonial-era drink, the gin and tonic is a harmonious marriage of botanical complexity from London dry gin and the effervescent bitterness of tonic water. Originally crafted as a medicinal remedy to prevent malaria in British India, it has since become a symbol of sophistication and ease.

cocktail_specs.name: New York Minute
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex American cocktail, the New York Minute is a harmonious blend of smoky tequila reposado, herbal amaro vermouth, sweet maraschino liqueur, and rich syrup, finished with a whisper of barrel bitters. Created in the early 21st century, it embodies the spirit of modern mixology while paying homage to classic techniques.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and a cherry skewered on a cocktail pick

cocktail_specs.name: Le General
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and versatile French cocktail, Le General is a harmonious blend of Cognac, Lillet Blanc, Benedictine, and Peychaud's bitters. It was created by the legendary mixologist Ernest Hemingway in the 1930s at the Ritz Bar in Paris, known for its balanced sweetness and herbal complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: El Presidente
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant Cuban classic, the El Presidente is a harmonious blend of aged rum's caramel and spice notes with the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc and the citrusy brightness of Dry Curacao. A dash of grenadine adds a subtle sweetness, making it a perfect cocktail for sipping or savoring.

cocktail_specs.name: Highball 1:4
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant highball, the 1:4 is a harmonious blend of Chivas Regal's rich, velvety notes and Monkey Shoulder's bold, smoky character. It represents a modern twist on the classic highball, offering depth and complexity without overpowering the palate.

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned 60-7-2-1
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this variation balances four distinct whiskies in a precise ratio (60% Chivas Regal, 7% Monkey Shoulder, 2% Woodford Reserve, and 1% other spirits) to create a rich, layered experience with notes of vanilla, caramel, oak, and subtle smokiness. It’s a spirit-forward cocktail that honors tradition while pushing boundaries.

cocktail_specs.name: Sour 60-23-15-1 (lemon ango)
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Sour, this variation incorporates a unique ratio of naked malt and rye whisky, balanced with lemon juice and sweetener. It's a spirit-forward cocktail that highlights the complexity of peated Scotch and rye, offering a harmonious blend of smoky, fruity, and slightly sweet notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Rob Roy 60-30-5-1-1
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Rob Roy, this version replaces traditional rye whisky with a delicate Japanese blended whisky and a small dose of corn whisky for depth. It's a spirit-forward cocktail that highlights the nuanced flavors of Suntory Toki while maintaining the balance of the original.

cocktail_specs.name: Tonic 1:4
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant twist on the classic Tonic Water cocktail, this version balances the botanical complexity of a premium London Dry Gin with the smooth caramel notes of a light Cuban rum. The ratio of 1 part gin to 4 parts tonic water creates a refreshing yet sophisticated profile, perfect for sipping slowly.

cocktail_specs.name: Martini 6:1 (45-8-1)
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Martini, this version replaces traditional vermouth with a vibrant blend of Sardinian citrus and grapefruit elderflower liqueur. It maintains the iconic 6:1 ratio but introduces a bright, floral, and slightly tart profile that challenges the conventional dry Martini experience.

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins 60-30-15-1-60 lemon
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Tom Collins, this version incorporates a White Negroni base for added complexity. The balance of gin, lemon, and soda creates a crisp, refreshing cocktail with a touch of bitterness from the vermouth.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum and Coke
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless, spirit-forward cocktail that marries the rich caramel and spice notes of Jamaican rum with the effervescent sweetness of cola. Born in the British Caribbean, this drink is a staple for those seeking a bold yet approachable sip, often enjoyed as an aperitif or a refreshing afternoon pick-me-up.

cocktail_specs.name: Tequila and Beer
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward cocktail that marries the smoky agave notes of blanco tequila with the crisp, malty depth of a well-chosen beer. This simple yet satisfying drink is a staple in Mexican cantinas and modern tiki bars alike, offering a refreshing contrast of sweet, earthy, and effervescent flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Hot Toddy
cocktail_specs.description: A comforting and warming classic, the Hot Toddy is a harmonious blend of cognac's rich oak notes, bright lemon zest, and sweet syrup. Originating in England during the 18th century, it was traditionally served to soothe colds and coughs, making it a timeless remedy for chilly evenings.

cocktail_specs.name: Tom Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent classic, the Tom Collins is a perfect marriage of gin's botanical complexity with bright lemon juice and sweet syrup, topped with soda water. Originating in London in the late 19th century, it’s often credited as one of the first true highball cocktails, balancing citrus, sweetness, and effervescence with effortless elegance.

cocktail_specs.name: Margarita
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless Mexican-American classic, the Margarita is a harmonious blend of tequila's agave sweetness, triple sec's citrus notes, and lime juice's bright acidity. It was invented in the 1930s at the Rancho La Gloria in Ensenada, Mexico, and has since become one of the most popular cocktails worldwide.

cocktail_specs.name: Sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless French cocktail born during World War I, the Sidecar is a harmonious blend of rich cognac, sweet orange liqueur, and bright lemon juice. Its name is said to derive from its origins as a 'side car' for soldiers returning from battle, offering solace with its balanced sweetness and citrus zing.

cocktail_specs.name: Jet Pilot
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Jet Pilot is a celebration of rum's diversity, blending dark Jamaican, Puerto Rican gold, and overproof Demerara rums with citrus, spice, and herbal elements. Created by Donn Beach in the 1950s, it's known for its layered flavors—bitter absinthe, aromatic falernum, and a touch of Angostura bitters—balancing sweetness from cinnamon syrup and grapefruit juice.

cocktail_specs.name: Nicaraguan Jet Pilot
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki classic, the Nicaraguan Jet Pilot is a layered blend of Flor de Caña rum expressions, citrus, spice, and aromatic bitters. It was created in Nicaragua to showcase the country's diverse rum styles, offering a rich, caramel-forward profile with bright citrus and herbal notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Bali Bali
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical tiki classic with a complex blend of rums, citrus, and exotic syrups. Created in the 1950s by Donn Beach, it captures the essence of Polynesian flavors while incorporating European spirits like cognac and gin.

cocktail_specs.name: Bolo
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail from Puerto Rico, the Bolo harmonizes medium-bodied Puerto Rican rum with aged rhum agricole, delivering a tropical yet sophisticated profile. Its layers of pineapple, passion fruit, lime, and honey create a balanced sweetness with subtle herbal depth, making it both refreshing and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a sprinkle of Tajín or chili salt

cocktail_specs.name: Cobra's Fang
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, Cobra's Fang is a fiery blend of overproof demerara rum, falernum, and absinthe, balanced by citrus and passion fruit. Its name reflects its potent kick, often served with a dramatic flair to match its intensity.
cocktail_specs.garnish: flamed orange peel or a pineapple leaf

cocktail_specs.name: Cocoanut Grove
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, creamy delight with a smooth balance of light rum's sweetness and citrus brightness, elevated by the nutty richness of coconut cream. This cocktail is a nod to the lush, exotic vibes of tiki culture, often associated with the golden age of cocktails in the 1940s and 50s.

cocktail_specs.name: Doga Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Caribbean-inspired punch that blends the rich, caramel notes of aged Martinique rhum with bright grapefruit juice and a touch of spicy cinnamon syrup. This cocktail is a modern twist on traditional fruit punches, offering a harmonious balance of sweet, sour, and aromatic flavors.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist and a cinnamon stick

cocktail_specs.name: Eastern Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic sour, the Eastern Sour replaces traditional egg white with orgeat, adding a nutty richness that complements the bright citrus and bourbon. It balances sweet, tart, and herbal notes, making it a sophisticated yet approachable cocktail perfect for sipping.

cocktail_specs.name: Fog Cutter
cocktail_specs.description: A robust and warming cocktail born in the chilly climes of the Caribbean, the Fog Cutter is a masterful blend of Puerto Rican rum, brandy, and gin, sweetened with orange juice and almond orgeat. It was created to cut through the dense fog that often shrouds the islands, offering a rich, spiced, and slightly nutty profile with a velvety amontillado sherry float.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and a sprinkle of nutmeg

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical storm of flavors, the Hurricane is a refreshing blend of dark Jamaican rum, zesty lemon juice, and sweet passion fruit syrup. Originating in New Orleans, this cocktail is often served over crushed ice in a hurricane glass, making it a staple for summer gatherings.

cocktail_specs.name: Chief Lapu Lapu
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail that pays homage to the legendary Filipino warrior, Chief Lapu-Lapu. It harmonizes rich dark Jamaican rum with crisp Puerto Rican rum, bright citrus, and tropical passion fruit, creating a balanced yet adventurous profile that’s both refreshing and spirit-forward.
cocktail_specs.garnish: fresh passion fruit pulp and a flamed orange wheel

cocktail_specs.name: El Diablo
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and vibrant Mexican classic, the El Diablo combines smoky Tequila with the deep, jammy richness of crème de cassis and a bright lime twist. It’s finished with ginger beer for a spicy, effervescent kick that balances its sweet and tart elements.

cocktail_specs.name: Painkiller (Beachbum Berry)
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical classic with a creamy, fruity profile, the Painkiller is a soothing blend of rum, pineapple juice, orange juice, and coconut cream. Originating from the South Seas in the 1930s, it's often associated with tiki culture and beachside relaxation.

ingredients.name: pusser's navy strength (or split dark jamaican rum and dark barbados rum)

cocktail_specs.name: Polynesian Paralysis
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical cocktail with a smooth yet potent kick, the Polynesian Paralysis combines bourbon or rye whiskey with pineapple and orange juices for a sweet, citrus-forward profile. The addition of orgeat adds a nutty depth, while lemon juice and simple syrup balance the mix, creating a drink that's both refreshing and complex.

cocktail_specs.name: Royal Hawaiian Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A lush, tropical twist on the classic Mai Tai, this version incorporates both light and dark rums for depth, balanced with sweet curacao and citrus juices. It’s a vibrant, slightly nutty interpretation of the tiki staple, perfect for sipping in warm weather.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Barrel
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical cocktail that layers the rich, smoky depth of overproof rum with the bright acidity and sweetness of citrus and passion fruit. This drink is a modern take on classic tiki flavors, designed to be both refreshing and complex, perfect for sipping in warm weather.

cocktail_specs.name: Scorpion
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Caribbean cocktail, the Scorpion is a bright blend of light Puerto Rican rum, citrus juices, and almond syrup. Its name comes from its striking red-orange hue, reminiscent of a scorpion's exoskeleton, and it delivers a harmonious balance of sweet, tart, and nutty flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Suffering Bastard
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail born in the wilds of Australia, the Suffering Bastard is a masterful blend of London dry gin, brandy, and ginger beer, balanced by lime juice and demerara syrup. Its name reflects its rugged origins, but its refined flavors—spicy, citrusy, and slightly sweet—make it a standout in any drink menu.

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical masterpiece born in the tiki era, the Mai Tai is a lush symphony of rum, citrus, and nutty sweetness, often crowned with a lime husk and mint. Created by Victor Bergeron at Trader Vic's in the late 1940s or early 1950s, it embodies the adventurous spirit of Polynesian-inspired cocktails.

ingredients.name: apleton estate extra or coruba dark

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane Caesar
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Hurricane, this version swaps traditional grenadine for orgeat and adds a touch of passion fruit syrup. It balances the sweetness of almond with the tartness of lime, creating a rich, tropical profile that's both refreshing and indulgent.

cocktail_specs.name: Painkiller (Eastern Standard)
cocktail_specs.description: A lush, tropical twist on the classic Painkiller, this version elevates the original with a sophisticated blend of aged and overproof rums. It offers a harmonious balance of sweet pineapple, bright orange, and creamy coconut, with a subtle depth from the rum's complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Montego Bay
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Montego Bay is a celebration of Jamaican rum's rich, molasses-forward profile, balanced by bright grapefruit juice, tart lime, and a touch of absinthe. Its name evokes the tropical allure of Jamaica, where dark rums and allspice are celebrated, while the honey syrup and bitters add depth and complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Port Light (Smuggler's Cove)
cocktail_specs.description: A deceptively simple yet deeply layered cocktail, the Port Light is a tribute to coastal smuggler lore. It marries the rich, oaky depth of bourbon with bright citrus and tropical passion fruit, balanced by a touch of honey syrup for a subtle sweetness that evokes both adventure and sophistication.

cocktail_specs.name: Mr Bali Hai
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Mr. Bali Hai is a celebration of rum's versatility, blending light Cuban, aged Barbados, and unaged Jamaican expressions with rich coffee liqueur and tropical juices. Its name evokes the exotic allure of the South Pacific, reflecting its adventurous spirit and layered flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Royal Hawaiian Mai Tai 1956
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Royal Hawaiian Mai Tai is a symphony of tropical flavors with a rich history. It balances the sweetness of orgeat and curacao with the tangy bite of lime juice and the depth of aged rum, creating a drink that's both refreshing and complex.

cocktail_specs.name: Royal Hawaiian Mai Tai 1990
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and balanced evolution of the classic Mai Tai, this 1990s version from the Royal Hawaiian Hotel in Waikiki replaces traditional orgeat with Myers's rum for a richer, more complex profile. It retains the tropical sweetness and citrus brightness while adding depth with aged Jamaican rum.

cocktail_specs.name: Saturn
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and aromatic tiki-style cocktail, the Saturn blends the piney notes of dry gin with the warm, spiced sweetness of falernum and the tropical tang of passion fruit syrup. Its name reflects its layered depth, much like the planet it's named after.

cocktail_specs.name: Test Pilot
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail that marries the deep caramel and spice of dark Jamaican rum with the crisp brightness of light Puerto Rican rum, creating a layered experience. The addition of falernum and Cointreau adds a lush, tropical sweetness, while lime juice and Angostura bitters bring balance and depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Thee Dots and a Dash
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, aromatic tiki classic that layers the deep caramel notes of aged Martinique rum with the bold spice of allspice dram and falernum. Its name reflects the three distinct layers of color—golden, amber, and dark—that form when built over crushed ice, crowned by a dash of Angostura bitters.
cocktail_specs.garnish: flamed orange peel or a cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Navy Grog
cocktail_specs.description: A robust and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Navy Grog is a celebration of rum's versatility, blending overproof demerara, aged Jamaican, and light Cuban rums with bright citrus and herbal honey. It harks back to the naval tradition of grog, originally spiked water for sailors, but modernized with layered flavors and effervescence.

cocktail_specs.name: Don's Beach Planter
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical tiki classic with a rich blend of aged rums and citrus, balanced by the herbal complexity of absinthe. Originating from Donn Beach in the 1950s, this cocktail is a staple for its lush pineapple and passion fruit flavors, often served over crushed ice for a refreshing, indulgent experience.
cocktail_specs.garnish: pineapple leaf, orange wheel, maraschino cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Port Light (Beachbum Berry)
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Port & Lemonade, this cocktail combines bourbon's rich caramel and oak with the zesty tang of lemon juice and the sweet, fruity depth of passion fruit syrup. It's a refreshing, slightly boozy drink that captures the essence of summer with its layered flavors—bright, tart, and just a touch of berry sweetness.

cocktail_specs.name: Royal Hawaiian Mai Tai 1972
cocktail_specs.description: A lush, tropical masterpiece from the legendary Trader Vic's, this 1972 iteration of the Mai Tai is a symphony of rums, citrus, and nutty orgeat. It balances sweet pineapple and orange with tart lime and lemon, topped with a whisper of mint, offering a sophisticated yet approachable tiki experience.

cocktail_specs.name: Zombie
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic with a complex, layered profile that balances rich rum, tart citrus, and aromatic bitters. Originating in the 1930s at Don the Beachcomber's Tiki Room, this potent cocktail is known for its deep amber hue and lingering warmth from cinnamon and angostura.

cocktail_specs.name: Shrunken Skull
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki classic, the Shrunken Skull is a harmonious blend of overproof rums, tart lime juice, and sweet grenadine, layered with spicy cinnamon syrup. Its name comes from its traditional presentation in a shrunken head, often served with a flaming mint garnish.

cocktail_specs.name: QB Cooler (Beachbum Berry)
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic QB Cooler, this version incorporates black rum and passion fruit syrup for a lusciously sweet and complex profile. It's a staple of tiki culture, blending citrus brightness with herbal depth, often served with crushed ice to enhance its refreshing character.

cocktail_specs.name: QB Cooler (Don the Beachcomber)
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, refreshing tiki classic that pays homage to Don the Beachcomber's signature drink. This layered cocktail combines light and dark rums with falernum for a rich, spiced depth, balanced by citrus juices, honey syrup, and ginger syrup, all topped with soda water for a crisp finish.

cocktail_specs.name: 151 Swizzle
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic tiki-style cocktail, the 151 Swizzle is a fiery blend of overproof demerara rum, absinthe, lime juice, sugar syrup, and Angostura bitters. Named after the 151-proof rum it often features, this drink delivers a complex mix of sweet, bitter, herbal, and spicy notes, traditionally served with crushed ice and garnished with nutmeg and cinnamon.

cocktail_specs.name: Dr. Funk
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail that balances the funky, fermented notes of rhum agricole with bright citrus and a touch of absinthe's herbal complexity. Created by Dr. Funk himself, this drink is a celebration of bold flavors and tropical influences.

cocktail_specs.name: Doctor Funk
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and refreshing twist on the classic Doctor, this cocktail replaces traditional orange liqueur with absinthe, adding a complex herbal depth. It's a vibrant blend of sweet, sour, and herbal notes, perfect for those who love a touch of anise and bitterness in their tropical drinks.

cocktail_specs.name: Dr. Funk (Trader Vic)
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Dr. Funk is a masterful blend of dark rum's rich caramel and spice notes with the herbal complexity of absinthe, balanced by bright citrus and a touch of raspberry sweetness. Created by Trader Vic Berarducci in the 1950s, this drink embodies the adventurous spirit of tiki culture.

ingredients.name: dark jamaican or aged martinique rum

cocktail_specs.name: Ted's Fog Cutter
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and aromatic tiki classic, Ted's Fog Cutter is a masterful blend of aged rum, gin, and fortified wines, balanced with citrus juices and nutty orgeat. It was created by Ted Haigh, a renowned mixologist, to cut through the chill of foggy nights in tropical settings.

cocktail_specs.name: 151 Swizzle
cocktail_specs.description: A fiery, tropical twist on the classic 151 rum cocktail, this swizzled delight delivers a bold punch of overproof Demerara rum with bright citrus and aromatic bitters. Originating from tiki culture, it’s a spirit-forward, refreshing sip that balances sweetness, heat, and complexity.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime shell or a flamed lime wheel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Big Mama
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki classic, the Big Mama is a spirit-forward rum cocktail that balances rich, molasses-forward Cuban rum with overproof Jamaican rum, aromatic bitters, and a touch of sweetness. It's a celebration of rum's depth, often garnished with flambéed fruit for dramatic presentation.

cocktail_specs.name: Fog Cutter
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki classic, the Fog Cutter is a symphony of rums, spirits, and citrus, designed to cut through the chill like its namesake. Originating from the tropical tiki culture of the mid-20th century, it balances sweet, sour, and aromatic elements with a touch of bitters for depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Trader Vic
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki masterpiece, the Trader Vic is a symphony of tropical and citrus notes, blending rich rums, brandy, gin, and sherry with a touch of aromatic bitters. Created by Victor Bergeron at Trader Vic's in the 1950s, this cocktail embodies the spirit of Polynesian hospitality and adventurous mixology.

cocktail_specs.name: Fogg Cutter
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and refreshing tiki classic, the Fogg Cutter is a harmonious blend of gins, rums, brandy, citrus juices, and syrups. It was created by Donn Beach in the 1940s at his Hollywood Coconut Grove restaurant, embodying the spirit of tropical indulgence with its layered flavors of spice, sweetness, and tart citrus.

cocktail_specs.name: Beachbum Berry
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, fruit-forward twist on the classic Beachbum cocktail, this version infuses rich berry notes with tropical rum and citrus. It's a refreshing, slightly tart drink that balances sweetness and acidity, perfect for summer sipping.

cocktail_specs.name: Hurricane
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tropical cocktail, the Hurricane is a bold blend of dark Jamaican rum, passion fruit syrup, and lemon juice. Originating from the Tiki era, it’s known for its intense fruity-sweet profile with a touch of tartness, often served in a tall, hurricane glass to showcase its layered colors.

cocktail_specs.name: Jet Pilot
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward tiki classic that packs a punch with its layered complexity of dark Jamaican rum, overproof Demerara, and gold Puerto Rican rum. Balanced with citrus, spice, and herbal notes from falernum and Angostura bitters, it's a cocktail designed for those who love intensity and depth.
cocktail_specs.garnish: flamed orange peel or cinnamon quill

cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered tiki masterpiece, the 5* is a symphony of Cuban rum expressions, citrus, spice, and herbal bitters. It balances sweet, sour, and aromatic notes with precision, evoking the depth of tropical forests and the warmth of Caribbean spices.

cocktail_specs.name: Worthy Park 109
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Worthy Park 109 is a masterful blend of dark Jamaican rum, overproof Demerara, and Puerto Rican gold, layered with citrus brightness from lime and grapefruit. It's elevated by the aromatic depth of falernum and a whisper of absinthe, creating a drink that's both nostalgic and modern.

cocktail_specs.name: Barbados 5
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, layered tiki classic that blends the rich caramel notes of Flor de Caña with the bright acidity of lime and grapefruit. Created in the 1940s by Donn Beach at the Hollywood Coconut Grove, this cocktail is a celebration of tropical flavors, often garnished with a flaming orange peel for dramatic flair.

cocktail_specs.name: OFTD
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward tiki classic that marries the richness of dark Jamaican rum with the bright acidity of grapefruit and lime. Its layered complexity—spiced, herbal, and slightly bitter—makes it a standout in the tiki repertoire, often associated with the adventurous side of cocktail culture.

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Mai Tai is a symphony of rich Jamaican and Cuban rums, citrus, and tropical flavors. Its name is said to mean 'strong' or 'good' in Tahitian, reflecting its bold character. This version layers multiple aged and unaged rums with lime, orange curacao, and almond syrup for depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Mai Tai (amaro)
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Mai Tai, this version incorporates pineapple amaro to add a rich, fruity depth while retaining the cocktail's signature balance of sweet, sour, and herbal notes. The use of aged Wray & Nephew rum introduces caramelized complexity, making it a sophisticated yet approachable tiki-style drink.

A complex and layered tiki-style cocktail, the 5.5 is a harmonious blend of rum, amaro, and citrus, with a touch of sweetness from orgeat. It pays homage to the intricacy of classic tiki drinks while incorporating modern techniques.

cocktail_specs.name: 1956 Royal Hawaiian Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the 1956 Royal Hawaiian Mai Tai is a harmonious blend of Puerto Rican and Jamaican rums, balanced with citrus, nutty orgeat, and Curacao. It was perfected at Trader Vic's in 1954 but gained its 'Royal' moniker later, embodying the lush, tropical spirit of Polynesian hospitality.

cocktail_specs.name: Montego Bay
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Montego Bay combines smoky Cuban rum with bright grapefruit and lime juices, balanced by honey syrup and spiced bitters. Its name evokes the tropical allure of Jamaica, where Coruba Dark rum is crafted, offering a rich, aromatic experience that bridges the gap between classic and modern tiki styles.

cocktail_specs.name: Plantation Xaymaca
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail that marries the bold, spicy character of Jamaican rum with the rich, molasses notes of Barbados rum. The addition of rauch lime and grapefruit syrup introduces a smoky citrus brightness, while allspice dram and absinthe add depth and intrigue.

cocktail_specs.name: Navy Grog
cocktail_specs.description: A robust and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Navy Grog is a celebration of rum's diverse expressions—light Puerto Rican, dark Jamaican, and overproof Demerara—balanced with citrus juices, honey syrup, and topped with club soda. It evokes the spirit of naval tradition while delivering a harmonious blend of sweet, tart, and molasses-rich flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: mine
