cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex rum cocktail that blends the brightness of citrus with the depth of aged and overproof rums, creating a harmonious balance of sweet, tart, and smoky notes. This drink is a celebration of rum's versatility, featuring a mix of Cuban, Jamaican, and Barbados expressions.

cocktail_specs.name: Bali Bali
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki classic, the Bali Bali is a harmonious fusion of dark Jamaican rum, light rum, gin, and cognac, balanced with tropical juices and passion fruit syrup. Its name reflects its exotic appeal, often garnished with a pineapple leaf or cherry to enhance its tropical allure.

cocktail_specs.name: Painkiller
cocktail_specs.description: A creamy, tropical concoction born in the heart of Tiki culture, the Painkiller is a soothing blend of rum, pineapple juice, orange juice, and coconut cream. It was popularized by Donn Beach at his legendary Trader Vic's restaurant in the 1940s, offering a refreshing escape with its velvety texture and sweet, citrusy allure.

cocktail_specs.name: Minimalist Tiki
cocktail_specs.description: A deceptively simple yet rich tiki-style cocktail, this drink balances the deep caramel and spice of dark Jamaican rum with the bright acidity of pineapple and orange juices. A touch of coconut cream adds a creamy contrast without overpowering the tropical flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: mixel
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex rum cocktail that blends multiple aged and overproof rums, creating a rich tapestry of flavors—from deep caramel and spice to bright citrus. This drink is a celebration of rum's diversity, often associated with tiki culture but equally at home in modern mixology.

A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the 3* is a celebration of rum's diverse expressions, blending aged, overproof, and light rums with tropical sweetness. Its layered profile of caramelized molasses, bright citrus, and creamy coconut makes it a standout in the tiki repertoire.

A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the 4* is a symphony of rums from around the world, balanced with tropical fruit and coconut cream. It pays homage to the classic 'Four Star' cocktail while incorporating modern twists, creating a rich, layered experience that's both refreshing and indulgent.

A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic 4+1, this cocktail replaces traditional rums with a diverse selection of aged and overproof spirits, creating a rich, layered profile. The addition of orange juice and pineapple syrup brings a bright, fruity contrast to the deep, caramelized notes of the rums.

A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic 5* cocktail, this version elevates with a blend of aged and overproof rums, creating a rich, layered profile. The addition of fresh orange juice and pineapple syrup brings a bright, fruity contrast to the deep, caramelized notes of the rum, while cream of coconut adds a velvety texture.

cocktail_specs.name: Planter's Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tropical classic, Planter's Punch is a harmonious blend of dark rum, citrus juices, and tropical fruits. Originating in the 18th century, this cocktail is said to have been created by a planter in Jamaica, hence its name.

cocktail_specs.name: Planter's Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki classic, Planter's Punch is a harmonious blend of Jamaican overproof rum, citrus juices, and tropical syrups, balanced with allspice dram. This cocktail has roots in the 19th-century Caribbean, where it was a staple for sailors and planters alike.

cocktail_specs.name: Planter's Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Tiki classic, Planter's Punch is a tropical blend of dark Jamaican rum, citrus juices, and pineapple, creating a harmonious balance of sweet, tart, and rummy richness. Originating in the 19th century, it embodies the spirit of Caribbean hospitality and is often served with a flaming orange peel for dramatic flair.

cocktail_specs.name: Planter's Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical classic with roots in the 18th-century Caribbean, Planter's Punch is a harmonious blend of aged rum, citrus, and sweetness. Its layered flavors—rich caramel from the rum, bright pineapple and lime, and a touch of raspberry grenadine—make it both refreshing and complex.

cocktail_specs.name: Planter's Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki classic, Planter's Punch is a harmonious blend of dark Jamaican rum, tart lime juice, and sweet passion fruit syrup, balanced with aromatic bitters. This cocktail has roots in the Caribbean, where it was a staple for plantation owners and their guests, offering a perfect balance of tropical and bitter notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Planter's Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A robust and refreshing tiki classic, Planter's Punch is a harmonious blend of dark Jamaican rum, lime juice, and simple syrup, often garnished with nutmeg. This cocktail has roots in colonial-era punch recipes, originally served to plantation owners in the Caribbean.

cocktail_specs.name: Polynesian Paralysis
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical tiki classic that marries the smoky depth of bourbon or rye with the bright, tangy punch of citrus and pineapple. Born in the golden age of tiki, this cocktail is a celebration of island flavors, balanced by the nutty sweetness of orgeat and the rich caramel notes of its namesake syrup.

cocktail_specs.name: Port Light
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on a classic, the Port Light combines bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes with bright passion fruit and citrus. It's a modern take on the Port & Lemonade, offering a balanced sweetness and acidity that makes it perfect for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist and a passion fruit berry

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Barrel
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered rum cocktail that marries the deep, molasses-rich character of dark Jamaican rum with the bright acidity of citrus juices. It incorporates a touch of ango bitters for depth and a whisper of absinthe to add intrigue, making it a sophisticated yet approachable drink perfect for sipping.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel, orange twist, and a flamed pineapple leaf (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Fassionola
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and vibrant Italian cocktail, the Fassionola is a bright blend of citrus and tropical juices. Originating from Sicily, it captures the essence of Mediterranean sunshine with its zesty orange, tart lime, and sweet pineapple notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Saturn
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered cocktail that blends the botanical depth of Hendrick's gin with the rich, spiced sweetness of velvet falernum and aloha fassionola. The addition of rauch lemon juice adds a smoky, citrusy brightness, while DIY orgeat provides a nutty, creamy finish, creating a drink that is both sophisticated and approachable.

cocktail_specs.name: Scorpion
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tropical cocktail, the Scorpion is a harmonious blend of citrus, rum, and almond syrup. Originating in the 1930s, it's known for its bright orange hue and balanced sweetness with a touch of tartness.

cocktail_specs.name: SC
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and balanced cocktail, the SC (South Carolina) is a harmonious blend of gin, rums, brandy, and citrus. It offers a smooth, slightly sweet profile with bright orange and lime notes, often associated with Southern charm and coastal vibes.

cocktail_specs.name: Shrunken Skull
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki classic, the Shrunken Skull is a layered cocktail that marries the bold flavors of Demerara rum with the smooth richness of gold rum. It was popularized in the 1950s by Donn Beach, blending sweet, tart, and herbal notes into a visually striking drink.

cocktail_specs.name: Suffering Bastard
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that marries the botanical depth of London dry gin with the rich, caramel notes of brandy. It's a modern twist on classic elements, balanced by zesty lime, sweet demerara syrup, and a touch of aromatic bitters, topped off with ginger beer for a spicy, effervescent finish.

cocktail_specs.name: Test Pilot
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Test Pilot is a masterful blend of dark Jamaican rum, light Cuban rum, falernum, and absinthe, creating a rich tapestry of sweet, herbal, and citrus notes. It was designed to evoke the adventurous spirit of aviation, with a touch of ango bitters adding depth and complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Three Dots and a Dash
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered tiki classic, the Three Dots and a Dash is a symphony of aged rums, aromatic bitters, and citrus. It balances sweet, spicy, and herbal notes with a touch of honeyed depth, creating a drink that's both refreshing and sophisticated.
cocktail_specs.garnish: expressed orange twist and lime wheel

cocktail_specs.name: Bolo
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-inspired cocktail, the Bolo harmonizes rich Cuban rum with aged rhum agricole, creating a layered experience of caramelized molasses, tropical pineapple, and bright citrus. The addition of passionfruit gruit syrup and honey adds depth, while Angostura bitters provide a subtle aromatic complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Zombie
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary tiki classic, the Zombie is a complex and potent blend of rums, citrus, and aromatic syrups, often referred to as 'the drink that killed a man.' It was popularized in the 1930s by Donn Beach, who served it at his Tiki Room in Hollywood. The cocktail's layered flavors—from the rich, molasses-forward dark rum to the bright citrus and spicy bitters—create a harmonious yet intense experience.
cocktail_specs.garnish: flamed orange wheel and pineapple leaf

cocktail_specs.name: Pussers
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Pussers is a celebration of tropical flavors with a touch of spice. It combines overproof rum, pineapple juice, citrus, passion fruit, and falernum for a rich, layered experience that balances sweetness, acidity, and bittersweet depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Big Mama 6
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, layered tiki classic that marries the richness of aged Jamaican rum with the fiery punch of overproof Fassionola and the spicy depth of velvet falernum. This cocktail is a celebration of complexity, balancing citrus brightness, tropical sweetness, and aromatic bitters into a robust, soul-warming experience.
cocktail_specs.garnish: flamed orange wheel, cinnamon quill, and a pineapple leaf

cocktail_specs.name: Chief Lapu Lapu
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical-inspired cocktail that pays homage to the legendary Filipino warrior, Lapu-Lapu. This refreshing drink balances the rich, molasses notes of dark Jamaican rum with the crisp brightness of Cuban rum and citrus juices, sweetened just enough by passion fruit syrup and simple syrup for a harmonious, slightly tart finish.

cocktail_specs.name: Dark Jamaican
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex rum cocktail that celebrates the depth of Jamaican rum, blending unaged and aged expressions for a balance of sweet molasses, spice, and dried fruit notes. This drink pays homage to Jamaica's rum tradition, where terroir and aging play pivotal roles in crafting distinct spirits.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a sprinkle of Angostura bitters

cocktail_specs.name: orange juice
cocktail_specs.description: A deceptively simple yet complex blend, this cocktail reimagines the classic orange juice with a tropical twist. The passion fruit syrup adds a vibrant, tangy sweetness that contrasts beautifully with the rich, molasses-like depth of Demerara rum.
cocktail_specs.garnish: fresh orange wheel and a passion fruit slice

cocktail_specs.name: Cobra's Fang
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Cobra, this cocktail combines bright citrus notes with the rich caramel depth of demerara rum and the spiced complexity of falernum. Its layered flavors—passion fruit, orange, lime, and a hint of raspberry—make it a refreshing yet sophisticated choice for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Cocoanut Grove
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, creamy concoction that captures the essence of a sun-drenched grove with its lush blend of light rum, citrus, and coconut. This cocktail is a nod to the golden age of tiki, offering a smooth, slightly sweet profile with a refreshing acidity that balances the rich creaminess.

cocktail_specs.name: Medium Cuban Rum
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, refreshing blend of unaged rum and lime juice, this cocktail captures the essence of Cuban rum's crisp sweetness with a bright citrus tang. It’s a simple yet sophisticated drink that highlights the natural flavors of cachaca while offering a zesty contrast.

cocktail_specs.name: El Dorado 3
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki classic, the El Dorado 3 is a bright blue elixir that balances the tartness of lime juice with the sweet, citrusy depth of Pierre Ferrand Curacao. It's a staple in tropical cocktails, often served as an aperitif or mixer.

cocktail_specs.name: Dr Funk
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, Dr. Funk is a masterful blend of rhum agricole's grassy notes, citrus brightness, and absinthe's herbal depth, finished with a touch of raspberry sweetness. It pays homage to the golden age of tiki while introducing modern complexity.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a flamed orange peel

cocktail_specs.name: Donga Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki-inspired punch that harmonizes the bold, grassy notes of aged rhum agricole with the bright acidity of grapefruit juice. Its subtle cinnamon sweetness adds a warm, spiced depth, making it a perfect balance of tropical and aromatic flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Eastern Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic sour, the Eastern Sour replaces traditional egg white with orgeat, adding a nutty depth while maintaining its signature acidity and citrus brightness. This cocktail embodies the modern approach to sour-style drinks, blending Middle Eastern influences with American craftsmanship.

cocktail_specs.name: El Diablo
cocktail_specs.description: A fiery and refreshing Mexican classic, the El Diablo combines the smoky depth of reposado tequila with the tart richness of crème de cassis and lime juice, topped with effervescent ginger ale. Its name, meaning 'The Devil,' hints at its bold, slightly spicy character, making it a perfect balance of sweet, sour, and spicy notes.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel, mint sprig, and a pinch of chili powder or Tajín rim

cocktail_specs.name: Old Etonian
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic British cocktail, the Old Etonian is a harmonious blend of London Dry Gin's juniper and citrus notes with Lillet Blanc's herbal complexity. The touch of Crème de Noyau adds a subtle almond sweetness, while Orange Bitters bring a bright, citrusy finish.

cocktail_specs.name: S'n'Emm
cocktail_specs.description: A smoky, complex aperitivo with a deep, earthy character from mezcal, balanced by the herbal sweetness of vermouth and the bitter, aromatic notes of amaro. This cocktail is a modern twist on the classic Negroni, replacing gin with mezcal for a more intense, smoldering profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Ampersand
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Ampersand combines the rich, oaky depth of Cognac with the floral complexity of Old Tom Gin and Vermouth Amaro. The addition of Orange Curacao and orange bitters adds a subtle sweetness and aromatic brightness, making it a versatile drink that bridges classic and modern styles.

cocktail_specs.name: Less is more negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, minimalist twist on the classic Negroni, this cocktail strips back the Campari to focus on the interplay between sweet vermouth and gin. It's a lighter, more refined aperitivo that still delivers the essence of the original with a touch of elegance.

cocktail_specs.name: Nymph
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Nymph is a harmonious blend of rich Canadian whisky, floral Lillet Blanc, and sweet apricot liqueur, finished with a whisper of aromatic bitters. It offers a smooth, balanced profile that dances between herbal, fruity, and slightly bitter notes, making it a versatile choice for any occasion.

cocktail_specs.name: Pied-a-terre
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that bridges the old-world elegance of Cognac with the herbal depth of Jägermeister and Lillet Blanc. Created in the 1980s, it embodies the refined complexity of a classic French aperitif, often associated with the charm of Parisian pied-à-terre living.

cocktail_specs.name: Ocean Cable
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Ocean Cable is a harmonious blend of Canadian whisky's smoky depth, Lillet Blanc's floral elegance, Cognac's rich oakiness, and Peychaud's Bitters' aromatic complexity. It was created to evoke the essence of a transatlantic cable, symbolizing strength and connectivity.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist or a brandied cherry

cocktail_specs.name: La Fontaine
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and elegant cocktail, La Fontaine is a harmonious blend of Calvados's rich apple notes, Lillet Blanc's herbal depth, and the delicate sweetness of apricot liqueur. A touch of absinthe adds complexity, making it a sophisticated choice for those who appreciate nuanced flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: History & Nobility
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail that embodies the essence of French refinement, this drink combines the rich, nutty depth of Cognac with the delicate herbal notes of Lillet Blanc. The touch of apricot liqueur adds a subtle sweetness, while orange bitters introduce a bright, aromatic complexity, making it a perfect aperitif for those who appreciate history and craftsmanship.

cocktail_specs.name: Clockwork
cocktail_specs.description: A meticulously crafted cocktail with a layered profile of rich bourbon, herbal Lillet Blanc, and the bittersweet depth of Amaro Montenegro. Its name reflects its intricate balance, where each ingredient plays a precise role in creating a smooth yet complex experience.

cocktail_specs.name: Unusual Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this version replaces Campari with Aperol and sweet vermouth with Lillet Blanc, creating a lighter, more citrus-forward profile. It retains the balance of bitterness and botanicals while offering a brighter, slightly sweeter character.

cocktail_specs.name: Nouveau Carre
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Carré, this cocktail replaces Cognac with aged tequila, delivering a rich, smoky depth with notes of vanilla, caramel, and herbal complexity. It was inspired by the original Carré, which combined Cognac, Lillet Blanc, Benedictine, and bitters, but here, the Anejo tequila adds a unique Mexican influence.

cocktail_specs.name: St. Columbus Rill
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail with a rich, layered profile that balances the smoky depth of Irish whiskey with the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc and Green Chartreuse. This drink is a nod to the historic St. Columbus Rill, a legendary bar in New Orleans known for its classic cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin Blossom
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and aromatic cocktail that harmonizes the floral notes of Lillet Blanc with the bright, fruity essence of apricot eau de vie. The London Dry Gin adds a crisp botanical backbone, while orange bitters introduce a subtle citrus brightness, making it a sophisticated choice for spring or summer evenings.

cocktail_specs.name: Les Verts Monts
cocktail_specs.description: A rich and complex French-inspired cocktail that harmoniously blends Armagnac, Cognac, and Calvados with Lillet Blanc, creating a velvety texture and deep, nutty notes. The addition of cream sherry and maple syrup adds a touch of sweetness, while Ango bitters and Oleo Saccharum Lemon provide a subtle yet essential balance.

cocktail_specs.name: Eeyore's Requiem
cocktail_specs.description: A melancholic yet invigorating cocktail, Eeyore's Requiem is a complex blend of bitter amaro, herbal liqueurs, and a whisper of gin. Its name evokes the somber charm of Winnie-the-Pooh's gloomy friend, but its bold, layered flavors—from Campari’s bright bitterness to Fernet Branca’s earthy depth—offer a surprisingly uplifting experience.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist, dusted with a pinch of orange zest

cocktail_specs.name: Bitter Stripper
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, bittersweet twist on the classic Vesper, this cocktail replaces vodka with a robust Plymouth Gin and introduces Salers Gentiane for a deep herbal complexity. Its balance of citrus, botanicals, and bitter almond notes makes it both refreshing and sophisticated.

cocktail_specs.name: Kentucky Corpse Reviver
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex American classic, the Kentucky Corpse Reviver is a masterful blend of bourbon, Lillet Blanc, lemon juice, and Cointreau. Created in the mid-20th century, it's known for its rich, herbal, and citrus-forward profile, offering a sophisticated yet approachable experience that revives even the most weary palate.

cocktail_specs.name: Necromancer
cocktail_specs.description: A hauntingly complex cocktail, the Necromancer marries the emerald allure of absinthe with the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur and Lillet Blanc. A whisper of lemon juice brightens the mix, while a touch of London Dry Gin adds a subtle botanical depth, creating a drink that is both mystical and sophisticated.

cocktail_specs.name: Corpse Reviver Variation
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary, spirit-forward cocktail born in the Golden Age of Mixology, the Corpse Reviver Variation is a symphony of gin's botanical complexity, Cointreau's citrus brightness, Lillet Blanc's herbal depth, and absinthe's emerald mystique. Created by Harry Craddock at the Savoy Hotel in 1938, it was famously enjoyed by Ernest Hemingway and other literary luminaries.

cocktail_specs.name: Pearl Button
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and refreshing Brazilian-inspired cocktail that harmonizes the smooth, nutty richness of aged cachaça with the floral elegance of Lillet. Its name reflects its pearlescent hue, achieved by the interplay of citrus and fortified wine, making it a sophisticated yet approachable choice for any season.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a single pearl onion (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: First Emperor
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail inspired by the grandeur of ancient China, this drink harmonizes the herbal depth of Lillet Blanc with the rich, funky character of Rhum Agricole Blanc. Yellow Chartreuse adds a layer of spiced intrigue, while pineapple juice and simple syrup bring a subtle tropical sweetness, creating a balance that is both elegant and intriguing.
cocktail_specs.garnish: pineapple leaf and a thin strip of orange peel

cocktail_specs.name: Bastille
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail born in the shadows of the French Revolution, the Bastille is a harmonious marriage of Armagnac's rich oak notes, Lillet Blanc's herbal depth, and Benedictine's spiced complexity. It was created to honor the storming of the Bastille on July 14, 1789, symbolizing both rebellion and refinement.

cocktail_specs.name: South Slope
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Southside, this cocktail replaces Prosecco with Lillet Blanc for a richer, more complex profile. Its bright citrus notes from Aperol and Orange Curacao are balanced by the herbal depth of gin and Lillet, creating a sophisticated aperitivo that's both bitter and sweet.

cocktail_specs.name: 49th Parallel
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail inspired by the historic border between Canada and the United States, the 49th Parallel balances rich Cognac with rye whiskey, herbal Lillet Blanc, and citrus notes. Its name reflects its transnational appeal, blending French elegance with American spirit, creating a harmonious yet complex profile that is both refreshing and deeply flavorful.

cocktail_specs.name: The Saint
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing cocktail, The Saint is a harmonious blend of bourbon's rich caramel and vanilla notes with the floral complexity of Lillet Blanc. A touch of grapefruit and lemon brightens the drink, while ginger syrup adds a subtle spicy kick, making it an ideal choice for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist and a rosemary sprig

cocktail_specs.name: Great Gatsby
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and sophisticated cocktail inspired by the opulence of the Roaring Twenties, the Great Gatsby combines the crisp brightness of pink grapefruit with the botanical complexity of gin or vodka. Its name evokes the glamour of F. Scott Fitzgerald's iconic novel, capturing the essence of a bygone era with its citrus-forward profile and elegant presentation.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist or a small skewer of fresh mint and a grapefruit wedge

cocktail_specs.name: Satan's Whiskers Variation
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Satan's Whiskers, this variation replaces traditional vermouth with Lillet Blanc for a smoother, more refined profile. The balance of London Dry Gin, Grand Marnier, and orange juice creates a luscious, citrus-forward cocktail with a hint of bitterness from Orange Bitters.

cocktail_specs.name: Birthday Gentleman’s Health
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and celebratory twist on the classic Gentleman's Health, this cocktail replaces the traditional orange liqueur with Lillet Blanc for a richer, more complex profile. It balances the smoky depth of Jameson Black Barrel with the herbal notes of Green Chartreuse and bright lemon juice, creating a harmonious blend that’s both refreshing and spirit-forward.

cocktail_specs.name: Paddington
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail inspired by the beloved Paddington Bear, this drink harmonizes light rum, orange marmalade, Lillet Blanc, grapefruit, lemon juice, and a whisper of absinthe. Its name pays homage to the classic children's character, offering a delightful blend of citrus, floral, and herbal notes with a touch of anise.

cocktail_specs.name: Culross
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated Scottish cocktail that harmonizes the sweetness of apricot liqueur with the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc and a bright, tangy lemon finish. Created in honor of the historic Culross Palace, this drink balances fruitiness, bitterness, and citrus with an elegant, slightly nutty undertone.

cocktail_specs.name: Great Northern
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Great Northern combines the herbal complexity of Aquavit with the smooth elegance of Lillet Blanc. Its balance of citrus, honey, and botanical notes makes it a versatile drink that can be enjoyed as an aperitif or a refreshing sipping cocktail.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist, sprig of rosemary or thyme

cocktail_specs.name: Chinquapin Parish Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated Southern American punch that marries the richness of bourbon with the delicate floral notes of Lillet Blanc and the luscious sweetness of peach liqueur. It balances tart citrus, honeyed depth, and a whisper of bitterness, evoking the charm of Louisiana's bayous.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist, lemon wheel, and a sprinkle of Angostura bitters

cocktail_specs.name: Fix One's Flint
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail that bridges the worlds of bourbon, sherry, and vermouth. This drink is a modern take on the classic Fix One, with Oloroso Sherry adding depth and richness, while Lillet Blanc brings a subtle herbal note. The saline solution enhances its complexity, making it a standout aperitivo or digestif.

cocktail_specs.name: Tunnel Vision
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, layered cocktail that blends the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc with the delicate sweetness of pear eau de vie and a whisper of absinthe. Its name reflects its layered profile, where each ingredient contributes to a harmonious yet intricate flavor journey.
cocktail_specs.garnish: expressed lime wheel and a pear leaf

cocktail_specs.name: Straw Dog
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing Scottish cocktail, the Straw Dog combines rich blended Scotch with Lillet Blanc, creating a harmonious balance of citrus, herbal, and sweet notes. Its origins trace back to the 1920s in Scotland, where it was a favorite among those who appreciated both Scotch whisky and French liqueurs.

cocktail_specs.name: Pinche Chivo
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Pinche, this version replaces traditional vermouth with Lillet Blanc, adding a floral and slightly nutty depth while maintaining its signature sweetness. Named after a playful slang term meaning 'pinch the goat,' it's a refreshing yet balanced cocktail that bridges the gap between tequila-forward drinks and sophisticated aperitivos.

cocktail_specs.name: Brics
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and balanced cocktail from the classic tiki era, the Brics combines the sweet, fruity notes of cachaça with the herbal depth of Lillet Blanc and a touch of vodka for smoothness. Its ginger syrup adds a subtle spice that bridges the tropical and floral elements, making it both invigorating and complex.

cocktail_specs.name: Vieux Carré
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered New Orleans classic, the Vieux Carré is a harmonious blend of rye whiskey, Cognac, sweet vermouth, and aromatic bitters. Created in the early 20th century at the Hotel Monteleone, it embodies the city's rich cocktail culture with its balanced sweetness, herbal complexity, and a touch of spice.

cocktail_specs.name: Bobby Burns No 1
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, velvety Scotch cocktail with a deep, aromatic profile, blending the smoky warmth of blended Scotch with the herbal complexity of sweet vermouth and the spiced depth of Benedictine. Named after the legendary Scottish folk hero, this drink is both robust and refined, perfect for sipping slowly.

cocktail_specs.name: Emerson
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet cocktail, the Emerson is a harmonious blend of Old Tom Gin's malty richness, Martini Rosso's fruity depth, and bright lime juice. It was created in the early 20th century at the Emerson Hotel in Boston, embodying the elegance of classic American mixology.

cocktail_specs.name: Queens Park Hotel Super Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail from the legendary Queens Park Hotel in London, this drink harmonizes rich Gold Rum with sweet vermouth, bright lime juice, and a touch of grenadine for depth. It's a nod to classic tiki and British hospitality, offering a smooth yet complex profile that's both refreshing and spirit-forward.

cocktail_specs.name: Ghost Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, refined twist on the classic Negroni, the Ghost Negroni replaces Campari and sweet vermouth with Lillet and Maraschino, creating a lighter, more delicate drink with a focus on gin's botanical notes. Its pale hue and subtle sweetness make it an elegant choice for those who prefer a softer, less bitter profile.

cocktail_specs.name: The Empire Strikes Bax
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-inspired cocktail that blends the bitter depth of Campari, the herbal richness of Amaro Montenegro, and the warmth of chilled coffee. This drink is a modern twist on classic amaro cocktails, offering a layered experience with a touch of sweetness and aromatic bitters.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and coffee bean garnish

cocktail_specs.name: DJ Flamethrower
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, smoky, and complex cocktail that marries the earthy depth of mezcal with the bright citrus notes of grapefruit and lime. Its name reflects its fiery character, both in flavor and presentation, making it a standout for those who crave intensity and intrigue.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist and a flamed cinnamon stick (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless American classic, the Manhattan is a sophisticated blend of rye whiskey's spicy warmth and sweet vermouth's herbal depth, finished with a whisper of aromatic bitters. Created in the late 19th century at New York City's Manhattan Club, it embodies elegance and balance.

cocktail_specs.name: Martinez
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cousin of the Negroni, the Martinez is a classic cocktail that balances sweet vermouth with Old Tom Gin, Maraschino liqueur, Kirsch, and orange bitters. Created in the late 19th century at the Martinez Hotel in San Francisco, it was one of the earliest American cocktails to feature vermouth.

cocktail_specs.name: Persephone
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that combines the warmth of Applejack with the floral complexity of sweet vermouth, the tart richness of sloe gin, and a bright citrus finish. Named after the Greek goddess associated with spring, this drink embodies renewal and balance, making it a perfect choice for those who appreciate layered flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Boulevardier Variation
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Boulevardier, this variation swaps whiskey for Amaro Montenegro, creating a lush, herbal-forward cocktail with deep bitterness and a touch of sweetness. It retains the elegance of its predecessor while introducing complex, Mediterranean notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Burschik Red Vermouth
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and robust twist on the classic vermouth cocktail, the Burschik Red Vermouth combines the rich, herbal complexity of Rosso Vermouth with the deep, oaky warmth of whiskey. This drink is a celebration of contrast—sweet and bitter, smooth and fiery—perfect for those who appreciate a spirit-forward aperitivo.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist or a Luxardo cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Boulevardier
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and bittersweet American classic, the Boulevardier is a refined twist on the Negroni, replacing gin with rye whiskey. Created in the 1920s at the Buckhill Falls Inn in New York City, it embodies the elegance of Prohibition-era cocktails with its rich, layered flavors of caramelized rye, herbal vermouth, and Campari's signature bitterness.

cocktail_specs.name: Fruit Cup
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail with a complex interplay of sweet, citrusy, and aromatic notes. Originating in the early 20th century, it combines Cognac's rich depth with the bright tang of Orange Curacao and the effervescence of ginger ale and cola, creating a balanced yet lively drink that bridges the gap between aperitivo and dessert.

cocktail_specs.name: De La Loßuisiane
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail from New Orleans, the De La Loßuisiane is a harmonious blend of rye whiskey's spice, Benedictine's herbal depth, sweet vermouth's richness, absinthe's emerald allure, and Peychaud's bitters' aromatic punch. It's a modern twist on the classic Sazerac, with a focus on balance and layers of flavor.

cocktail_specs.name: Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A quintessential Italian aperitivo, the Negroni is a perfectly balanced blend of bitter, sweet, and botanical notes. It was reportedly invented in Florence in 1919 for Count Camillo Negroni, who asked for his Americano to be strengthened with gin.

cocktail_specs.name: Carre Nouveau
cocktail_specs.description: A refined and aromatic French cocktail, the Carre Nouveau is a harmonious blend of Cognac, Lillet Blanc, Benedictine, Suze, and Peychaud's Bitters. It offers a complex profile with notes of dried fruit, herbs, citrus, and a touch of bitter almond, making it both sophisticated and versatile.

cocktail_specs.name: Ransom Note
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered cocktail that marries the robust, spiced notes of rye whiskey with the richness of brandy and sweet vermouth. The addition of Amaro Ramazotti and white crème de cacao introduces deep, bittersweet chocolate undertones, while orange bitters add a bright, citrusy contrast. This drink is a modern twist on classic amaro cocktails, offering a sophisticated balance of warmth and acidity.

cocktail_specs.name: Negroni Western
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, modern twist on the classic Negroni, this version replaces gin with bourbon and sweet vermouth with Lillet Rouge, adding a touch of hazelnut liqueur for depth. It's a rich, spirit-forward cocktail with notes of vanilla, caramel, bitter orange, and spice, perfect for those who prefer a smoother, more complex profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Sade's Taboo
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail inspired by the decadent themes of Marquis de Sade, this drink marries the rich, nutty depth of Cognac with the herbal elegance of Lillet Blanc and a whisper of sweet vermouth. The addition of grapefruit bitters introduces a bright, citrusy contrast, making it both intriguing and refined.

cocktail_specs.name: LN Mattei Cap Corse
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic infused liqueur, the LN Mattei Cap Corse captures the essence of Corsican terroir with its rich blend of citrus, herbal, and floral notes. Traditionally infused with cinchona bark, it offers a complex profile that balances sweetness with subtle bitterness, making it a versatile spirit for sipping or crafting cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Frank Sullivan
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless tiki classic, the Frank Sullivan is a harmonious blend of Cognac's rich oak and vanilla notes, Triple Sec's citrus brightness, Lillet Blanc's herbal complexity, and lemon juice's zesty tang. Named after a legendary tiki pioneer, this cocktail embodies the adventurous spirit of Polynesian-inspired mixology.

cocktail_specs.name: Barney Barnato
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and versatile cocktail named after the legendary South African diamond magnate Barney Barnato, this drink is a harmonious blend of rich Cognac, herbal Lillet Blanc, and a touch of orange Curacao. Its balanced sweetness and bitterness make it both an elegant aperitif and a delightful sipping spirit.

cocktail_specs.name: Self-Starter
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, the Self-Starter is a harmonious blend of London Dry Gin's botanical complexity, Lillet Blanc's herbal depth, apricot liqueur's sweet fruitiness, and a whisper of absinthe for an intriguing bitterness. It's a perfect example of how small doses of absinthe can elevate a drink without overpowering it.

cocktail_specs.name: Vesper Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and iconic cocktail, the Vesper Martini is known for its elegant balance of gin's botanical notes, vodka's smooth neutrality, and a touch of sweetness from Kina Lillet. It gained fame as James Bond's drink of choice in Ian Fleming's novels, embodying the spirit of intrigue and refinement.

cocktail_specs.name: Sunray
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail, the Sunray is a harmonious blend of bourbon's rich caramel notes, Grand Marnier's citrusy sweetness, Lillet Blanc's herbal depth, and fresh orange juice. It's a perfect representation of a sunny, summery drink that balances complexity with approachability.

cocktail_specs.name: Reverse Vesper Martini
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Vesper Martini, this cocktail flips the script by leading with Lillet Blanc and a whisper of gin, creating a smooth, aromatic profile with notes of citrus, vanilla, and juniper. It’s a modern take on the James Bond staple, designed to be sipped slowly, balancing sweetness with a subtle herbal depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Tuxedo
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered gin cocktail with a dual-gin approach, blending Old Tom's sweetness with London Dry's botanical brightness. The Tuxedo is a modern twist on the classic, featuring vermouths for depth and maraschino for a subtle cherry note, balanced by absinthe's herbal complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: 21st Century
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail that bridges tradition and modernity, the 21st Century is a harmonious blend of reposado tequila's caramel and vanilla notes with the rich, creamy depth of white crème de cacao. The addition of Lillet Blanc adds a subtle herbal complexity, while lemon juice brightens the drink without overpowering its smooth, velvety texture.

cocktail_specs.name: Charlie Lindbergh
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail inspired by the legendary aviator, this drink harmonizes the botanical complexity of London Dry Gin with the sweet, floral notes of Blanc Kina and Lillet Blanc. The addition of apricot brandy and orange juice introduces a subtle fruitiness, making it both refreshing and elegant.

cocktail_specs.name: Campden
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail from the Campden Hill Distillery, this drink harmonizes the juniper-forward brightness of London Dry Gin with the citrusy sweetness of Triple Sec and the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc. It’s a refined aperitivo that celebrates the elegance of gin while incorporating layers of floral and citrus notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Depth Charge
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic White Lady, the Depth Charge is a sophisticated blend of London Dry Gin's botanical complexity and Lillet Blanc's floral sweetness, punctuated by a whisper of absinthe for an intriguing herbal depth. This cocktail is often associated with the craft cocktail movement and its ability to deliver both elegance and intrigue.

cocktail_specs.name: Atonement
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered cocktail inspired by the rich, bittersweet narrative of Ian McEwan's novel 'Atonement.' This drink harmonizes rye whiskey and dark rum with the nutty depth of orgeat, the aromatic warmth of Ango bitters, and the fortified elegance of PX sherry. It's a sophisticated blend that balances sweetness, spice, and oak, evoking both the grandeur and melancholy of its literary namesake.
cocktail_specs.garnish: expressed orange twist, flamed and dropped in

cocktail_specs.name: BVD Americano
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic Americano, this cocktail replaces Campari with Blanc Kina, adding a rich, cinchona-infused depth that bridges the gap between bitterness and sweetness. It’s a spirit-forward drink that celebrates the interplay of dark rum, gin, and quinine, offering a sophisticated yet approachable profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Corpse Reviver #2, Cocchi
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary, spirit-forward cocktail born in the golden age of mixology, Corpse Reviver #2 is a symphony of gin's botanical complexity, Lillet Blanc's herbal depth, and Cointreau's citrus brightness. Created by Harry MacElhone at the Cocktail Bar in London, it was famously enjoyed by Ernest Hemingway and other literary figures, embodying the sophistication of 1930s cocktail culture.

cocktail_specs.name: Odd McIntyre
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Odd McIntyre is a harmonious blend of Cognac's oakiness, Lillet Blanc's herbal notes, lemon's bright acidity, and Cointreau's orange sweetness. It was created in the early 20th century by bartender Harry MacElhone at the Cluny Restaurant in Paris, named after a fictional character from a French novel.

cocktail_specs.name: Almost Perfect Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail that harmonizes the tropical sweetness of pineapple rum with the herbal depth of Averna and Lillet Blanc, balanced by a touch of maraschino liqueur and grenadine. It's a modern twist on classic amaro-based drinks, offering a smooth yet complex profile that's both refreshing and intriguing.

cocktail_specs.name: Trembling Bell
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Trembling Bell combines rye whiskey's spice with Irish whiskey's smoothness, balanced by Lillet Blanc's herbal notes and a touch of peach liqueur. It is garnished with a flamed orange peel to create an elegant 'trembling bell' effect.

cocktail_specs.name: Peat's Dragon
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that marries the smoky depth of blended Scotch with the delicate floral notes of Speyside single malt, balanced by the citrusy sweetness of Grand Marnier and the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc. This drink is a modern twist on traditional whisky cocktails, offering a harmonious blend of peat smoke, spice, and citrus.

cocktail_specs.name: The Gilsey
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail, The Gilsey harmonizes the dry complexity of London Dry Gin with the rich, nutty depth of Cream Sherry. A touch of Lillet Blanc and Kirsch Eau de Vie adds a subtle floral and cherry note, while Orange Bitters introduce a bright, citrusy finish.

cocktail_specs.name: Broken Spanish
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing Spanish-inspired cocktail, the Broken Spanish combines the nutty depth of Fino Sherry with the herbal complexity of Lillet Blanc and the bright acidity of verjus. It was created by David Wondrich in his seminal work 'The Dead Rabbit' and is a modern take on classic Spanish flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Clockmaker
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Clockmaker is a harmonious marriage of rye whiskey's spicy warmth with the herbal complexity of aquavit, Lillet Blanc, Madeira, and Amaro Nardini. Its name reflects its intricate balance, much like the precision of a clockmaker's craft.

cocktail_specs.name: Traction
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, Traction harmonizes the nutty depth of amontillado sherry with the rich caramel notes of dark rum and the citrusy brightness of Grand Marnier. It's a modern twist on classic sherry cocktails, offering a balanced profile that's both complex and approachable.

cocktail_specs.name: Jabberwocky
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that bridges the worlds of gin and sherry, the Jabberwocky is a harmonious blend of London Dry Gin's botanical complexity, Manzanilla Sherry's dry, nutty elegance, and Lillet Blanc's subtle herbal notes. It was created by Jerry Thomas in 1862, named after Lewis Carroll's whimsical poem 'Jabberwocky.'

cocktail_specs.name: Mess-cal
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that marries the smoky depth of mezcal with the bright, agricultural notes of rhum agricole and white rum. The addition of Cynar and a London dry gin adds herbal bitterness and complexity, while PX sherry brings a rich, nutty sweetness to balance the drink's fiery character.

cocktail_specs.name: L'Heritage
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, L'Heritage is a harmonious blend of Cognac's rich oak notes, Lillet Blanc's herbal depth, and Gentian Liqueur's bitter sweetness. It was created to honor the heritage of classic cocktails while introducing modern techniques, resulting in a drink that is both elegant and intriguing.

cocktail_specs.name: dry v&t
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Vesper, this cocktail replaces gin with dry vermouth and tonic water, creating a refreshing yet complex drink. It highlights the herbal and citrus notes of vermouth while adding a subtle effervescence from the tonic.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist, olive or lemon peel

cocktail_specs.name: Improved Dry V&T
cocktail_specs.description: A refined twist on the classic Vesper, this cocktail replaces vodka with gin for a brighter, more botanical profile while maintaining its signature elegance. The addition of tonic water introduces a subtle effervescence that enhances its refreshing yet sophisticated character.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist, olive or lemon peel

cocktail_specs.name: Spectre
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Spectre is a modern twist on the classic Vesper, incorporating Strega and Lillet Blanc to add depth and complexity. Its balance of citrus-forward gin, herbal amaro, and aromatic bitters creates a refined, slightly sweet profile that lingers with elegance.

cocktail_specs.name: Cartagena Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex twist on the classic sour, the Cartagena Sour replaces traditional whiskey with blanco vermouth and licor 43, creating a rich, herbal, and slightly bitter profile. Its origins trace back to Colombia's coastal city of Cartagena, where it blends citrus brightness with floral and sweet notes, offering a refreshing yet sophisticated experience.
cocktail_specs.garnish: blood orange twist or a sprinkle of coarse sea salt

cocktail_specs.name: Scaramanga
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly sweet cocktail inspired by the character Scaramanga from Ian Fleming's James Bond novels. It combines Lillet Blanc, Galliano Vanilla, orange juice, banana liqueur, and a touch of Fernet-Branca for depth, creating a smooth yet complex aperitivo with floral, vanilla, citrus, and herbal notes.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and a sprinkle of orange zest

cocktail_specs.name: Riff
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Americano, the Riff replaces sweet vermouth with blanco vermouth for a lighter, more citrus-forward profile. It balances Galliano's vanilla notes with bright lemon and blood orange syrup, creating a sophisticated yet approachable aperitivo.

cocktail_specs.name: Trigger Finger
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail with a smoky, floral, and slightly sweet profile. It combines rich Scotch whisky with dry vermouth, a hint of hibiscus liqueur, and a touch of deep, caramel-like sweetness, creating a drink that is both sophisticated and approachable.

cocktail_specs.name: Fugu Poison
cocktail_specs.description: A deceptively elegant yet complex cocktail, the Fugu Poison balances the herbal depth of blanco vermouth with the smooth vanilla notes of Galliano, bright citrus, and a touch of blood orange sweetness. Its name is a playful nod to the deadly pufferfish (fugu), hinting at its bold character without being overpowering.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin & Brexit
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail blending overproof gin with Unicum Zwetschle, a plum-flavored Hungarian liqueur, and absinthe for an intense herbal depth. This drink plays on the contrast of sweet, bitter, and anise notes, offering a modern twist to classic European flavors.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist, absinthe rinse on glass rim

cocktail_specs.name: manhattan corpse reviver
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, spirit-forward revival of the classic Manhattan, the Corpse Reviver is a luxurious blend of rye whisky, vermouths, and anise-flavored raki. Originating in the early 20th century, this cocktail is known for its complex, layered flavors with notes of caramel, citrus, and licorice, making it a staple for those seeking a sophisticated yet invigorating experience.

cocktail_specs.name: Faithfulness
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated blend of gin, vermouth, and white wine, the Faithfulness offers a harmonious balance of herbal bitterness, citrus brightness, and a touch of honeyed sweetness. This cocktail is a modern take on classic elements, designed to evoke a sense of elegance and complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Rob Roy
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the Whiskey Sour, the Rob Roy replaces bourbon with Scotch whisky, offering a richer, more complex profile with notes of caramel, spice, and dried fruit. Created in the early 20th century at Chicago's Buck & Buck Club, it’s a nod to the fictional character Dr. John Rob Roy MacGregor.
cocktail_specs.garnish: (optional) maraschino cherry, lemon twist, Peychaud's bitters float

cocktail_specs.name: Murano Negroni
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, the Murano Negroni introduces Frangelico's rich hazelnut notes to create a velvety-smooth, nutty variation. This cocktail is a celebration of balance, blending the bitterness of vermouth and gin with the sweet, toasty depth of hazelnut liqueur.

cocktail_specs.name: Manhattan Island
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Manhattan, this cocktail replaces rye whiskey with cognac and adds a touch of maraschino liqueur for a richer, fruitier profile. It’s a refined aperitivo that balances sweet, bitter, and herbal notes, perfect for those who appreciate depth in their cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Chass5
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, refreshing twist on the classic Chassol, this cocktail replaces St-Germain with Aperol for a vibrant, citrus-forward profile. It balances the floral notes of elderflower and grapefruit with the bright acidity of lemon, creating a light yet complex aperitivo-style drink.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist or a sprig of rosemary

cocktail_specs.name: Mango Collins
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Collins, this cocktail combines the tropical sweetness of mango with the bright acidity of lime and the botanical complexity of gin. It's a perfect summer drink that balances fruitiness, herbal notes, and a touch of effervescence.

cocktail_specs.name: Mango Painkiller
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, sun-soaked classic born in the Caribbean, the Mango Painkiller is a lush blend of dark rums, mango passionfruit nectar, and coconut syrup. Its creamy texture and vibrant flavors make it a staple for summer sipping, often associated with beachside relaxation.

cocktail_specs.name: Apricot Mango Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and balanced cocktail that harmoniously blends the sweet, tropical notes of apricot brandy liqueur and mango-passionfruit nektar with the botanical complexity of gin. The addition of lemon juice and orange bitters adds a bright, citrusy acidity and aromatic depth, making it a refreshing yet sophisticated choice for warm weather.

cocktail_specs.name: Mango Rum Barrel
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, barrel-aged rum cocktail that marries the deep caramel and spice notes of aged Jamaican rums with the vibrant sweetness of mango passionfruit nectar. This drink is a modern twist on classic tiki flavors, offering a rich, complex profile that balances fruity brightness with molasses-like depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Mango Scorpion
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on the classic Scorpion cocktail, this version swaps traditional grenadine for mango passionfruit nectar, delivering a luscious blend of sweet, tangy, and nutty flavors. It’s a playful yet sophisticated drink that balances rum’s bold character with the exotic allure of mango and almond.
cocktail_specs.garnish: flamed orange wheel or a pinch of chili powder for heat

cocktail_specs.name: Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless classic with deep roots in American cocktail culture, the Old Fashioned is a symphony of rich bourbon or rye, sweet demarara syrup, and aromatic bitters. Its origins trace back to the early 19th century, evolving from a simple whiskey and sugar drink into the sophisticated, spirit-forward cocktail known today.
cocktail_specs.garnish: luxardo maraschino cherry and orange peel

cocktail_specs.name: Demerara Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, complex twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail replaces bourbon with aged demerara rum and overproof demerara for a deeper, caramel-forward profile. The addition of pineapple syrup introduces a subtle tropical sweetness, balancing the bold, molasses-like notes of the rum.

cocktail_specs.name: Jamaica Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this Jamaican variation infuses rich bourbon or rye with the bright, molasses-like depth of demerara syrup and a hint of rum. It’s a bold, spirit-forward cocktail that celebrates the island’s love for robust flavors and traditional techniques.

cocktail_specs.name: Cognac Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this version elevates the spirit-forward experience with the rich, oaky depth of Cognac. A dash of absinthe adds a subtle herbal complexity, while Peychaud's bitters bring a touch of aromatic warmth and mystery.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and a Luxardo cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Last Word
cocktail_specs.description: A legendary Tiki cocktail born in the 1940s at the Buena Vista Bar, this drink is a harmonious blend of herbal, floral, and citrus notes. Its balanced sweetness and complexity make it a standout among classic cocktails.

cocktail_specs.name: Wordsmith
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and aromatic cocktail that marries the smoky depth of Jamaican pot still rum with the herbal, slightly medicinal notes of green Chartreuse and the sweet-tart brightness of maraschino liqueur. It’s a sophisticated yet approachable drink, balancing warmth, bitterness, and citrus in equal parts.

ingredients.name: Jamaican-style overproof aged pot still rum

cocktail_specs.name: Weird Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Mai Tai, this cocktail replaces traditional orgeat and falernum with a bold blend of light and dark rums, adding depth without losing its signature tropical brightness. The 'weird' in its name hints at its unconventional yet harmonious balance of citrus, rum, and Curacao.

cocktail_specs.name: Across the Pacific
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail that bridges the flavors of Jamaica and the Mediterranean. It combines dark Jamaican rums with Averna's herbal depth, balanced by tart lime juice and nutty orgeat, creating a rich, layered experience that evokes both tropical and old-world influences.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Cy Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Cy Tai blends the bold, funky character of white Jamaican overproof rum with the citrusy brightness of lime juice and orange curacao. It balances sweet and bitter notes with orgeat's nutty richness and cynar's artichoke bitterness, creating a layered, refreshing experience that bridges classic tiki and modern mixology.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a flamed orange peel

cocktail_specs.name: Heirloom Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A refined evolution of the classic Mai Tai, this cocktail replaces traditional orgeat with a more nuanced almond syrup and introduces overproof rum for depth. It retains the tropical essence of lime and orange bitters while adding complexity through an amaro, creating a harmonious balance of sweet, bitter, and citrus notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Reddit Mai Tai
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Mai Tai, this version incorporates a blend of rhums and an amaro for depth. It retains the tropical sweetness and citrus brightness while adding complexity, making it a versatile cocktail that can be enjoyed year-round.

cocktail_specs.name: Appleton's Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and balanced sour cocktail that showcases the rich, molasses-forward profile of Appleton Estate rum while maintaining a refreshing, citrusy brightness. This variation elevates the classic Whiskey Sour by using aged Barbados rum and orgeat for a nutty depth.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a sprinkle of orgeat

cocktail_specs.name: Cy Tai #2
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex tiki-style cocktail, Cy Tai #2 is a harmonious blend of overproof rums, citrus, and nutty sweetness. It balances the bold flavors of dark Jamaican rum with the brightness of lime juice and orange curacao, while orgeat and cynar add depth and bitterness, creating a drink that's both refreshing and intriguing.

cocktail_specs.name: Across the Pacific #2
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and aromatic tiki-style cocktail that bridges the flavors of Jamaica, Martinique, and the Caribbean. It layers aged Jamaican rum with dark overproof rum, adding depth and intensity, while rhum agricole introduces a grassy, earthy sweetness. Balanced with lime juice and orgeat syrup, it's a sophisticated yet approachable drink with a touch of Angostura bitters for warmth.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime shell and a sprinkle of Angostura bitters on the foam

cocktail_specs.name: Hantig
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, refreshing twist on the classic Aperol Spritz, the Hantig replaces prosecco with Lillet Rosé and adds a touch of complexity with gin Lane and Worthy Park rum. Its delicate balance of floral, citrus, and rum notes makes it a perfect spring or summer sipper.

cocktail_specs.name: Watery?
cocktail_specs.description: A perplexing blend of floral, citrus, and rum notes, this cocktail plays with contrasts—sweet Lillet Rose meets dry Roku gin, balanced by an 'Oriental Aperitivo' (likely a misnomer for a fortified wine) and a whisper of Jamaican rum. Its name hints at its lightness, but its complexity lies in the unexpected harmony of ingredients.

A modern, elegant twist on the classic 3:1 ratio, this cocktail replaces sweet vermouth with Lillet Blanc, creating a lighter, more refined profile. Its name reflects the 45-to-8 ml ratio of gin to liqueur, delivering a harmonious balance of botanical brightness and subtle bitterness.

cocktail_specs.name: Vesper
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and timeless cocktail, the Vesper is a masterful blend of gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc, known for its elegant balance of citrus, floral, and herbal notes. Popularized by Ian Fleming in his James Bond novels, it embodies the essence of classic mixology with a touch of mystery.

cocktail_specs.name: OG Vesper
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the OG Vesper is a refined blend of gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc, known for its smooth, balanced profile with notes of citrus, floral, and subtle sweetness. It gained fame as the 'Vesper Martini' in Ian Fleming's James Bond novels, though this original version omits the lemon twist.

A crisp, elegant cocktail that captures the essence of a classic Martini with a refined balance of gin and dry vermouth, finished with a whisper of orange bitters. This drink is a staple in classic cocktails, known for its simplicity and sophistication.

cocktail_specs.name: marguerite
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Marguerite is a harmonious blend of floral, herbal, and citrus notes. Created in the early 20th century at the Hotel Meurice in Paris, it is said to have been named after a princess, embodying grace and refinement with its delicate balance of sweet, bitter, and aromatic elements.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist, edible flower (e.g., violet or rose)

cocktail_specs.name: martini cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and versatile cocktail, the Martini is a timeless classic that balances gin's botanical complexity with Lillet Blanc's herbal depth. While traditionally served dry or with an olive, this variation incorporates orange curaçao for a subtle citrus twist, making it both elegant and approachable.

cocktail_specs.name: White Lady
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the White Lady is a timeless blend of gin's botanical complexity with the bright acidity of lemon juice and the citrusy sweetness of triple sec. Created in the 1920s during the Prohibition era, it became a staple in speakeasies and has since remained a symbol of classic cocktail craftsmanship.

cocktail_specs.name: The Stig
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail that marries the crisp acidity of Calvados with the floral notes of elderflower liqueur, balanced by the bright citrus and herbal complexity of Sauvignon Blanc. Named after a mysterious figure in the world of mixology, this drink is both elegant and intriguing, offering a harmonious blend of French cider brandy and Peruvian pisco.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist or a sprig of fresh thyme

cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the 5* is a harmonious blend of Calvados' apple richness, grappa's bold intensity, St Germain's floral elegance, and Lillet Blanc's herbal depth. It’s a modern twist on classic French spirits, offering a complex interplay of sweet, bitter, and fruity notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Sunflower
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, herbaceous twist on the classic French 75, the Sunflower replaces champagne with St-Germain elderflower liqueur for a floral, effervescent profile. Its balance of dry gin, triple sec, and absinthe creates a complex, slightly bitter-sweet character with a lingering herbal finish.

cocktail_specs.name: Esmeralda
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail, the Esmeralda marries the smoky depth of peated Scotch with the bright, fruity notes of aged cachaça and St-Germain. Its name evokes emeralds—precious, multifaceted, and layered in flavor, making it a standout for those who appreciate both sweetness and intensity.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: In-Seine
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the In-Seine is a harmonious blend of bourbon, cognac, St-Germain elderflower liqueur, and a whisper of absinthe. It offers a layered experience with notes of vanilla, caramel, floral sweetness, and a subtle herbal complexity, making it both elegant and intriguing.

cocktail_specs.name: Maximilian Affair
cocktail_specs.description: A smoky, floral twist on a classic gin cocktail, the Maximilian Affair marries the deep, earthy notes of aged mezcal with the delicate elderflower essence of St-Germain. This sophisticated drink bridges traditional and modern mixology, offering a harmonious balance of heat, sweetness, and herbal complexity.

cocktail_specs.name: Maximilian Affair
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail that marries the smoky depth of aged mezcal with the floral elegance of St-Germain, balanced by the nutty richness of Lillet Blanc. Its bright lemon juice adds a zesty contrast, making it a perfect blend for those who appreciate both traditional and modern spirits.

cocktail_specs.name: Maximilian Affair
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the Maximilian Affair is a harmonious blend of Averna's rich herbal notes and Suze's artichoke bitterness. It offers a unique, slightly bitter-sweet profile that is both intriguing and refreshing.

cocktail_specs.name: elderflower champagne cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and effervescent British classic, this cocktail harmonizes the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur with the crisp acidity of gin and lemon. It’s a sophisticated yet approachable aperitif, often associated with the late 19th century London cocktail scene.

cocktail_specs.name: Red Hook
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex American cocktail, the Red Hook is a masterful blend of rye whisky's spice, sweet fortified wine's richness, and maraschino's fruity depth. It was created by Jeff 'Beard' Berry at Death & Co, embodying the spirit of modern mixology with its layered flavors and balanced bitterness.
cocktail_specs.garnish: expressed orange twist and a cherry from the maraschino liqueur

cocktail_specs.name: Red Hook
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail from the Red Hook Distillery in Brooklyn, this drink harmonizes rye whisky with herbal Lillet Blanc, cherry liqueur, and a touch of Suze for bitterness. Its name pays homage to the historic Brooklyn neighborhood, blending old-world craftsmanship with modern American spirit innovation.

A sophisticated and complex cocktail, the 1910 is a harmonious blend of smoky mezcal, rich cognac, sweet maraschino, and fortified wine, balanced by a touch of aromatic bitters. It's a modern take on classic spirit-forward cocktails, offering layers of flavor that evolve beautifully in the glass.

cocktail_specs.name: Last Insult
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail, the Last Insult is a spirited blend of gin, lime, maraschino liqueur, and fernet branca. Its name reflects its layered profile—sweet, sour, herbal, and bitter—while paying homage to its predecessor, the Last Word.

A modern, balanced cocktail that harmonizes the juniper-forward brightness of London dry gin with the tart acidity of lime and the herbal complexity of Amaro Montenegro. Its equal parts construction creates a refreshing yet sophisticated profile, perfect for sipping or savoring.

A vibrant and complex cocktail, the 5+* is a modern twist on classic elements, blending the botanical depth of gin with the sweet-tart brightness of maraschino and lime. Its name reflects its layered complexity, offering a harmonious balance of herbal, citrus, and cherry notes.

A modern twist on the classic 4:1 cocktail, this drink combines gin's botanical complexity with the sweet-tart brightness of maraschino and lime, balanced by a touch of absinthe for an intriguing herbal depth. It's a playful yet sophisticated blend that bridges tradition and innovation.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime twist and a cherry skewered on a cocktail pick

cocktail_specs.name: Suze
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and slightly bitter French cocktail, the Suze is a harmonious blend of gin's botanical complexity, maraschino's sweet cherry depth, and lime's bright acidity. Created in the 1930s by the Parisian bartender Louis Eppinger, it reflects the elegance of pre-war Parisian mixology.

cocktail_specs.name: Nuclear Daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, overproof twist on the classic Daiquiri, this cocktail packs a punch with its high-proof rum and Chartreuse, creating a complex, herbal-forward profile. The addition of lime juice and falernum adds brightness and depth, making it a standout in the modern cocktail scene.

cocktail_specs.name: Rumba
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and layered tiki-style cocktail, the Rumba delivers a harmonious blend of bright citrus, rich rum, and a touch of sweetness. Its balanced profile makes it both refreshing and complex, with a subtle depth from the grenadine and rich syrup.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum Punch
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex Caribbean classic, Rum Punch is a harmonious blend of overproof rum's bold intensity, tart lime juice, and sweet syrup, balanced by aromatic bitters. This cocktail has roots in 18th-century naval tradition, where it was served to sailors for its invigorating properties.

cocktail_specs.name: Rum punch-up
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic rum punch, this cocktail balances the bold, overproof character of Jamaican white rum with bright lime juice and a touch of aromatic bitters. It’s a spirit-forward, refreshing sipper that captures the essence of tiki culture while leaning into its contemporary edge.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a sprinkle of Angostura bitters

cocktail_specs.name: Shark's Tooth No1
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex tiki-style cocktail that balances the fiery punch of overproof rum with bright citrus, sweetness, and a touch of tart grenadine. Its layered profile and tropical undertones make it a standout in the tiki repertoire.

cocktail_specs.name: Waters of Chaos
cocktail_specs.description: A complex and layered tiki-style cocktail, the Waters of Chaos blends the smoky depth of Genever with the fiery punch of overproof rum. Green Chartreuse adds a herbal, slightly bitter dimension, while lime juice and rich syrup provide a bright, sweet contrast.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Dr Rieux
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail inspired by the character Dr. Rieux from Albert Camus' 'The Plague,' this drink combines Calvados, white rum, Swedish Punsch, orange curaçao, demerara syrup, and lemon juice to create a complex blend of apple, citrus, and spiced notes with a smooth, slightly bitter finish. It's a perfect example of how spirits can come together to evoke both depth and nostalgia.

cocktail_specs.name: Kneadermeyer
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that marries the smoky depth of mezcal with the agave brightness of blanco tequila, creating a harmonious blend of earthy, herbal, and citrus notes. Named after the legendary Kneader & Meyer, this drink is a modern take on the classic margarita, elevated by the addition of triple sec and green Chartreuse.

cocktail_specs.name: Drunk Uncle
cocktail_specs.description: A bold, peated twist on the classic Uncle, this cocktail layers rich blended Scotch with smoky single malt and herbal vermouth, creating a complex, warming libation. Its name hints at its strength and character, perfect for those who enjoy robust, spirit-forward drinks.

cocktail_specs.name: Fall Back
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, autumnal cocktail that harmonizes the spicy warmth of rye with the apple brandy sweetness of Calvados, balanced by the herbal depth of Rosso vermouth and the bittersweet complexity of Amaro Nonino. A perfect sipper for cooler evenings, its layers of flavor evoke the essence of fall.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and a cinnamon quill

cocktail_specs.name: Black Manhattan
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Manhattan, the Black Manhattan replaces sweet vermouth with Averna, adding a rich herbal depth while maintaining its signature balance of rye whiskey's spice and Angostura bitters. Its dark, velvety profile makes it a standout for those who appreciate complexity without sacrificing elegance.

cocktail_specs.name: Peat's Dragon
cocktail_specs.description: A smoky, complex cocktail that marries the peaty richness of Scotch with the sweet citrus brightness of orange curaçao and the herbal depth of Lillet Blanc. It’s a modern twist on classic spirit-forward cocktails, offering a balance of smoke, bitterness, and sweetness that lingers on the palate.

cocktail_specs.name: Lions Tail
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and aromatic tiki-style cocktail, the Lions Tail is a rich blend of bourbon, pimento dram, lime juice, and angostura bitters, sweetened with rich syrup. It evokes the spirit of tropical adventures with its spicy, citrusy, and slightly bitter profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Sidecar
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless French classic, the Sidecar is a bright and effervescent cocktail that balances the rich, oak notes of cognac with the citrusy tang of lemon juice and the floral sweetness of triple sec. Born in Paris during World War I, it was named for its resemblance to a sidecar on a motorcycle.

cocktail_specs.name: maple old fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this version incorporates rich maple syrup to enhance the whiskey's natural sweetness and depth. It retains the spirit-forward character of its predecessor while introducing a subtle, earthy complexity that bridges traditional and contemporary styles.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange peel twist and a Luxardo cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Tokyo Drift
cocktail_specs.description: A modern, spirit-forward twist on the classic Negroni, the Tokyo Drift replaces gin with rich Scotch whisky and adds a touch of Strega for depth. Its bittersweet profile, balanced by the herbal notes of vermouth, makes it a sophisticated yet approachable cocktail.

cocktail_specs.name: Midnight Stinger
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail with a deep, bittersweet profile, the Midnight Stinger combines bourbon's rich caramel and oak notes with fernet's herbal complexity. It was created to be a sophisticated nightcap, balancing sweetness, acidity, and robust amaro flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Smokestack Lightning
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail that marries the smoky depth of peated Scotch with the agave-forward brightness of reposado tequila, creating a harmonious balance of sweet, bitter, and herbal notes. This drink is a modern take on the classic Smokestack, originally popularized in tiki culture but reimagined here for its sophisticated spirit-forward character.

cocktail_specs.name: Mullyzoo
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Tiki-style cocktail, the Mullyzoo combines reposado tequila with tart lime juice, sweet maraschino liqueur, and agave syrup. It's a perfect blend of citrusy brightness, cherry richness, and a touch of smoky depth from the aged tequila.

cocktail_specs.name: Harvest Old Fashioned
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail marries the spicy warmth of rye with the fruity depth of Calvados (apple brandy), creating a harmonious autumnal elixir. The rich syrup adds a touch of sweetness, balancing the drink's complex flavors while evoking the essence of harvest season.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange twist and a Luxardo cherry

cocktail_specs.name: Harvest Cocktail
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated autumnal libation, the Harvest Cocktail marries the rich, apple-infused depth of Calvados with the herbal complexity of vermouth amaro. A touch of aromatic Angostura bitters adds a subtle, spicy finish, making it a perfect celebration of seasonal flavors.
cocktail_specs.garnish: apple slice and a sprinkle of cinnamon

cocktail_specs.name: nuclear daiquiri
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex twist on the classic daiquiri, the Nuclear Daiquiri packs a punch with its high-proof OP rum, Chartreuse's herbal depth, and falernum's spiced sweetness. This modern interpretation replaces traditional simple syrup with falernum for a richer, more aromatic profile, making it a standout in both flavor and complexity.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime shell or a flamed orange peel (optional)

cocktail_specs.name: Mistaken for Strangers
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Negroni, this cocktail replaces Campari with Green Chartreuse, creating a complex, herbal, and slightly sweet profile. It's a spirit-forward drink that balances grappa's boldness with the herbal notes of Chartreuse and a touch of lime brightness.

cocktail_specs.name: Le Dernier Mot
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and complex cocktail, Le Dernier Mot is a harmonious blend of unaged rhum blanc, the herbal depth of Green Chartreuse, the sweet-tart essence of maraschino liqueur, and a touch of lemon juice.
