This drink, often associated with the French tradition, offers a layered experience with notes of green herbs, cherry, citrus, and a subtle rum character.

cocktail_specs.name: Brazilian Nail
cocktail_specs.description: A bold and complex cocktail with a rich, smoky depth, the Brazilian Nail is a harmonious marriage of Brazil's beloved cachaca and Scotland's finest Scotch, elevated by the herbal notes of Drambuie. This drink is a celebration of two distinct spirits coming together to create something uniquely satisfying.

cocktail_specs.name: Churchillian
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and layered cocktail, the Churchillian is a tribute to Winston Churchill's love for strong spirits. It combines rich Scotch, cognac, and absinthe with herbal amaro, green Chartreuse, and maraschino, creating a complex symphony of sweet, bitter, and herbal notes that is both invigorating and deeply satisfying.

cocktail_specs.name: Churchillian Variation
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and spirit-forward cocktail, the Churchillian Variation is a rich blend of Scotch and Cognac, layered with the herbal depth of amaro, the sweetness of maraschino, and a whisper of absinthe's emerald allure. It pays homage to Winston Churchill, who was known for his love of strong spirits and complex flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Gardenia Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and complex cocktail that marries the bright acidity of grapefruit with the smoky depth of allspice dram, creating a harmonious balance of citrus and spice. This modern twist on the classic sour is both refreshing and sophisticated, perfect for those who appreciate a spirit-forward profile with layered flavors.
cocktail_specs.garnish: grapefruit twist and a sprinkle of allspice berries

cocktail_specs.name: Cinnamon Girl
cocktail_specs.description: A warm, aromatic cocktail that blends the smoky depth of reposado tequila with the spicy sweetness of cinnamon syrup and orange juice. It's a modern twist on classic tiki flavors, offering a harmonious balance of citrus, spice, and rum.

cocktail_specs.name: Naked Batida
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic Brazilian batida, this version swaps cachaça for natural yogurt, creating a creamy, tangy, and sweet cocktail with a refreshing raspberry-vanilla profile. It’s a playful yet sophisticated drink that bridges traditional and contemporary mixology.
cocktail_specs.garnish: fresh raspberry and a sprinkle of edible flowers

cocktail_specs.name: RTV
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing French-inspired cocktail, RTV combines the bright acidity of verjus with the sweetness of raspberry cordial and tonic syrup, balanced by the robust depth of rhum agricole. It's a modern twist on classic French flavors, offering a harmonious blend of tart, sweet, and rum-forward notes.
cocktail_specs.garnish: raspberry leaf or a twist of lemon peel

cocktail_specs.name: Night-Market Gluvine
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and aromatic fusion of spiced blackberry syrup and light red wine, this cocktail captures the essence of a bustling night market. The warm spices in the syrup dance with the bright acidity of the wine, creating a refreshing yet complex profile that's both nostalgic and modern.

cocktail_specs.name: Iced Blackberry Horchata
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the traditional horchata, this cocktail blends creamy almond milk with cold-brew coffee and a spiced blackberry syrup. It offers a harmonious balance of nutty richness, fruity depth, and subtle bitterness, making it a refreshing yet complex drink perfect for warm weather.
cocktail_specs.garnish: dusting of cinnamon and a few fresh blackberries

cocktail_specs.name: Passing Thyme
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic twist on a classic wine cocktail, the Passing Thyme combines crisp Chardonnay with the herbal depth of thyme and the aniseed warmth of Pastis. Its name reflects its layered complexity, where the floral notes of Chardonnay dance with the licorice undertones of Pastis, while currant jelly adds a subtle berry sweetness.
notes: one to shake, one to garnish

cocktail_specs.name: Fronds
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic cocktail that bridges the gap between a classic aperitivo and a modern twist on the Negroni Sbagliato. The Fronds plays with the natural sweetness of apple juice, the herbal complexity of vermouth, and the unique caramel-like notes of aquavit, all topped with a light effervescence. Garnished with delicate fennel fronds, it offers a textural contrast that enhances its layered flavor profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Blushing Swizzle
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Swizzle, this cocktail combines the herbal complexity of vermouth with the crisp sweetness of sparkling apple juice, topped off with a touch of grenadine for a blushing hue. It's a modern reinterpretation that plays on the traditional flavors while adding a contemporary sparkle.

cocktail_specs.name: This little piggy
cocktail_specs.description: A whimsical and refreshing twist on a classic, this cocktail combines the bright acidity of lemonade with the sweet, peachy notes of stuffing syrup and the botanical complexity of gin. It's a playful yet sophisticated drink that captures the essence of summer in every sip.

cocktail_specs.name: Sunday Roast Tea
cocktail_specs.description: A comforting and indulgent twist on traditional English tea, this cocktail captures the essence of a Sunday roast with its rich, savory-sweet profile. It combines the warmth of black tea with the deep, caramelized notes of stuffing syrup and creamy milk, evoking the flavors of a hearty meal.

cocktail_specs.name: Bamboo
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic tiki classic, the Bamboo is a harmonious blend of fino sherry's nutty depth, dry vermouth's herbal brightness, and Angostura bitters' complex spice. It was popularized in the mid-20th century by tiki pioneers like Donn Beach, embodying the spirit of tropical elegance with a touch of sweetness.

cocktail_specs.name: Sherry Cobbler
cocktail_specs.description: A vintage American classic, the Sherry Cobbler is a harmonious blend of fortified sherry's nutty richness and bright orange citrus. It dates back to the late 19th century and was a staple in early American cocktail culture, often served with a refreshing splash of soda water.

cocktail_specs.name: Queen Elizabeth
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing cocktail, the Queen Elizabeth is a harmonious blend of tart lime juice, herbal vermouth, and the spiced complexity of Benedictine. It’s said to have been created in honor of Queen Elizabeth II, though its exact origins remain somewhat mysterious.

cocktail_specs.name: Americano
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and bitter-sweet Italian aperitivo, the Americano is a classic cocktail that predates the Negroni. It combines Campari's herbal bitterness with the smooth sweetness of vermouth, topped with soda water for a light, effervescent finish.

cocktail_specs.name: Adonis
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and elegant cocktail, the Adonis is a harmonious blend of fino sherry's nutty depth, sweet vermouth's herbal richness, and orange bitters' citrusy brightness. Created in the early 20th century, it embodies the refined spirit of classic mixology with a touch of Mediterranean charm.

cocktail_specs.name: Aperol Spritz
cocktail_specs.description: A light, effervescent Italian aperitivo with a vibrant orange hue and a harmonious balance of bitterness from Aperol, sweetness from Prosecco, and crispness from soda water. Originating in the 1950s as a variation of the Negroni, it became a symbol of summer in Italy and beyond.

cocktail_specs.name: Kir Royale
cocktail_specs.description: A luxurious twist on the classic Kir, the Kir Royale elevates blackcurrant liqueur with a generous pour of champagne. Originating in France, it’s a sophisticated blend of sweet, tart, and effervescent notes, perfect for celebrations or as an elegant aperitif.

cocktail_specs.name: Spa Water
cocktail_specs.description: A crisp, refreshing cocktail that embodies the essence of a spa day. Originating from London's The Savoy, it combines the cooling crunch of cucumber with the bright acidity of lime and a touch of sweetness, all topped with effervescent soda water for a light, palate-cleansing experience.

cocktail_specs.name: Basil Orgeat Lemonade
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and aromatic cocktail that marries the nutty sweetness of orgeat with the bright acidity of lemon juice, elevated by the herbal complexity of basil. This drink is a modern twist on classic French flavors, offering a harmonious balance between creamy, citrusy, and vegetal notes.
cocktail_specs.garnish: fresh basil leaf and lemon twist

cocktail_specs.name: The Grey Fox
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing cocktail that plays on the flavors of Earl Grey tea, this drink balances floral bergamot notes with bright lemon juice and a touch of aquafaba for a light, effervescent texture. It’s a modern twist on classic highballs, often associated with the tiki style but stripped down to its essential elements.

cocktail_specs.name: The Placebo
cocktail_specs.description: A creamy, tropical twist on the classic placebo cocktail, this drink balances rich coconut cream with bright citrus and a touch of tart lime. It's a refreshing yet indulgent choice, perfect for those who crave a sweet yet sophisticated sip.

cocktail_specs.name: A Little Time Off
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and invigorating cocktail that captures the essence of a leisurely afternoon. The bright citrus notes of lemon juice are beautifully balanced by the earthy sweetness of thyme-infused simple syrup, while ginger beer adds a spicy kick and effervescence, making it both complex and easy-drinking.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon twist, sprig of fresh thyme

cocktail_specs.name: Averna Tonic
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing twist on the classic tonic, this cocktail combines Averna's rich, herbal bitterness with the effervescence of tonic water. It’s a modern take on an Italian aperitivo, offering a harmonious balance of citrus and botanical notes that make it both invigorating and complex.

cocktail_specs.name: Lillet Vive
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and refreshing twist on the classic Lillet, the Lillet Vive combines the delicate floral and herbal notes of Lillet Blanc with the effervescent brightness of tonic water. Originating from the Bordeaux region, this cocktail embodies elegance and balance, making it a perfect choice for those who appreciate subtlety in their drinks.

cocktail_specs.name: Gin Tonic
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless and refreshing cocktail, the Gin Tonic is a harmonious marriage of botanical gin and effervescent tonic water, often characterized by its subtle bitterness and citrus notes. Originating in colonial India as a medicinal drink, it evolved into a beloved global aperitif, celebrated for its simplicity and versatility.

cocktail_specs.name: Porto Tonic
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Gin Tonic, this drink replaces gin with crisp white Portwein, creating a harmonious blend of fruity, slightly sweet, and effervescent notes. The addition of Orange Bitters adds a subtle citrusy depth, making it an elegant aperitif or refreshing palate cleanser.

cocktail_specs.name: Southern Cola
cocktail_specs.description: A smooth, boozy twist on the classic cola, this cocktail balances Southern Comfort's caramel and vanilla notes with the bright acidity of lime juice. It’s a nostalgic, spirit-forward drink that bridges the gap between a whiskey sour and a cola-based refresher.

cocktail_specs.name: Cynar Soda
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and bitter-sweet Italian aperitivo, Cynar Soda is a modern twist on the classic Cynar cocktail. It combines the earthy, artichoke-infused bitterness of Cynar with the crispness of soda water, creating a light yet complex profile that's perfect for sipping or pairing with light bites.

cocktail_specs.name: Vermouth Soda
cocktail_specs.description: A deceptively simple yet elegant aperitivo, Vermouth Soda captures the essence of Italian sophistication with its harmonious balance of sweet, herbal vermouth and crisp soda water. Often referred to as 'Vermut,' it has been a staple in Italian social culture since the late 19th century, traditionally served as a pre-dinner drink or paired with charcuterie.

cocktail_specs.name: Canton Fizz
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent cocktail from the Canton Club in New York, this drink balances tart lemon with sweet vermouth and soda water. Its origins trace back to the early 20th century, embodying the charm of classic American mixology.

cocktail_specs.name: Calypso
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Calypso, this cocktail blends bright lemon juice with sweet vermouth and tonic water for a light, effervescent drink. It's a modern take on the traditional, offering a balance of citrus zing and herbal depth.

cocktail_specs.name: Italian Cooler
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and vibrant Italian aperitivo, the Italian Cooler balances the herbal complexity of blanc vermouth with the sweet-tart punch of grenadine, topped with a effervescent soda for a light yet satisfying sip. It’s a modern twist on classic Italian flavors, perfect for warm afternoons.

cocktail_specs.name: Biki
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and effervescent Italian aperitivo, the Biki is a lighter, more approachable cousin to the Aperol Spritz. It balances the bitterness of blanc vermouth with the sweetness of Aperol, topped with soda for a crisp, bubbly finish.

cocktail_specs.name: Admiral Highball
cocktail_specs.description: A nautical-inspired, spirit-forward highball that blends bourbon's rich oak and vanilla with the bright acidity of lemon and pineapple. This cocktail is said to have been created for Admiral Lord Nelson by his valet, Sir John Moore, as a refreshing yet robust drink for long voyages.

cocktail_specs.name: Pineapple Cooler
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and vibrant cocktail that balances the herbal complexity of blanc vermouth with the sweet, tropical brightness of pineapple juice. This drink is a modern twist on classic aperitivo flavors, offering a smooth, slightly bitter finish with effervescent soda.

cocktail_specs.name: LLB
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and balanced cocktail, the LLB (Lemon Lime Bitters) is a modern twist on classic citrus flavors. It combines the tartness of lime juice with the effervescence of zitronenlimo, creating a light yet complex drink that's perfect for summer sipping.

cocktail_specs.name: Cold Brew Iced Tea
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing, non-alcoholic beverage that captures the depth of cold-brewed black tea with a touch of sweetness. Often enjoyed as a summer staple, its smooth, tannin-rich profile makes it a versatile base for both classic and modern variations.

cocktail_specs.name: Surfing Woman
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, citrus-forward cocktail that captures the essence of tropical tiki culture with its bright orange-curacao sweetness and zesty grapefruit. It was popularized in the 1950s by Donn Beach, a key figure in the tiki movement, blending bold flavors for a refreshing yet complex sip.

cocktail_specs.name: Red Rose
cocktail_specs.description: A romantic and refreshing blend of tart lemon, sweet strawberry, and the subtle floral notes of grape juice, topped with tonic water. This cocktail is a modern take on classic rose flavors, offering a harmonious balance of fruitiness and effervescence.
cocktail_specs.garnish: fresh strawberry slice and a lemon twist

cocktail_specs.name: Kandahär
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and vibrant Swedish cocktail that captures the essence of summer with its bright lemon and sweet grenadine, balanced by the effervescent bite of tonic. Originating from the Stockholm bar Kandahar, this drink is a modern twist on classic citrus cocktails, offering a harmonious blend of tart, sweet, and effervescent notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Highway
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Sunset, the Highway replaces gin with tonic water for a lighter, more effervescent profile. Its bright citrus notes and subtle sweetness make it an ideal summer sipper.

cocktail_specs.name: Yellow Orchid
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on a classic, the Yellow Orchid layers bright citrus notes with a touch of sweetness, creating a harmonious balance that dances between tart and sugary. Its name hints at the floral elegance hidden beneath its citrus-forward profile.

cocktail_specs.name: Florida Milk
cocktail_specs.description: A creamy, tropical twist on the classic Florida Water cocktail, this version replaces the original's herbal liqueur with light Cuban rum and cow's milk for a rich, velvety texture. It’s a refreshing yet indulgent drink that balances citrus brightness with smooth sweetness, embodying the laid-back charm of Florida's beachside bars.

cocktail_specs.name: Annabelle
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing tiki-style cocktail, the Annabelle combines the tropical sweetness of pineapple and orange juice with the smooth, slightly spiced character of Cuban rum. Its name is said to be inspired by a classic tiki motif, evoking the allure of Polynesian islands.

cocktail_specs.name: Cinderella
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and tropical twist on the classic Cinderella, this version replaces traditional grenadine with raspberry syrup for a deeper fruity complexity. It balances sweet, creamy coconut notes with bright citrus and rum, creating a luscious, dessert-like cocktail that’s both refreshing and indulgent.

cocktail_specs.name: Davis Cup
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail, the Davis Cup is a modern twist on classic citrus flavors. It combines bright lemon and orange juices with grenadine for a balanced sweetness, while bitter lemon adds depth and complexity, making it a perfect choice for warm weather.

cocktail_specs.name: Cola & Tea
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic tea and cola pairing, this cocktail offers a harmonious blend of citrusy, malty notes from Earl Grey with the effervescent sweetness of cola. It's a refreshing yet sophisticated drink that bridges the gap between traditional afternoon tea and contemporary mixology.

cocktail_specs.name: Lemonade
cocktail_specs.description: A timeless, refreshing classic that captures the bright acidity of fresh lemon juice and the effervescent crunch of soda water. This simple yet elegant drink has roots in ancient Roman times, where it was enjoyed as a digestive aid and symbolized vitality.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lemon wheel or wedge, mint sprig

cocktail_specs.name: Passion at the Disco
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, tropical twist on a classic highball, this cocktail blends the zesty tang of lime with the sweet, fruity depth of passion fruit syrup and the effervescent bite of tonic water. It's a refreshing, modern take that dances between citrus brightness and floral complexity, perfect for sipping under the disco lights.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a sprig of mint

cocktail_specs.name: Cola & Spice
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on the classic cola, this cocktail balances the effervescent sweetness of cola with the bright, zesty tang of orange juice and a spicy ginger kick. It’s a refreshing yet complex drink that bridges the gap between soda and sophisticated mixology.

cocktail_specs.name: Cherry Zip
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Tiki-style cocktail that marries the tartness of cherry with the nutty depth of orgeat, balanced by bright lemon and a subtle kick of red chili. Its name reflects its zesty character, while its ingredients evoke the tropical, spiced flavors of Polynesian-inspired drinks.

cocktail_specs.name: Coco Colada
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical twist on the classic Piña Colada, this cocktail replaces traditional coconut cream with a lighter, more refreshing approach using coconut syrup and peach banana juice. It retains the creamy texture while offering a brighter, fruit-forward profile that’s perfect for summer sipping.

cocktail_specs.name: Port Sour
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and balanced cocktail, the Port Sour is a harmonious blend of rich tawny port, zesty lemon juice, sweet simple syrup, and a touch of orange juice. It’s a modern twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, offering depth with its fortified wine base while maintaining a refreshing citrus brightness.

cocktail_specs.name: Coco
cocktail_specs.description: A tropical, creamy cocktail that marries the rich caramel notes of coconut with the smooth warmth of Cuban rum and bright pineapple juice. It's a modern take on the classic 'Piña Colada' without the dairy, offering a refreshing yet indulgent sip.

cocktail_specs.name: Baby Pina Colada
cocktail_specs.description: A playful, scaled-down version of the classic Piña Colada, this cocktail delivers a creamy, tropical escape with notes of sweet pineapple and rum. It’s a refreshing, dessert-like drink that captures the essence of the original in a more approachable size.

cocktail_specs.name: Blacky
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing German-inspired cocktail, the Blacky is a harmonious blend of tart cranberry juice, bright lemon, and smooth honey, topped with soda for a light effervescence. Its name reflects its deep, berry-forward profile, making it a standout choice for those who appreciate bold yet balanced flavors.

cocktail_specs.name: Tokyo Teenage
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing Japanese-inspired cocktail that captures the essence of tropical flavors with a modern twist. It combines bright citrus notes from lime, orange, and pineapple juice, balanced by a touch of sweetness, creating a lively and invigorating drink perfect for warm weather.

cocktail_specs.name: Ahorntee
cocktail_specs.description: A harmonious German-inspired drink that marries the earthy sweetness of maple syrup with the floral and bergamot notes of Earl Grey tea, balanced by a bright lime twist. This refreshing yet sophisticated cocktail is a modern take on traditional tea-based drinks, often served chilled for a light, summery appeal.
cocktail_specs.garnish: lime wheel and a light sprinkle of bergamot zest

cocktail_specs.name: Colito
cocktail_specs.description: A playful and refreshing twist on the classic cola, the Colito combines the effervescent sweetness of cola with the bright acidity of lime juice. It's a modern take on a tiki-inspired drink that balances the bold flavors of cola with the zesty tang of citrus.

cocktail_specs.name: Apple Frazzle
cocktail_specs.description: A refreshing and slightly tart cocktail that captures the essence of autumn with its bright apple juice and zesty lemon, balanced by a touch of sweetness. This drink is a modern twist on classic apple-based beverages, often associated with tiki culture.

cocktail_specs.name: Nutty Frappe
cocktail_specs.description: A creamy, nutty twist on the classic Frappe, this cocktail blends the herbal depth of anise with the sweetness of orgeat and cola. It's a modern take on the Absinthe Frappe, offering a smooth, slightly bitter profile that's both refreshing and indulgent.

cocktail_specs.name: Power-Shake
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, fruity cocktail that blends the sweetness of grenadine with the zesty brightness of orange juice and the velvety texture of pear juice. It's a refreshing, non-alcoholic option perfect for those who crave a tropical twist without the complexity of spirits.
cocktail_specs.garnish: orange wheel and a pear slice

cocktail_specs.name: Jupiter
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant and refreshing cocktail inspired by the Roman god, the Jupiter is a harmonious blend of nutty orgeat, bright orange juice, and a touch of grape juice, topped with soda. Its name reflects its celestial balance of flavors, making it a perfect choice for sunny gatherings.

cocktail_specs.name: Kleine Königin
cocktail_specs.description: A delicate and refreshing German cocktail, the Kleine Königin translates to 'Little Queen' and is a harmonious blend of almond orgeat, raspberry juice, milk, and soda. It's a lighter, more approachable cousin to the classic Königin der Nacht, with a gentle sweetness and nutty depth.
cocktail_specs.garnish: raspberry leaf or a light dusting of almond powder

cocktail_specs.name: Mandelshake
cocktail_specs.description: A creamy, nutty twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, the Mandelshake replaces whiskey with orgeat and grenadine, delivering a harmonious blend of almond richness, raspberry sweetness, and a touch of acidity. This cocktail is a modern interpretation that highlights the versatility of orgeat while maintaining the refreshing balance of its ancestors.

cocktail_specs.name: Black Baby
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, velvety twist on the classic Black Russian, the Black Baby replaces vodka with cranberry juice and adds a luxurious egg yolk for a decadent, slightly sweet, and creamy texture. It's a modern take on a tiki-inspired cocktail that balances tart berry notes with smooth dairy.
cocktail_specs.garnish: cranberry twist and a dusting of nutmeg

cocktail_specs.name: Honigflip
cocktail_specs.description: A rich, creamy Dutch classic with a velvety texture and a harmonious balance of sweet honey, tart cranberry, and the subtle depth of egg yolk. Traditionally served as a dessert cocktail, it’s a celebration of simplicity and indulgence.

cocktail_specs.name: Wheeler Dealer
cocktail_specs.description: A vibrant, fruit-forward cocktail that blends the sweetness of grenadine with the bright acidity of orange and grapefruit juices. Its playful name reflects its layered flavors, making it a refreshing choice for those who enjoy a mix of tropical and citrus notes.

cocktail_specs.name: Nuts & Tea
cocktail_specs.description: A sophisticated and aromatic twist on a classic, this cocktail combines the earthy depth of tea with the nutty richness of orgeat and the bright acidity of pineapple juice. It's a harmonious blend that balances sweetness, bitterness, and herbal notes, making it both refreshing and complex.
cocktail_specs.garnish: pineapple leaf and a sprinkle of toasted almond flakes

cocktail_specs.name: A day in the sheds
cocktail_specs.description: A modern twist on a classic, this cocktail marries the rich, fruity depth of apple brandy with the crisp, herbal brightness of cucumber shrub. The addition of sweet fortified wine adds a luscious, balanced sweetness that evokes the charm of a lazy afternoon in a garden shed.
